 18620                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18621                                  ; Proc Name : Check_If_Net:
 18622                                  ;
 18623                                  ;
 18624                                  ; Checks if the device is over the net or not. Returns result in ZERO flag.
 18625                                  ; If no device is found, the return address is popped off the stack, and a
 18626                                  ; jump is made to ioctl_drv_err.
 18627                                  ;
 18628                                  ; On Entry:
 18629                                  ; Registers same as those for Get_Driver_BL
 18630                                  ;
 18631                                  ; On Exit:
 18632                                  ; ZERO flag	- set if not a net device
 18633                                  ;		- reset if net device
 18634                                  ; ES:DI -> the device
 18635                                  ;
 18636                                  ;
 18637                                  ; BUGBUG: This function assumes the following stack setup on entry
 18638                                  ;
 18639                                  ;	  SP+2 -> Error return address
 18640                                  ;	  SP   -> Normal return address
 18641                                  ;
 18642                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18643                                  
 18644                                  	; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18645                                  	; MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:639Ch
 18646                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:6A91h
 18647                                  	; Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:68E1h
 18648                                  
 18649                                  Check_If_Net:
 18650                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 18651 00002B0C E8D2FF                  	CALL	Get_Driver_BL
 18652 00002B0F 7201                    	JC	short ioctl_drv_err_pop	; invalid drive letter
 18653                                  
 18654                                  ; 30/01/2024 ('Get_Driver_BL' returns with
 18655                                  ;	      'curdir_isnet' condition/ZF, no need to a second test)
 18656                                  %if 0
 18657                                  	;;;
 18658                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM, Windows ME IO.SYS)
 18659                                  	PUSH	ES
 18660                                  	PUSH	DI
 18661                                  	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 18662                                  	;test	word [es:di+43h],8000h
 18663                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet
 18664                                  	;test	byte [es:di+44h],80h
 18665                                  	TEST	byte [ES:DI+curdir.flags+1],(curdir_isnet>>8)
 18666                                  	POP	DI
 18667                                  	POP	ES
 18668                                  	;;;
 18669                                  %endif
 18670 00002B11 C3                      	retn
 18671                                  
 18672                                  ioctl_drv_err_pop:
 18673 00002B12 58                      	pop	ax			; pop off return address
 18674 00002B13 E951FF                  	jmp	ioctl_drv_err
 18675                                  
 18676                                  ioctl_bad_funj3:
 18677 00002B16 E988FE                  	jmp	ioctl_bad_fun
 18678                                  
 18679                                  ioctl_string_errj:
 18680 00002B19 EBB2                    	jmp	short ioctl_string_err  ; 25/05/2019
 18681                                  
 18682                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18683                                  ;
 18684                                  ; IOCTL: AL = E, F
 18685                                  ;
 18686                                  ; ENTRY: DS = DOSDATA
 18687                                  ;
 18688                                  ;
 18689                                  ; BUGBUG: Don't push anything on the stack between ioctl_drive_owner: and 
 18690                                  ;         the call to Check_If_Net because Check_If_Net gets our
 18691                                  ;         return address off the stack if the drive is invalid.
 18692                                  ;
 18693                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18694                                  
 18695                                  ioctl_drive_owner:
 18696                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 18697 00002B1B E8EEFF                  	Call	Check_If_Net
 18698 00002B1E 75F6                    	JNZ	short ioctl_bad_funj3 	; There are no "net devices", and they
 18699                                  					;   certainly don't know how to do this
 18700                                  					;   call.
 18701                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SYSDEV.ATT],DEV320	; See if device can handle this
 18702                                  	; 09/09/2018
 18703                                  	;test	byte [es:di+4],40h
 18704 00002B20 26F6450440              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+SYSDEV.ATT],DEV320 ; 0040h
 18705 00002B25 74EF                    	JZ	short ioctl_bad_funj3 	; NO
 18706                                  	;mov	byte [IOCALL_REQFUNC],23
 18707 00002B27 C606[7E03]17            	mov	byte [IOCALL_REQFUNC],DEVGETOWN	; default to get owner
 18708 00002B2C 3C0E                    	cmp	al,0Eh			; Get Owner ?
 18709 00002B2E 7405                    	jz	short GetOwner
 18710                                  SetOwner:
 18711 00002B30 C606[7E03]18            	MOV	byte [IOCALL_REQFUNC],DEVSETOWN ; 24
 18712                                  GetOwner:
 18713 00002B35 B00D                    	MOV	AL,OWNHL ; 13
 18714 00002B37 88DC                    	MOV	AH,BL			; Unit number
 18715 00002B39 A3[7C03]                	MOV	[IOCALL_REQLEN],AX
 18716 00002B3C 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 18717 00002B3E A3[7F03]                	MOV	[IOCALL_REQSTAT],AX
 18718 00002B41 06                      	PUSH	ES
 18719 00002B42 1F                      	POP	DS
 18720 00002B43 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI			; DS:SI -> driver
 18721 00002B45 16                      	PUSH	SS
 18722 00002B46 07                      	POP	ES
 18723 00002B47 BB[7C03]                	MOV	BX,IOCALL		; ES:BX -> Call header
 18724 00002B4A 1E                      	push	ds
 18725 00002B4B 56                      	push	si
 18726 00002B4C E84E27                  	call	DEVIOCALL2
 18727 00002B4F 5E                      	pop	si
 18728 00002B50 1F                      	pop	ds
 18729                                  ;hkn; SS override
 18730                                  	;TEST	word [SS:IOCALL_REQSTAT],STERR ;Error?
 18731                                  	;test	byte [SS:IOCALL_REQSTAT+1],80h
 18732 00002B51 36F606[8003]80          	TEST	byte [SS:IOCALL_REQSTAT+1],(STERR>>8)
 18733 00002B57 75C0                    	jnz	short ioctl_string_errj
 18734 00002B59 36A0[7D03]              	MOV	AL,[SS:IOCALL_REQUNIT]	; Get owner returned by device
 18735                                  					; owner returned is 1-based.
 18736 00002B5D E90EDB                  	jmp	SYS_RET_OK
 18737                                  
 18738                                  ;============================================================================
 18739                                  ; DELETE.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 18740                                  ;============================================================================
 18741                                  ; 07/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 18742                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18743                                  
 18744                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_DELETE - Internal DELETE call for MS-DOS
 18745                                  ;	NAME	DOS_DELETE
 18746                                  
 18747                                  ;
 18748                                  ;	Microsoft Confidential
 18749                                  ;	Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation 1991
 18750                                  ;	All Rights Reserved.
 18751                                  ;
 18752                                  
 18753                                  ;**	DELETE.ASM - Low level routine for deleting files
 18754                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18755                                  ;		DOS_DELETE
 18756                                  ;		REN_DEL_Check
 18757                                  ;		FastOpen_Delete	       ; DOS 3.3
 18758                                  ;		FastOpen_Update	       ; DOS 3.3
 18759                                  
 18760                                  ;   Revision history:
 18761                                  ;
 18762                                  ;   A000  version 4.00	Jan. 1988
 18763                                  ;   A001  Fastopen Rename fix	April 1989
 18764                                  
 18765                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 18766                                  
 18767                                  ;	i_need	NoSetDir,BYTE
 18768                                  ;	i_need	Creating,BYTE
 18769                                  ;	i_need	DELALL,BYTE
 18770                                  ;	i_need	THISDPB,DWORD
 18771                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 18772                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 18773                                  ;	i_need	CURBUF,DWORD
 18774                                  ;	i_need	ATTRIB,BYTE
 18775                                  ;	i_need	SATTRIB,BYTE
 18776                                  ;	i_need	WFP_START,WORD
 18777                                  ;	i_need	REN_WFP,WORD			 ;BN001
 18778                                  ;	i_need	NAME1,BYTE			 ;BN001
 18779                                  ;	i_need	FoundDel,BYTE
 18780                                  ;	i_need	AUXSTACK,BYTE
 18781                                  ;	i_need	VOLCHNG_FLAG,BYTE
 18782                                  ;	i_need	JShare,DWORD
 18783                                  ;	i_need	FastOpenTable,BYTE		  ; DOS 3.3
 18784                                  ;	i_need	FastTable,BYTE			  ; DOS 4.00
 18785                                  ;
 18786                                  ;	i_need	Del_ExtCluster,WORD		  ; DOS 4.00
 18787                                  ;
 18788                                  ;	i_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ; DOS 4.00
 18789                                  ;	i_need	DMAADD,DWORD
 18790                                  ;	i_need	RENAMEDMA,BYTE
 18791                                  
 18792                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18793                                  ;
 18794                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_DELETE
 18795                                  ;
 18796                                  ; Inputs:
 18797                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 18798                                  ;		terminated)
 18799                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 18800                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 18801                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 18802                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 18803                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 18804                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 18805                                  ; Function:
 18806                                  ;	Delete the specified file(s)
 18807                                  ; Outputs:
 18808                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 18809                                  ;		OK
 18810                                  ;	CARRY SET
 18811                                  ;	    AX is error code
 18812                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 18813                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 18814                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 18815                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 18816                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 18817                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 18818                                  ;		error_access_denied
 18819                                  ;			Attempt to delete device or directory
 18820                                  ;		***error_sharing_violation***
 18821                                  ;			Deny both access required, generates an INT 24.
 18822                                  ;			This error is NOT returned. The INT 24H is generated,
 18823                                  ;			  and the file is ignored (not deleted). Delete will
 18824                                  ;			  simply continue on looking for more files.
 18825                                  ;			  Carry will NOT be set in this case.
 18826                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 18827                                  ;
 18828                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18829                                  
 18830                                  FILEFOUND   equ 01h
 18831                                  FILEDELETED equ 10h
 18832                                  
 18833                                  	; 12/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 18834                                  	; DOSCODE:63E9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 18835                                  
 18836                                  	; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IBMDOS.COM)
 18837                                  	; DOSCODE:6B11h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 18838                                  
 18839                                  DOS_DELETE:
 18840                                  
 18841                                  ;hkn; DOS_Delete is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set up 
 18842                                  ;hkn; appropriately at this point.
 18843                                  
 18844 00002B60 E8C6EC                  	call	TestNet
 18845 00002B63 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_DELETE
 18846                                  
 18847                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 18848                                  ;	transfer NET_DELETE
 18849                                  ;ELSE
 18850                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) | 19
 18851                                  	;INT	2FH
 18852                                  	;return
 18853                                  
 18854 00002B65 B81311                  	mov	ax,1113h
 18855 00002B68 CD2F                    	int     2Fh 	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - DELETE REMOTE FILE
 18856                                  			; SS = DS = DOS CS, SDA first filename pointer -> 
 18857                                  			;		fully-qualified filename in DOS CS
 18858                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory structure for drive with file
 18859                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 18860 00002B6A C3                      	retn
 18861                                  ;ENDIF
 18862                                  
 18863                                  LOCAL_DELETE:
 18864 00002B6B C606[6F05]00            	MOV	byte [FOUNDDEL],0	; No files found and no files deleted
 18865 00002B70 E86FED                  	call	ECritDisk
 18866                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E500h
 18867 00002B73 C706[7E05]00E5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256+0 ; Assume not del *.*
 18868 00002B79 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 18869                                  SKPNUL:
 18870 00002B7D AC                      	LODSB
 18871 00002B7E 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 18872 00002B80 75FB                    	JNZ	short SKPNUL		; go to end
 18873 00002B82 83EE04                  	SUB	SI,4			; Back over possible "*.*"
 18874 00002B85 813C2A2E                	CMP	WORD [SI],2E2Ah ; "*."
 18875 00002B89 7506                    	JNZ	short TEST_QUEST
 18876 00002B8B 807C022A                	CMP	BYTE [SI+2],"*"
 18877 00002B8F 741F                    	JZ	short CHECK_ATTS
 18878                                  TEST_QUEST:
 18879 00002B91 83EE09                  	SUB	SI,9		; Back over possible "????????.???"
 18880 00002B94 87FE                    	XCHG	DI,SI
 18881                                  
 18882 00002B96 16                      	push	ss
 18883                                  	;pop	ds ; ! Retro DOS v3.0 BUG !
 18884 00002B97 07                      	pop	es ; 17/05/2019
 18885                                  
 18886 00002B98 B83F3F                  	MOV	AX,"??" ; 3F3Fh
 18887 00002B9B B90400                  	MOV	CX,4		; four sets of "??"
 18888 00002B9E F3AF                    	REPE	SCASW
 18889 00002BA0 751C                    	JNZ	short NOT_ALL
 18890 00002BA2 87FE                    	XCHG	DI,SI
 18891 00002BA4 AD                      	LODSW
 18892 00002BA5 3D2E3F                  	CMP	AX,3F2Eh ; ".?"
 18893 00002BA8 7514                    	JNZ	short NOT_ALL
 18894 00002BAA AD                      	LODSW
 18895 00002BAB 3D3F3F                  	CMP	AX,"??"
 18896 00002BAE 750E                    	JNZ	short NOT_ALL
 18897                                  CHECK_ATTS:
 18898 00002BB0 A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 18899                                  	;and	al,1Fh
 18900 00002BB3 241F                    	AND	AL,attr_hidden+attr_system+attr_directory+attr_volume_id+attr_read_only
 18901                                  					; Look only at hidden bits
 18902                                  	;cmp	al,1Fh
 18903 00002BB5 3C1F                    	CMP	AL,attr_hidden+attr_system+attr_directory+attr_volume_id+attr_read_only
 18904                                  					; All must be set
 18905 00002BB7 7505                    	JNZ	short NOT_ALL
 18906                                  
 18907                                  ; NOTE WARNING DANGER-----
 18908                                  ;    This DELALL stuff is not safe. It allows directories to be deleted.
 18909                                  ;	It should ONLY be used by FORMAT in the ROOT directory.
 18910                                  
 18911 00002BB9 C606[7F05]00            	MOV	byte [DELALL],0		; DEL *.* - flag deleting all
 18912                                  NOT_ALL:
 18913 00002BBE C606[4C03]01            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],1
 18914 00002BC3 E85A1F                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 18915 00002BC6 7312                    	JNC	short Del_found
 18916 00002BC8 750B                    	JNZ	short _bad_path
 18917 00002BCA 08C9                    	OR	CL,CL
 18918 00002BCC 7407                    	JZ	short _bad_path
 18919                                  No_file:
 18920 00002BCE B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found
 18921                                  ErrorReturn:
 18922 00002BD1 F9                      	STC
 18923                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 18924                                  	;retn
 18925                                  	; 18/12/2022
 18926 00002BD2 E93AED                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 18927                                  
 18928                                  _bad_path:
 18929 00002BD5 B80300                  	MOV	AX,error_path_not_found
 18930 00002BD8 EBF7                    	JMP	short ErrorReturn
 18931                                  
 18932                                  Del_found:
 18933 00002BDA 750C                    	JNZ	short NOT_DIR		; Check for dir specified
 18934 00002BDC 803E[7F05]00            	CMP	byte [DELALL],0		; DelAll = 0 allows delete of dir.
 18935 00002BE1 7405                    	JZ	short NOT_DIR
 18936                                  Del_access_err:
 18937 00002BE3 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied
 18938 00002BE6 EBE9                    	JMP	short ErrorReturn
 18939                                  
 18940                                  NOT_DIR:
 18941 00002BE8 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH			; Check if device name
 18942 00002BEA 78F7                    	JS	short Del_access_err	; Can't delete I/O devices
 18943                                  
 18944                                  ; Main delete loop. CURBUF+2:BX points to a matching directory entry.
 18945                                  
 18946                                  DELFILE:
 18947 00002BEC 800E[6F05]01            	OR	byte [FOUNDDEL],FILEFOUND ; file found, not deleted yet
 18948                                  
 18949                                  ; If we are deleting the Volume ID, then we set VOLUME_CHNG flag to make
 18950                                  ; DOS issue a build BPB call the next time this drive is accessed.
 18951                                  
 18952 00002BF1 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 18953 00002BF2 8A26[7F05]              	MOV	AH,[DELALL]
 18954 00002BF6 C53E[E205]              	LDS	DI,[CURBUF]
 18955                                  	
 18956                                  ;hkn; SS override
 18957 00002BFA 36F606[6B05]01          	TEST	byte [SS:ATTRIB],attr_read_only ; are we deleting RO files too?
 18958 00002C00 7509                    	JNZ	short DoDelete		; yes
 18959                                  
 18960 00002C02 F6470B01                	TEST	byte [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_read_only
 18961 00002C06 7403                    	JZ	short DoDelete		; not read only
 18962                                  
 18963                                  	; 30/01/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 18964                                  Skip_it:
 18965 00002C08 1F                      	POP	DS
 18966 00002C09 EB57                    	JMP	SHORT DELNXT		; Skip it (Note ES:BP not set)
 18967                                  
 18968                                  DoDelete:
 18969 00002C0B E8AF00                  	call	REN_DEL_Check		; Sets ES:BP = [THISDPB]
 18970                                  	;JNC	short DEL_SHARE_OK
 18971                                  	;POP	DS
 18972                                  	;JMP	SHORT DELNXT		; Skip it
 18973                                  	; 30/01/2024
 18974 00002C0E 72F8                    	jc	short Skip_it
 18975                                  
 18976                                  DEL_SHARE_OK:
 18977                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18978                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 18979                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 18980 00002C10 F6450540                	TEST	byte [DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 18981                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 18982 00002C14 7507                    	JNZ	short yesdirty		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 18983 00002C16 E8B93F                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 18984                                  	;or	byte [di+5],40h
 18985 00002C19 804D0540                	OR	byte [DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 18986                                  yesdirty:
 18987 00002C1D 8827                    	mov	[bx],ah 
 18988                                  	;MOV	[BX+dir_entry.dir_name],AH ; Put in E5H or 0
 18989                                  	;;;
 18990                                  	; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18991                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 18992 00002C1F 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 18993                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],bx
 18994 00002C21 26395E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],bx ; 0
 18995 00002C25 7503                    	jnz     short yesdirty_fc_1	;  not FAT32
 18996 00002C27 8B5CFA                  	mov     bx,[si-6]		;  high word of the first cluster (FAT32)
 18997                                  yesdirty_fc_1:
 18998                                  	;mov	[ss:CLUSTNUM_HW],bx 
 18999 00002C2A 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx ; * ; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19000                                  	;;;
 19001                                  
 19002 00002C2C 8B1C                    	MOV	BX,[SI] 		; Get firclus pointer
 19003 00002C2E 1F                      	POP	DS
 19004                                  	;;;
 19005 00002C2F 8916[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx ; * ; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19006                                  	;;;
 19007 00002C33 800E[6F05]10            	OR	byte [FOUNDDEL],FILEDELETED ; 10h ; Deleted file
 19008                                  
 19009                                  	; 30/01/2024
 19010                                  	;CMP	BX,2
 19011                                  	;JB	short DELNXT		; File has invalid FIRCLUS (too small)
 19012                                  	;;;
 19013                                  	; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19014                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19015                                  	;cmp	word [CLUSTNUM_HW],0
 19016 00002C38 21D2                    	and	dx,dx ; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19017 00002C3A 7505                    	jnz	short yesdirty_fc_2
 19018 00002C3C 83FB02                  	cmp	bx,2
 19019 00002C3F 7221                    	jb	short DELNXT		; File has invalid FIRCLUS (too small)
 19020                                  yesdirty_fc_2:
 19021                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+0Fh],0
 19022 00002C41 26837E0F00              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],0
 19023 00002C46 750C                    	jnz     short yesdirty_fc_3	; not FAT32
 19024                                  	;push	bx
 19025                                  	;mov	bx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 19026                                  	;;cmp	bx,[es:bp+2Fh]
 19027                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER+2]
 19028                                  	;30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19029                                  	;mov	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 19030                                  	; dx = [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; *
 19031 00002C48 263B562F                	cmp	dx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER+2]
 19032                                  	;pop	bx
 19033 00002C4C 750A                    	jne	short yesdirty_fc_4
 19034                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+2Dh]
 19035 00002C4E 263B5E2D                	cmp	bx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER]
 19036 00002C52 EB04                    	jmp     short yesdirty_fc_4
 19037                                  yesdirty_fc_3:
 19038                                  	;;;
 19039                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 19040 00002C54 263B5E0D                	CMP	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 19041                                  yesdirty_fc_4:	; 30/01/2024
 19042 00002C58 7708                    	JA	short DELNXT		; File has invalid FIRCLUS (too big)
 19043                                  
 19044 00002C5A E87B2F                  	call	RELEASE 		; Free file data
 19045 00002C5D 7258                    	JC	short No_fileJ
 19046                                  
 19047                                  ; DOS 3.3  FastOpen
 19048                                  
 19049 00002C5F E8D900                  	CALL	FastOpen_Delete 	; delete the dir info in fastopen
 19050                                  
 19051                                  ; DOS 3.3  FastOpen
 19052                                  
 19053                                  DELNXT:
 19054 00002C62 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		; Possible to get here without this set
 19055 00002C66 E83D1C                  	call	GETENTRY		; Registers need to be reset
 19056 00002C69 724C                    	JC	short No_fileJ
 19057 00002C6B E8341B                  	call	NEXTENT
 19058                                  	;JNC	short DELFILE
 19059                                  	; 30/01/2024
 19060 00002C6E 7203                    	jc	short DELNXT2
 19061 00002C70 E979FF                  	jmp	DELFILE
 19062                                  DELNXT2:
 19063 00002C73 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		; NEXTENT sets ES=DOSGROUP
 19064                                  	
 19065                                  	;;;
 19066                                  	; 30/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19067                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19068                                  	;
 19069 00002C77 E8EE07                  	call	update_fat32_fsinfo
 19070                                  	;;;
 19071                                  
 19072                                  	; 12/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 19073                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]
 19074                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 19075                                  	; 15/12/2022
 19076 00002C7A 268A4600                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP]
 19077 00002C7E E81F3E                  	call	FLUSHBUF
 19078 00002C81 7234                    	JC	short No_fileJ
 19079                                  ;
 19080                                  ; Now we need to test FoundDel for our flags. The cases to consider are:
 19081                                  ;
 19082                                  ;   not found not deleted		file not found
 19083                                  ;   not found	  deleted		*** impossible ***
 19084                                  ;	found not deleted		access denied (read-only)
 19085                                  ;	found	  deleted		no error
 19086                                  ;

 19126                                  ;Break	<REN_DEL_Check - check for access for rename and delete>
 19127                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19128                                  ; Procedure Name : REN_DEL_Check
 19129                                  ;
 19130                                  ; Inputs:
 19131                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 19132                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX points to entry
 19133                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:SI points to firclus field of entry
 19134                                  ;	[WFP_Start] points to name
 19135                                  ; Function:
 19136                                  ;	Check for Exclusive access on given file.
 19137                                  ;	  Used by RENAME, SET_FILE_INFO, and DELETE.
 19138                                  ; Outputs:
 19139                                  ;	ES:BP = [THISDPB]
 19140                                  ;	NOTE: The WFP string pointed to by [WFP_Start] Will be Modified. The
 19141                                  ;		last element will be loaded from the directory entry. This is
 19142                                  ;		so the name given to the sharer doesn't have any meta chars in
 19143                                  ;		it.
 19144                                  ;	Carry set if sharing violation, INT 24H generated
 19145                                  ;	    NOTE THAT AX IS NOT error_sharing_violation.
 19146                                  ;		This is because input AX is preserved.
 19147                                  ;		Caller must set the error if needed.
 19148                                  ;	Carry clear
 19149                                  ;		OK
 19150                                  ; AX,DS,BX,SI,DI preserved
 19151                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 19382                                  ;============================================================================
 19383                                  ; RENAME.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 19384                                  ;============================================================================
 19385                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 19386                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19387                                  
 19388                                  ;	TITLE	DOS_RENAME - Internal RENAME call for MS-DOS
 19389                                  ;	NAME	DOS_RENAME
 19390                                  
 19391                                  ;**	Low level routine for renaming files
 19392                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19393                                  ;	DOS_RENAME
 19394                                  ;
 19395                                  ;	Modification history:
 19396                                  ;
 19397                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 19398                                  
 19399                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19400                                  ;
 19401                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_RENAME
 19402                                  ;
 19403                                  ; Inputs:
 19404                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to SOURCE WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3
 19405                                  ;		chars, NUL terminated)
 19406                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string [SOURCE]
 19407                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 19408                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 19409                                  ;	[REN_WFP] Points to DEST WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3
 19410                                  ;		chars, NUL terminated)
 19411                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 19412                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 19413                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 19414                                  ; Function:
 19415                                  ;	Rename the specified file(s)
 19416                                  ;	NOTE: This routine uses most of AUXSTACK as a temp buffer.
 19417                                  ; Outputs:
 19418                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 19419                                  ;	    OK
 19420                                  ;	CARRY SET
 19421                                  ;	    AX is error code
 19422                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 19423                                  ;			No match for source, or dest path invalid
 19424                                  ;		error_not_same_device
 19425                                  ;			Source and dest are on different devices
 19426                                  ;		error_access_denied
 19427                                  ;			Directory specified (not simple rename),
 19428                                  ;			Device name given, Destination exists.
 19429                                  ;			NOTE: In third case some renames may have
 19430                                  ;			 been done if metas.
 19431                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 19432                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 19433                                  ;			SOURCE ONLY
 19434                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 19435                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 19436                                  ;			SOURCE ONLY
 19437                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 19438                                  ;			Deny both access required, generates an INT 24.
 19439                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 19440                                  ;
 19441                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19442                                  
 19443                                  	; 14/11/2022 Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 19444                                  	; 31/01/2024 Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19445                                  
 19446                                  DOS_RENAME:
 19447                                  
 19448                                  ;hkn; DOS_RENAME is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set up
 19449                                  ;hkn; at this point to DOSDATA.
 19450                                  
 19451 00002D73 E8B3EA                  	call	TestNet
 19452 00002D76 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_RENAME
 19453                                  
 19454                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 19455                                  ;	transfer NET_RENAME
 19456                                  ;ELSE
 19457                                  	;MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 17
 19458                                  	;INT	2FH
 19459                                  	;return
 19460                                  
 19461 00002D78 B81111                  	mov     ax, 1111h
 19462 00002D7B CD2F                    	int     2Fh 	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - RENAME REMOTE FILE
 19463                                  			; SS = DS = DOS CS, 
 19464                                  			; SDA first filename pointer = offset of fully-qualified old name
 19465                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 19466                                  			; Return: CF set on error
 19467 00002D7D C3                      	retn
 19468                                  ;ENDIF
 19469                                  
 19470                                  LOCAL_RENAME:
 19471 00002D7E C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk ; 2
 19472 00002D83 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 19473 00002D87 8B3E[B405]              	MOV	DI,[REN_WFP]
 19474 00002D8B 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 19475 00002D8D 8A25                    	MOV	AH,[DI]
 19476 00002D8F 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020H		; Lower case
 19477 00002D92 38E0                    	CMP	AL,AH
 19478 00002D94 7405                    	JZ	short SAMEDRV
 19479 00002D96 B81100                  	MOV	AX,error_not_same_device ; 11h
 19480 00002D99 F9                      	STC
 19481 00002D9A C3                      	retn
 19482                                  
 19483                                  SAMEDRV:
 19484 00002D9B FF36[2E03]              	PUSH	WORD [DMAADD+2]
 19485 00002D9F FF36[2C03]              	PUSH	WORD [DMAADD]
 19486 00002DA3 8C1E[2E03]              	MOV	[DMAADD+2],DS
 19487                                  
 19488                                  ;hkn; RENAMEDMA is in DOSDATA
 19489 00002DA7 C706[2C03][2006]        	MOV	WORD [DMAADD],RENAMEDMA
 19490 00002DAD C606[7005]00            	MOV	byte [FOUND_DEV],0	; Rename fails on DEVS, assume not a dev
 19491 00002DB2 E82DEB                  	call	ECritDisk
 19492 00002DB5 E86807                  	call	DOS_SEARCH_FIRST	; Sets [NoSetDir] to 1, [CURBUF+2]:BX
 19493                                  					;    points to entry
 19494 00002DB8 7314                    	JNC	short Check_Dev
 19495 00002DBA 83F812                  	CMP	AX,error_no_more_files ; 12h
 19496 00002DBD 7503                    	JNZ	short GOTERR
 19497 00002DBF B80200                  	MOV	AX,error_file_not_found ; 2
 19498                                  GOTERR:
 19499 00002DC2 F9                      	STC
 19500                                  RENAME_POP:
 19501 00002DC3 8F06[2C03]              	POP	WORD [DMAADD]
 19502 00002DC7 8F06[2E03]              	POP	WORD [DMAADD+2]
 19503                                  	;call	LCritDisk
 19504                                  	;retn
 19505                                  	; 16/12/2022
 19506 00002DCB E941EB                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 19507                                  
 19508                                  Check_Dev:
 19509                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19510                                  	;mov	ax,5
 19511 00002DCE B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied	; Assume error
 19512                                  	
 19513                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19514 00002DD1 1E                      	PUSH	DS			      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19515 00002DD2 C536[2C03]              	LDS	SI,[DMAADD]		      ;PTM.  check if source a dir  ;AN000;
 19516                                  	;add	si,21
 19517 00002DD6 83C615                  	ADD	SI,find_buf.attr	      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19518                                  	;test	byte [si+11],10h
 19519 00002DD9 F6440B10                	TEST	byte [SI+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_directory ;PTM.	    ;AN000;
 19520 00002DDD 7407                    	JZ	short notdir		      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19521 00002DDF 8B36[B405]              	MOV	SI,[REN_WFP]		      ;PTM.  if yes, make sure path ;AN000;
 19522 00002DE3 E86FFA                  	call	Check_PathLen2		      ;PTM.   length < 67	    ;AN000;
 19523                                  notdir:
 19524 00002DE6 1F                      	POP	DS			      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19525 00002DE7 77D9                    	JA	short GOTERR		      ;PTM.			    ;AN000;
 19526                                  
 19527                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 19528 00002DE9 803E[7005]00            	CMP	byte [FOUND_DEV],0
 19529 00002DEE 75D2                    	JNZ	short GOTERR
 19530                                  
 19531                                  ; At this point a source has been found. There is search continuation info (a
 19532                                  ; la DOS_SEARCH_NEXT) for the source at RENAMEDMA, together with the first
 19533                                  ; directory entry found.
 19534                                  ; [THISCDS], [THISDPB], and [THISDRV] are set and will remain correct
 19535                                  ; throughout the RENAME since it is known at this point that the source and
 19536                                  ; destination are both on the same device.
 19537                                  ; [SATTRIB] is also set.
 19538                                  
 19539 00002DF0 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 19540                                  	;add	si,26
 19541 00002DF2 83C61A                  	ADD	SI,dir_entry.dir_first
 19542 00002DF5 E8C5FE                  	call	REN_DEL_Check
 19543 00002DF8 7305                    	JNC	short REN_OK1
 19544 00002DFA B82000                  	MOV	AX,error_sharing_violation  ; 20h
 19545 00002DFD EBC4                    	JMP	short RENAME_POP
 19546                                  
 19547                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19548                                  ; Check if the source is a file or directory. If file, delete the entry
 19549                                  ; from the Fastopen cache. If directory, rename it later

 19984                                  ;Function: replace ? chars of raw string with chars in source string and
 19985                                  ;	   put in destination string
 19986                                  ;Output: ES:DI-> new string
 19987                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19988                                  
 19989                                  NEW_RENAME:
 19990                                  	; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 19991                                  NEWNAM:
 19992                                  	; DOSCODE:680Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 19993 00002FB3 AC                      	LODSB
 19994 00002FB4 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,"?" ; 3Fh
 19995 00002FB6 7502                    	JNZ	short NOCHG
 19996 00002FB8 8A07                    	MOV	AL,[BX] 		; Get replace char
 19997                                  NOCHG:
 19998 00002FBA AA                      	STOSB
 19999 00002FBB 43                      	INC	BX			; Next replace char
 20000 00002FBC E2F5                    	LOOP	NEWNAM
 20001                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20002                                  gs_ret_label:	; 18/12/2022
 20003 00002FBE C3                      	retn

 20011                                  ;**	Low level routines for returning file information and setting file
 20012                                  ;	attributes
 20013                                  ;
 20014                                  ;	GET_FILE_INFO
 20015                                  ;	SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE
 20016                                  ;
 20017                                  ;	Modification history:
 20018                                  ;
 20019                                  ;	    Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 20020                                  ;
 20021                                  ;	M025: Return access_denied if attempting to set
 20022                                  ;	      attribute of root directory.
 20023                                  ;
 20024                                  
 20025                                  ;SUBTTL GET_FILE_INFO -- Get File Information
 20026                                  
 20027                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20028                                  ; Procedure Name : GET_FILE_INFO
 20029                                  ;
 20030                                  ; Inputs:
 20031                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20032                                  ;		terminated)
 20033                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20034                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20035                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20036                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20037                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20038                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20039                                  ; Function:
 20040                                  ;	Get Information about a file
 20041                                  ; Returns:
 20042                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20043                                  ;	    AX = Attribute of file
 20044                                  ;	    CX = Time stamp of file
 20045                                  ;	    DX = Date stamp of file
 20046                                  ;	    BX:DI = Size of file (32 bit)
 20047                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20048                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20049                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 20050                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 20051                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20052                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20053                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20054                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20055                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20056                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20057                                  
 20058                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20059                                  
 20060                                  GET_FILE_INFO:
 20061                                  
 20062                                  ;hkn; get_file_info is called from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS has been set 
 20063                                  ;hkn; to DOSDATA at this point. So DOSassume is OK.
 20064                                  
 20065 00002FBF E867E8                  	call	TestNet
 20066 00002FC2 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_INFO
 20067                                  
 20068                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20069                                  ;	transfer NET_GET_FILE_INFO
 20070                                  ;ELSE
 20071                                  ;	MOV	AX,(MultNET SHL 8) OR 15
 20072                                  ;	INT	2FH
 20073                                  ;	return
 20074                                  
 20075 00002FC4 B80F11                  	mov     ax, 110Fh
 20076 00002FC7 CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - GET REMOTE FILE'S ATTRIBUTES
 20077                                  			; SS = DOS CS, SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified name of file
 20078                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 20079                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = file attributes
 20080 00002FC9 C3                      	retn
 20081                                  ;ENDIF

 20088                                  	; MSDOS 6.0

 20113                                  
 20114                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20115                                  ;SR;
 20116                                  ; If root dir then CurBuf == -1. Check for this case and return subdir attr
 20117                                  ;for a root dir
 20118

 20120 00002FF2 7506                    	jne	short not_root		;no, CurBuf ptr is valid
 20121                                  
 20122 00002FF4 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah
 20123 00002FF6 B010                    	mov	al,attr_directory ; 10h
 20124                                  	;clc

 20126                                  	; (DOSCODE:683Eh)
 20127                                  	; 16/12/2022

 20129 00002FF8 EBE7                    	jmp	short JustRet
 20130                                  
 20131                                  not_root:
 20132                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 20133 00002FFA 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 20134 00002FFB 8E1E[E405]              	MOV	DS,[CURBUF+2]
 20135 00002FFF 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 20136 00003001 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX			; Assume size=0 (dir)
 20137 00003003 89DF                    	MOV	DI,BX
 20138                                  	;mov	cx,[si+16h]
 20139 00003005 8B4C16                  	MOV	CX,[SI+dir_entry.dir_time]
 20140                                  	;mov	dx,[si+18h]
 20141 00003008 8B5418                  	MOV	DX,[SI+dir_entry.dir_date]

 20145                                  	;test	al,10h

 20147 00003012 7506                    	JNZ	short NO_SIZE

 20154                                  	;CLC
 20155                                  	; 14/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 20156                                  	; (DOSCODE:6864h)
 20157                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20158                                  	;clc
 20159 0000301B EBC4                    	jmp	short JustRet

 20161                                  ;Break	<SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE -- Set File Attribute>
 20162                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20163                                  ; Procedure Name : SET_FILE_ATTRIBUTE
 20164                                  ; Inputs:
 20165                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20166                                  ;		terminated)
 20167                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20168                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20169                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)

 20171                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))

 20173                                  ;	AX is new attributes to give to file
 20174                                  ; Function:
 20175                                  ;	Set File Attributes
 20176                                  ; Returns:
 20177                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20178                                  ;	    No error
 20179                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20180                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20181                                  ;		error_file_not_found
 20182                                  ;			Last element of path not found
 20183                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20184                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20185                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20186                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20187                                  ;		error_access_denied

 20189                                  ;			(attr_directory, attr_volume_ID)
 20190                                  ;		error_sharing_violation
 20191                                  ;			Sharing mode of file did not allow the change
 20192                                  ;			(this request requires exclusive write/read access)
 20193                                  ;			(INT 24H generated)
 20194                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed

 20337                                  ; DUP.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 20338                                  ;============================================================================
 20339                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 20340                                  ; 17/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20341                                  
 20342                                  ;** 	Low level DUP routine for use by EXEC when creating a new process.
 20343                                  ;   	Exports the DUP to the server machine and increments the SFT ref count
 20344                                  ;
 20345                                  ;	DOS_DUP
 20346                                  ;
 20347                                  ;	Modification history:
 20348                                  ;
 20349                                  ;	  Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 20350                                  
 20351                                  ;BREAK <DOS_DUP -- DUP SFT across network>
 20352                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20353                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_DUP
 20354                                  ;
 20355                                  ; Inputs:
 20356                                  ;	[THISSFT] set to the SFT for the file being DUPed
 20357                                  ;		(a non net SFT is OK, in this case the ref
 20358                                  ;		 count is simply incremented)
 20359                                  ; Function:
 20360                                  ;	Signal to the devices that a logical open is occurring
 20361                                  ; Returns:
 20362                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 20363                                  ;    Carry clear
 20364                                  ;	SFT ref_count is incremented
 20365                                  ; Registers modified: None.
 20366                                  ; NOTE:
 20367                                  ;	This routine is called from $CREATE_PROCESS_DATA_BLOCK at DOSINIT
 20368                                  ;	time with SS NOT DOSGROUP. There will be no Network handles at
 20369                                  ;	that time.
 20370                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20371                                  
 20372                                  DOS_DUP:
 20373                                  	;LES	DI,[CS:THISSFT]  ; MSDOS 3.3
 20374                                  
 20375                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20376 000030B0 2E8E06[0700]            	mov	es,[cs:DosDSeg]
 20377 000030B5 26C43E[9E05]            	les	di,[es:THISSFT]
 20378                                  
 20379                                  	;Entry	Dos_Dup_Direct
 20380                                  DOS_Dup_Direct:
 20381 000030BA E885E7                  	call	IsSFTNet
 20382 000030BD 7503                    	JNZ	short DO_INC
 20383 000030BF E85A21                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT
 20384                                  DO_INC:
 20385                                  	;INC	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 20386 000030C2 26FF05                  	inc	word [ES:DI]		; Clears carry (if this ever wraps
 20387                                  					;   we're in big trouble anyway)
 20388 000030C5 C3                      	retn
 20389                                  
 20390                                  ;============================================================================
 20391                                  ; CREATE.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 20392                                  ;============================================================================
 20393                                  ; 08/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 20394                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20395                                  
 20396                                  ;TITLE	DOS_CREATE/DOS_CREATE_NEW - Internal CREATE calls for MS-DOS
 20397                                  ;NAME	DOS_CREATE
 20398                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20399                                  ;**	Internal Create and Create new to create a local or NET file and SFT.
 20400                                  ;
 20401                                  ;	DOS_CREATE
 20402                                  ;	DOS_CREATE_NEW
 20403                                  ;	SET_MKND_ERR
 20404                                  ;	SET_Media_ID
 20405                                  ;	SET_EXT_Mode
 20406                                  ;
 20407                                  ;	Revision history:
 20408                                  ;
 20409                                  ;	    A000 version 4.00	  Jan. 1988
 20410                                  ;	    A001  D490 -- Change IOCTL subfunctios from 63h,43h to 66h, 46h
 20411                                  
 20412                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 20413                                  
 20414                                  ;	i_need	THISSFT,DWORD
 20415                                  ;	i_need	THISCDS,DWORD
 20416                                  ;	I_need	EXTERR,WORD
 20417                                  ;	I_Need	ExtErr_locus,BYTE
 20418                                  ;	I_need	JShare,DWORD
 20419                                  ;	I_need	VOLCHNG_FLAG,BYTE
 20420                                  ;	I_need	SATTRIB,BYTE
 20421                                  ;	I_need	CALLVIDM,DWORD
 20422                                  ;	I_need	EXTOPEN_ON,BYTE 		  ;AN000; extended open
 20423                                  ;	I_need	NAME1,BYTE			  ;AN000;
 20424                                  ;	I_need	NO_NAME_ID,BYTE 		  ;AN000;
 20425                                  ;	I_need	Packet_Temp,WORD		  ;AN000;
 20426                                  ;	I_need	DOS34_FLAG,WORD 		  ;AN000;
 20427                                  ;	I_need	SAVE_BX,WORD			  ;AN000;
 20428                                  
 20429                                  ;***	DOS_CREATE - Create a File
 20430                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20431                                  ;	DOS_Create is called to create the specified file, truncating
 20432                                  ;	the old one if it exists.
 20433                                  ;
 20434                                  ;	ENTRY	AX is Attribute to create
 20435                                  ;		(ds) = DOSDATA
 20436                                  ;		[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20437                                  ;			terminated)
 20438                                  ;		[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20439                                  ;			( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20440                                  ;			 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20441                                  ;		[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20442                                  ;			(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20443                                  ;		[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 20444                                  ;			(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20445                                  ;		[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20446                                  ;
 20447                                  ;	EXIT	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20448                                  ;		CARRY CLEAR
 20449                                  ;		    THISSFT filled in.
 20450                                  ;			sf_mode = unchanged for FCB, sharing_compat + open_for_both
 20451                                  ;		CARRY SET
 20452                                  ;		    AX is error code
 20453                                  ;			error_path_not_found
 20454                                  ;				Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20455                                  ;			error_bad_curr_dir
 20456                                  ;				Bad path in current directory part of path
 20457                                  ;			error_access_denied
 20458                                  ;				Attempt to re-create read only file , or
 20459                                  ;				create a second volume id or create a dir
 20460                                  ;			error_sharing_violation
 20461                                  ;				The sharing mode was correct but not allowed
 20462                                  ;				generates an INT 24
 20463                                  ;	USES	all but DS
 20464                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20465                                  
 20466                                  	; 14/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20467                                  	; DOSCODE:6920h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 20468                                  
 20469                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20470                                  	; DOSCODE:708Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 20471                                  
 20472                                  DOS_CREATE:
 20473                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20474                                  	; DOSCODE:6934h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20475                                  
 20476                                  ;hkn; dispatched to from file.asm and fcbio.asm. DS set up to DOSDATA at 
 20477                                  ;hkn; this point.
 20478

 20663 00003150 52                      	DB	error_cannot_make	; MakeNode error 2
 20664 00003151 50                      	DB	error_file_exists	; MakeNode error 3
 20665 00003152 03                      	DB	error_path_not_found	; MakeNode error 4

 20674                                  ; files. We must inform the sharer to slash all the open SFT's for this

 20715                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20716                                  ; Procedure Name : Dos_Create_New
 20717                                  ;
 20718                                  ; Inputs:
 20719                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20720                                  ;		terminated)
 20721                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20722                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20723                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20724                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20725                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20726                                  ;	[THISSFT] Points to SFT to fill in if file created
 20727                                  ;		(sf_mode field set so that FCB may be detected)
 20728                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 20729                                  ;	AX is Attribute to create
 20730                                  ; Function:
 20731                                  ;	Try to create the specified file truncating an old one that exists
 20732                                  ; Outputs:
 20733                                  ;	sf_ref_count is NOT altered
 20734                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20735                                  ;	    THISSFT filled in.
 20736                                  ;		sf_mode = sharing_compat + open_for_both for Non-FCB SFT
 20737                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20738                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20739                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20740                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20741                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20742                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20743                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20744                                  ;			Create a second volume id or create a dir
 20745                                  ;		error_file_exists
 20746                                  ;			Already a file by this name
 20747                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 20748                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20749                                  
 20750                                  DOS_Create_New:
 20751 0000318D B401                    	MOV	AH,1		; Truncate is NOT OK
 20752 0000318F E936FF                  	JMP	Create_inter
 20753                                  
 20754                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 20755                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20756                                  ; Procedure Name : Set_Media_ID
 20757                                  ;
 20758                                  ; Inputs:
 20759                                  ;	NAME1= Volume ID
 20760                                  ;	BH= 0, delete volume id
 20761                                  ;	    1, set new volume id
 20762                                  ;	DS= DOSGROUP
 20763                                  ; Function:
 20764                                  ;	Set Volume ID to DOS 4.00 Boot record.
 20765                                  ; Outputs:
 20766                                  ;	CARRY CLEAR
 20767                                  ;	    volume id set
 20768                                  ;	CARRY SET
 20769                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20770                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20771                                  
 20772                                  	; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20773                                  	; 01/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 20774                                  Set_Media_ID:
 20775 00003192 50                      	PUSH	AX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20776 00003193 06                      	PUSH	ES		;AN000;;>32mb
 20777 00003194 57                      	PUSH	DI		;AN000;;>32mb
 20778                                  
 20779 00003195 FEC4                    	INC	AH		;AN000;;>32mb  bl=drive #
 20780 00003197 88E3                    	MOV	BL,AH		;AN000;;>32mb  bl=drive # (A=1,B=2,,,)
 20781 00003199 B00D                    	MOV	AL,0DH		;AN000;;>32mb  generic IOCTL
 20782                                  	;MOV	CX,0866H	;AN001;;>32mb  get media id
 20783                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20784                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 20785 0000319B B96648                  	mov	cx,4866h	; ch = FAT32 disk drive (CATEGORY CODE)
 20786                                  				; cl = minor code,
 20787                                  				;      get volume serial number (and name)
 20788                                  
 20789                                  ;hkn; PACKET_TEMP is in DOSDATA
 20790 0000319E BA[A00D]                	MOV	DX,Packet_Temp	;AN000;>32mb
 20791                                  
 20792                                  Set_Media_ID_1:
 20793                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20794 000031A1 51                      	push	cx
 20795                                  
 20796 000031A2 53                      	PUSH	BX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20797 000031A3 52                      	PUSH	DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20798 000031A4 30FF                    	XOR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb
 20799                                  
 20800                                  	;invoke	$IOCTL		;AN000;;>32mb
 20801 000031A6 E8DCF6                  	call	_$IOCTL	
 20802                                  
 20803 000031A9 5A                      	POP	DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20804 000031AA 5B                      	POP	BX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20805                                  
 20806                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20807 000031AB 59                      	pop	cx
 20808                                  	;JC	short geterr	;AN000;;>32mb
 20809 000031AC 730A                    	jnc	short Set_Media_ID_2
 20810 000031AE 80FD48                  	cmp	ch,48h		; is it FAT32 disk drive request?
 20811 000031B1 F9                      	stc
 20812 000031B2 7529                    	jne	short geterr	; (ch=8 request failed!)
 20813 000031B4 B508                    	mov	ch,8		; set category code for (old) FAT disk drive
 20814                                  				; (except FAT32)
 20815 000031B6 EBE9                    	jmp     short Set_Media_ID_1 ; and try again
 20816                                  
 20817                                  Set_Media_ID_2:
 20818 000031B8 08FF                    	OR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb delete volume id
 20819 000031BA 7405                    	JZ	short NoName	;AN000;>32mb yes
 20820

 20822 000031BC BE[4B05]                	MOV	SI,NAME1	;AN000;>32mb
 20823                                  
 20824 000031BF EB03                    	JMP	SHORT doset	;AN000;>32mb yes
 20825                                  NoName: 			;AN000;
 20826                                  
 20827                                  ;hkn; NO_NAME_ID is in DOSDATA
 20828 000031C1 BE[C10D]                	MOV	SI,NO_NAME_ID	;AN000;>32mb
 20829                                  
 20830                                  doset:				;AN000;
 20831 000031C4 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20832                                  	;add	di,6
 20833 000031C6 83C706                  	ADD	DI,MEDIA_ID_INFO.MEDIA_Label ;AN000;;>32mb
 20834                                  
 20835                                  ;hkn; ES & DS must point to SS
 20836                                  ;hkn;	PUSH	CS		;AN000;;>32mb  move new volume id to packet
 20837 000031C9 16                      	PUSH	SS		;AN000;;>32mb  move new volume id to packet
 20838                                  
 20839 000031CA 1F                      	POP	DS		;AN000;;>32mb
 20840                                  
 20841                                  ;hkn;	PUSH	CS		;AN000;;>32mb
 20842 000031CB 16                      	PUSH	SS		;AN000;;>32mb
 20843                                  
 20844 000031CC 07                      	POP	ES		;AN000;;>32mb
 20845                                  
 20846                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20847 000031CD 51                      	push	cx
 20848                                  
 20849 000031CE B90B00                  	MOV	CX,11		;AN000;;>32mb
 20850 000031D1 F3A4                    	REP	MOVSB		;AN000;;>32mb
 20851                                  
 20852                                  	;MOV	CX,0846H	;AN001;;>32mb
 20853                                  	; 01/02/2024
 20854 000031D3 59                      	pop	cx
 20855 000031D4 B146                    	mov	cl,46h		; set volume serial number (and name)
 20856                                  	;

 20858 000031D8 30FF                    	XOR	BH,BH		;AN000;;>32mb
 20859                                  	;invoke	$IOCTL		;AN000;;>32mb  set volume id
 20860 000031DA E8A8F6                  	call	_$IOCTL	
 20861                                  geterr: 			;AN000;
 20862                                  ;hkn;	PUSH	CS		;AN000;>32mb
 20863 000031DD 16                      	PUSH	SS		;AN000;>32mb
 20864                                  
 20865 000031DE 1F                      	POP	DS		;AN000;>32mb   ds= dosgroup
 20866

 20868 000031E0 07                      	POP	ES		;AN000;;>32mb
 20869 000031E1 58                      	POP	AX		;AN000;;>32mb
 20870 000031E2 C3                      	retn			;AN000;>32mb

 20872                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 20873                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20874                                  ; Procedure Name : Set_EXT_mode
 20875                                  ;
 20876                                  ; Inputs:
 20877                                  ;	[EXTOPEN_ON]= flag for extended open
 20878                                  ;	SAVE_BX= mode specified in Extended Open
 20879                                  ; Function:
 20880                                  ;	Set mode in ThisSFT
 20881                                  ; Outputs:
 20882                                  ;	carry set,mode is set if from Extended Open
 20883                                  ;	carry clear, mode not set yet
 20884                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20885

 20887                                  
 20888                                  Set_EXT_mode:
 20889                                  
 20890                                  ;hkn; SS override
 20891 000031E3 36F606[F605]01          	TEST	byte [ss:EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ;AN000;EO. from extended open
 20892 000031E9 740B                    	JZ	short NOTEX		    ;AN000;EO. no, do normal
 20893 000031EB 50                      	PUSH	AX			    ;AN000;EO.
 20894                                  
 20895                                  ;hkn; SS override
 20896 000031EC 36A1[0106]              	MOV	AX,[ss:SAVE_BX]		    ;AN000;EO.
 20897                                  	;or	[es:di+2],ax
 20898 000031F0 26094502                	OR	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode],AX ;AN000;EO.
 20899 000031F4 58                      	POP	AX			    ;AN000;EO.
 20900 000031F5 F9                      	STC				    ;AN000;EO.
 20901                                  NOTEX:					    ;AN000;
 20902 000031F6 C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;EO.
