 25490                                  
 25491                                  ;	TITLE	DISK2 - Disk utility routines
 25492                                  ;	NAME	Disk2
 25493                                  
 25494                                  ;**	Low level Read and write routines for local SFT I/O on files and devs
 25495                                  ;
 25496                                  ;	DskRead
 25497                                  ;	DWRITE
 25498                                  ;	DSKWRITE
 25499                                  ;	HarderrRW
 25500                                  ;	SETUP
 25501                                  ;	BREAKDOWN
 25502                                  ;	READ_LOCK_VIOLATION
 25503                                  ;	WRITE_LOCK_VIOLATION
 25504                                  ;	DISKREAD
 25505                                  ;	SET_ACC_ERR_DS
 25506                                  ;	SET_ACC_ERR
 25507                                  ;	SETSFT
 25508                                  ;	SETCLUS
 25509                                  ;	AddRec
 25510                                  ;
 25511                                  ;	Revision history:
 25512                                  ;
 25513                                  ;		AN000 version 4.00 Jan. 1988
 25514                                  ;		M039 DB 10/17/90 - Disk read/write optimization
 25515                                  
 25516                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25517                                  ; DOSCODE:7699h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25518                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25519                                  ; DOSCODE:7685h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25520                                  
 25521                                  ;Break	<DSKREAD -- PHYSICAL DISK READ>
 25522                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25523                                  ;
 25524                                  ; Procedure Name : DSKREAD
 25525                                  ;
 25526                                  ; Inputs:
 25527                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer addr
 25528                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25529                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25530                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25531                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25532                                  ; Function:
 25533                                  ;	Call BIOS to perform disk read
 25534                                  ; Outputs:
 25535                                  ;	DI = CX on entry
 25536                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors unsuccessfully transfered
 25537                                  ;	AX = Status word as returned by BIOS (error code in AL if error)
 25538                                  ;	Zero set if OK (from BIOS) (carry clear)
 25539                                  ;	Zero clear if error (carry clear)
 25540                                  ; SI Destroyed, others preserved
 25541                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25542                                  
 25543                                  DSKREAD:
 25544 00004044 51                      	PUSH	CX
 25545                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; 04/05/2019
 25546 00004045 268A6617                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 25547                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+1]
 25548 00004049 268A4601                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 25549 0000404D 53                      	PUSH	BX
 25550 0000404E 06                      	PUSH	ES
 25551 0000404F E8CC12                  	call	SETREAD
 25552 00004052 EB22                    	JMP	short DODSKOP
 25553                                  
 25554                                  ;Break	<DWRITE -- SEE ABOUT WRITING>
 25555                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25556                                  ;
 25557                                  ; Procedure Name : DWRITE
 25558                                  ;
 25559                                  ; Inputs:
 25560                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer address
 25561                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25562                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25563                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25564                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25565                                  ;	[ALLOWED] must be set in case HARDERR called
 25566                                  ; Function:
 25567                                  ;	Calls BIOS to perform disk write. If BIOS reports
 25568                                  ;	errors, will call HARDERRRW for further action.
 25569                                  ; Output:
 25570                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently, user FAILed to I 24)
 25571                                  ; BP preserved. All other registers destroyed.
 25572                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25573                                  
 25574                                  	;entry	DWRITE
 25575                                  DWRITE:
 25576 00004054 E81100                  	CALL	DSKWRITE
 25577 00004057 74EA                    	jz	short dw_ret_label	; Carry clear (retz)
 25578                                  
 25579                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25580 00004059 36C606[7505]01          	MOV	BYTE [SS:READOP],1	; Write
 25581 0000405F E83500                  	call	HARDERRRW
 25582 00004062 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1			; Check for retry
 25583 00004064 74EE                    	JZ	short DWRITE
 25584                                  
 25585                                  ; 09/02/2024
 25586                                  %if 0
 25587                                  	CMP	AL,3			; Check for FAIL
 25588                                  	CLC
 25589                                  	JNZ	short NO_CAR2 		; Ignore
 25590                                  	STC
 25591                                  NO_CAR2:
 25592                                  dw_ret_label:
 25593                                  	retn
 25594                                  %else
 25595                                  	; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 25596 00004066 EB99                    	jmp	short fail_ignore
 25597                                  %endif
 25598                                  
 25599                                  ;Break	<DSKWRITE -- PHYSICAL DISK WRITE>
 25600                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25601                                  ;
 25602                                  ; Procedure Name : DSKWRITE
 25603                                  ;
 25604                                  ; Inputs:
 25605                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer addr
 25606                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 25607                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 25608                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 25609                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25610                                  ; Function:
 25611                                  ;	Call BIOS to perform disk read
 25612                                  ; Outputs:
 25613                                  ;	DI = CX on entry
 25614                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors unsuccessfully transfered
 25615                                  ;	AX = Status word as returned by BIOS (error code in AL if error)
 25616                                  ;	Zero set if OK (from BIOS) (carry clear)
 25617                                  ;	Zero clear if error (carry clear)
 25618                                  ; SI Destroyed, others preserved
 25619                                  ;
 25620                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25621                                  
 25622                                  	;entry	DSKWRITE
 25623                                  DSKWRITE:
 25624 00004068 51                      	PUSH	CX
 25625                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; 04/05/2019
 25626 00004069 268A6617                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 25627                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+1]
 25628 0000406D 268A4601                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 25629 00004071 53                      	PUSH	BX
 25630 00004072 06                      	PUSH	ES
 25631 00004073 E8DB12                  	call	SETWRITE
 25632                                  DODSKOP:
 25633 00004076 8CD9                    	MOV	CX,DS		; Save DS
 25634 00004078 1F                      	POP	DS		; DS:BP points to DPB
 25635 00004079 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 25636                                  
 25637                                  	;lds	si,[ds:bp+13h] ; 04/05/2019
 25638 0000407A 3EC57613                	LDS	SI,[ds:BP+DPB.DRIVER_ADDR] ; 07/09/2018
 25639 0000407E E81C12                  	call	DEVIOCALL2
 25640                                  
 25641 00004081 8ED9                    	MOV	DS,CX		; Restore DS
 25642 00004083 07                      	POP	ES		; Restore ES
 25643 00004084 5B                      	POP	BX
 25644                                  
 25645                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25646 00004085 368B0E[6C03]            	MOV	CX,[SS:CALLSCNT] ; Number of sectors transferred
 25647 0000408A 5F                      	POP	DI
 25648 0000408B 29F9                    	SUB	CX,DI
 25649 0000408D F7D9                    	NEG	CX		; Number of sectors not transferred
 25650                                  
 25651                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25652 0000408F 36A1[5D03]              	MOV	AX,[SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT]
 25653                                  	;test	ax,8000h
 25654                                  	; 17/12/2022
 25655                                  	;test	ah,80h
 25656 00004093 F6C480                  	test	ah,(STERR>>8)
 25657                                  	;test	AX,STERR
 25658 00004096 C3                      	retn
 25659                                  
 25660                                  ;Break	<HardErrRW - map extended errors and call harderr>
 25661                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25662                                  ;
 25663                                  ; Procedure Name : HardErrRW
 25664                                  ;
 25665                                  ; Inputs:
 25666                                  ;	AX is error code from read or write
 25667                                  ;	Other registers set as per HARDERR
 25668                                  ; Function:
 25669                                  ;	Checks the error code for special extended
 25670                                  ;	errors and maps them if needed. Then invokes
 25671                                  ;	Harderr
 25672                                  ; Outputs:
 25673                                  ;	Of HARDERR
 25674                                  ; AX may be modified prior to call to HARDERR.
 25675                                  ; No other registers altered.
 25676                                  ;
 25677                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25678                                  
 25679                                  	; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25680                                  HARDERRRW:
 25681                                  	;cmp	al,0Fh
 25682 00004097 3C0F                    	CMP	AL,error_I24_wrong_disk
 25683 00004099 7512                    	JNZ	short DO_ERR			; Nothing to do
 25684                                  
 25685                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 25686                                  	;push	ds
 25687                                  	;push	si
 25688                                  	;lds	si,[ss:CALLVIDRW]
 25689                                  	;mov	[ss:EXTERRPT+2], ds
 25690                                  	;mov	[ss:EXTERRPT], si
 25691                                  	;pop	si
 25692                                  	;pop	ds
 25693                                  
 25694                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 25695 0000409B 50                      	push	ax
 25696 0000409C 36A1[7003]              	mov	ax,[SS:CALLVIDRW]		; get ptr lo  ;smr;SS Override
 25697 000040A0 36A3[2803]              	mov	[ss:EXTERRPT],ax		; set ext err ptr lo
 25698 000040A4 36A1[7203]              	mov	ax,[SS:CALLVIDRW+2]		; get ptr hi from dev
 25699 000040A8 36A3[2A03]              	mov	[ss:EXTERRPT+2],ax		; set ext err ptr hi
 25700 000040AC 58                      	pop	ax
 25701                                  DO_ERR:
 25702                                  	;;call	HARDERR
 25703                                  	;;retn
 25704                                  	; 16/12/2022
 25705                                  	; 10/06/2019
 25706 000040AD E9AC1F                  	jmp	HARDERR	
 25707                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 25708                                  	;call	HARDERR
 25709                                  	;retn
 25710                                  
 25711                                  ; 24/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 25712                                  
 25713                                  ;Break	<SETUP -- SETUP A DISK READ OR WRITE FROM USER>
 25714                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25715                                  ;
 25716                                  ; Procedure Name : SETUP
 25717                                  ;
 25718                                  ; Inputs:
 25719                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT (value also in THISSFT)
 25720                                  ;	DMAAdd contains transfer address
 25721                                  ;	CX = Byte count
 25722                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 25723                                  ;   WARNING Stack must be clean, two ret addrs on stack, 1st of caller,
 25724                                  ;		2nd of caller of caller.
 25725                                  ; Outputs:
 25726                                  ;	    CX = byte count
 25727                                  ;	    [THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters if file
 25728                                  ;		      = Pointer to device header if device or NET
 25729                                  ;	    ES:DI Points to SFT
 25730                                  ;	    [NEXTADD] = Displacement of disk transfer within segment
 25731                                  ;	    [TRANS] = 0 (No transfers yet)
 25732                                  ;	    BytPos = Byte position in file
 25733                                  ;
 25734                                  ;	The following fields are relevant to local files (not devices) only:
 25735                                  ;
 25736                                  ;	    SecPos = Position of first sector (local files only)
 25737                                  ;	    [BYTSECPOS] = Byte position in first sector (local files only)
 25738                                  ;	    [CLUSNUM] = First cluster (local files only)
 25739                                  ;	    [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector within first cluster (local files only)
 25740                                  ;	    [THISDRV] = Physical unit number (local files only)
 25741                                  ;
 25742                                  ;      RETURNS ONE LEVEL UP WITH:
 25743                                  ;	   CX = 0
 25744                                  ;	   CARRY = Clear
 25745                                  ;	IF AN ERROR IS DETECTED
 25746                                  ; All other registers destroyed
 25747                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 25894                                  ;Break	<BREAKDOWN -- CUT A USER READ OR WRITE INTO PIECES>
 25895                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25896                                  ;
 25897                                  ; Procedure Name : BREAKDOWN
 25898                                  ;
 25899                                  ; Inputs:
 25900                                  ;	CX = Length of disk transfer in bytes
 25901                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 25902                                  ;	[BYTSECPOS] = Byte position within first sector
 25903                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 25904                                  ; Outputs:
 25905                                  ;	[BYTCNT1] = Bytes to transfer in first sector
 25906                                  ;	[SECCNT] = No. of whole sectors to transfer
 25907                                  ;	[BYTCNT2] = Bytes to transfer in last sector
 25908                                  ; AX, BX, DX destroyed. No other registers affected.
 25909                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25910                                  
 25911                                  BREAKDOWN:

 25913 00004156 89CB                    	MOV	BX,CX

 25916                                  	;sub	ax,[es:bp+2]
 25917 0000415C 262B4602                	SUB	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]

 25919 00004162 29C3                    	SUB	BX,AX		; Subtract from total length
 25920 00004164 7304                    	JAE	short SAVFIR
 25921 00004166 01D8                    	ADD	AX,BX		; Don't use all of the rest of the sector
 25922 00004168 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX		; And no bytes are left
 25923                                  SAVFIR:

 25925 0000416D 89D8                    	MOV	AX,BX

 25939                                  _RET45:

 26390                                  ; Procedure Name : SETSFT
 26391                                  ; Inputs:

 26402                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 26473                                  ; 25/07/2018
 26474                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 26475                                  ;Break   <DskRdBufScan -- Disk Read Buffer Scan>
 26476                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26477                                  ;
 26478                                  ; Procedure Name : DskRdBufScan
 26479                                  ;
 26480                                  ; Inputs:
 26481                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors read. (These constitute a block of
 26482                                  ;            sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 26483                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 26484                                  ;       [TEMP_VAR2]:[TEMP_VAR] = Transfer address (destination data address).
 26485                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 26486                                  ;
 26487                                  ; Function:
 26488                                  ;	The Buffer Queue is scanned: the contents of any dirty buffers are
 26489                                  ;	"read" into the transfer memory block, so that the transfer memory
 26490                                  ;	reflects the most recent data.
 26491                                  ;
 26492                                  ; Outputs:
 26493                                  ;       Transfer memory updated as required.
 26494                                  ;
 26495                                  ; Uses:
 26496                                  ;       DS,AX,BX,CX,SI,DI destroyed.
 26497                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 26498                                  ;
 26499                                  ; Notes:
 26500                                  ;       FIRST_BUFF_ADDR is set-up to contain the LAST buffer to check, rather
 26501                                  ;	than the FIRST.
 26502                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26503                                  ;M039: Created
 26504                                  
 26505                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26506                                  ; DOSCODE:78F0h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26507                                  
 26508                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26509                                  ; DOSCODE:78DCh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26510                                  
 26511                                  ; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 26512                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:8313h
 26513                                  
 26514                                  ;procedure DskRdBufScan,NEAR
 26515                                  ;
 26516                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 26517                                  
 26518                                  DskRdBufScan:
 26519 000042D6 36833E[7100]00          	cmp	word [ss:DirtyBufferCount],0 ; Any dirty buffers?
 26520 000042DC 743C                    	je	short bufx		     ; -no, skip all work.
 26521                                  
 26522 000042DE 368B1E[0706]            	mov     bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 26523 000042E3 89DE                    	mov     si,bx
 26524 000042E5 01D1                    	add     cx,dx
 26525 000042E7 83D600                  	adc     si,0
 26526                                  
 26527 000042EA E8D725                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> 1st buf in queue.
 26528                                  	;mov	ax,[di+2]
 26529 000042ED 8B4502                  	mov     ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_prev]
 26530 000042F0 36A3[7E11]              	mov     [ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR],ax
 26531                                  		
 26532                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26533                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 26534                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 26535                                  	; 15/12/2022
 26536 000042F4 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 26537                                  
 26538                                  ;       BX:DX = Extent start.
 26539                                  ;       SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 26540                                  ;          AL = Drive #.
 26541                                  ;       DS:DI-> 1st buffer in queue.
 26542                                  ;[FIRST_BUFF_ADDR] = Address offset of last buffer in queue.
 26543                                  
 26544                                  bufq:	
 26545                                  	;cmp	al,[di+4]
 26546 000042F8 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 26547 000042FB 7514                    	jne	short bufq1        	;  -no, jump.
 26548                                  
 26549                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 26550                                  ;       ja	short bufq1		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 26551                                  
 26552                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 26553 000042FD 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 26554 00004300 7503                    	jne	short bufq01
 26555                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 26556 00004302 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 26557                                  bufq01:
 26558 00004305 770A                    	ja	short bufq1
 26559                                  
 26560                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 26561                                  ;       ja	short bufq2		;Jump if Extent end >= buffer sector.
 26562                                  
 26563                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 26564 00004307 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 26565 0000430A 7503                    	jne	short bufq02
 26566                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 26567 0000430C 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 26568                                  bufq02:
 26569 0000430F 770A                    	ja	short bufq2
 26570                                  bufq1:	
 26571 00004311 363B3E[7E11]            	cmp     di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 26572 00004316 8B3D                    	mov	di,[di]
 26573                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next] ; Set-up for next buffer.
 26574 00004318 75DE                    	jne	short bufq		; -no, do next buffer
 26575                                  bufx:
 26576 0000431A C3                      	retn				;Exit.
 26577                                  
 26578                                  ;       Buffer's sector is in Extent: if it is dirty, copy its contents to
 26579                                  ;	transfer memory; otherwise, just re-position it in the buffer queue
 26580                                  ;       as MRU (Most Recently Used).
 26581                                  
 26582                                  bufq2:	
 26583 0000431B 50                      	push	ax
 26584                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 26585 0000431C F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 26586 00004320 7430                    	jz	short bufq3                    ; -no, jump.
 26587                                  
 26588                                  ;       SaveReg <cx,dx,si,di,es>
 26589 00004322 51                      	push	cx
 26590 00004323 52                      	push	dx
 26591 00004324 56                      	push	si
 26592 00004325 57                      	push	di
 26593 00004326 06                      	push	es
 26594                                  
 26595 00004327 89D0                    	mov     ax,dx
 26596                                  	;sub	ax,[di+6]
 26597 00004329 2B4506                  	sub	ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 26598 0000432C F7D8                    	neg	ax
 26599                                  
 26600                                  ;       AX = offset (in sectors) of buffer sector within Transfer memory
 26601                                  ;            block. (Note: the upper word of the sector # may be ignored
 26602                                  ;	     since no more than 64k bytes will ever be read. This 64k limit
 26603                                  ;            is imposed by the input parameters of the disk read operation.)
 26604                                  
 26605                                  	;lea	si,[di+20]
 26606 0000432E 8D7518                  	lea	si,[di+BUFINSIZ]	;DS:SI -> buffer data.
 26607                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 26608 00004331 268B4E02                	mov     cx,[es:bp+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ;CX = sector size (in bytes).
 26609 00004335 F7E1                    	mul     cx			;AX = offset (in bytes) of buf. sector
 26610                                  	;mov	di,[ss:TEMP_VAR]
 26611                                  	; 09/02/2024
 26612 00004337 36C43E[0C06]            	les	di,[ss:TEMP_VAR]
 26613 0000433C 01C7                    	add	di,ax
 26614                                  	;mov	es,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]
 26615 0000433E D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 26616                                  
 26617                                  ;	   CX = sector size (in WORDs) ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 26618                                  ;       DS:SI-> Buffer sector data.
 26619                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 26620                                  
 26621                                  ; 09/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 26622                                  %if 0
 26623                                  	rep	movsw			;Copy buffer sector to Transfer memory
 26624                                  	;; 04/05/2019
 26625                                  	;;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 26626                                  	;;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 26627                                  	;jnc	short bufq03
 26628                                  	;movsb
 26629                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26630                                  	;adc	cx,0
 26631                                  	;rep	movsb
 26632                                  	; 22/09/2023
 26633                                  	jnc	short bufq03
 26634                                  	movsb
 26635                                  %else
 26636                                  	;;;
 26637                                  	; 09/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 26638 00004340 36803E[6A00]00          	cmp	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0
 26639                                  	;jz	short bufq03+1 ; rep movsw (skip 32bit prefix)
 26640                                  	; 06/04/2024 
 26641 00004346 7403                    	jz	short bufq03
 26642 00004348 D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 26643                                  ;bufq03:
 26644                                  	;rep	movsd
 26645                                  	; 06/04/2024
 26646 0000434A 66                      	db	66h	; 32bit prefix
 26647                                  bufq03:
 26648 0000434B F3A5                    	rep	movsw
 26649                                  	;;;
 26650                                  %endif
 26651                                  
 26652                                  ;bufq03:	; 09/02/2024
 26653                                  	;RestoreReg <es,di,si,dx,cx>
 26654 0000434D 07                      	pop	es
 26655 0000434E 5F                      	pop	di
 26656 0000434F 5E                      	pop	si
 26657 00004350 5A                      	pop	dx
 26658 00004351 59                      	pop	cx
 26659                                  
 26660                                  ;       DS:DI -> current buffer.
 26661                                  bufq3:	
 26662 00004352 89F8                    	mov     ax,di			;DS:AX -> Current buffer.
 26663                                          ;invoke SCANPLACE
 26664 00004354 E87F25                  	call	SCANPLACE
 26665 00004357 363B06[7E11]            	cmp	ax,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR] ;Last buffer?
 26666 0000435C 58                      	pop	ax
 26667                                  	;jne	short bufq		; -no, jump.
 26668                                  	;;jmp	short bufx		; -yes, exit.
 26669                                  	;; 12/06/2019
 26670                                  	;retn
 26671                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compability)
 26672 0000435D 7599                    	jne	short bufq
 26673                                  	;jmp	short bufx
 26674                                  	; 09/02/2024
 26675 0000435F C3                      	retn	; Exit
 26676

 26688                                  ; Procedure Name : DISKWRITE

 27613                                  	;mov	[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_cluspos_hw],bx
 27614 00004689 26895D37                	mov	[es:di+37h],bx

 27620 00004695 26875D2B                	xchg	bx,[es:di+2Bh]	; [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_chain]
 27621                                  	;xchg	bx,[es:di+SF_ENTRY.sf_fcluster]	; first cluster (32 bit) lw !?
 27622                                  	;;;
 27623                                  %endif
 27624                                  
 27625 00004699 07                      	POP	ES
 27626

 27629 0000469A 3B1E[E80A]              	cmp	bx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]

 27646 000046A7 06                      	PUSH	ES			; since first cluster # is 0
 27647 000046A8 55                      	PUSH	BP			; we must delete the old cache entry

 27674                                  
 27675                                  ;Break   <DskWrtBufPurge -- Disk Write Buffer Purge>
 27676                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27677                                  ;
 27678                                  ; Procedure Name : DskWrtBufPurge
 27679                                  ;
 27680                                  ; Inputs:
 27681                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors to write. (These constitute a block of
 27682                                  ;	     sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 27683                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 27684                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 27685                                  ;
 27686                                  ; Function:
 27687                                  ;       Purge the Buffer Queue and the Secondary Cache of any buffers which
 27688                                  ;	are in Extent; they are being over-written.
 27689                                  ;
 27690                                  ; Outputs:
 27691                                  ;       (Same as Input.)
 27692                                  ; Uses:
 27693                                  ;       All registers except DS,AX,SI,DI preserved.
 27694                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 27695                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27696                                  ;M039: Created
 27697                                  
 27698                                  ;procedure   DskWrtBufPurge,NEAR
 27699                                  ;
 27700                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 27701                                  
 27702                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27703                                  ; DOSCODE:7C0Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27704                                  
 27705                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27706                                  ; DOSCODE:7BD4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27707                                  
 27708                                  ; 10/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 27709                                  ; DOSCODE:8714h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 27710                                  
 27711                                  ; NOTE: Secondary (Buffer) Cache is not used in PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 27712                                  
 27713                                  ; (Win ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:BB93h)
 27714                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS - DOSCODE:7C0Eh)
 27715                                  
 27716                                  DskWrtBufPurge:
 27717                                  	;SaveReg <bx,cx>
 27718 000046C5 53                      	push	bx
 27719 000046C6 51                      	push	cx
 27720                                  
 27721 000046C7 368B1E[0706]            	mov	bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	;BX:DX = Extent start (sector #).
 27722 000046CC 89DE                    	mov	si,bx
 27723 000046CE 01D1                    	add	cx,dx
 27724 000046D0 83D600                  	adc	si,0                    ;SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 27725                                  
 27726                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27727                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 27728                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 27729                                  	; 15/12/2022
 27730 000046D3 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 27731                                  
 27732                                  ; 10/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 27733                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 27734                                  %if 0
 27735                                  
 27736                                  ;	BX:DX = Extent start.
 27737                                  ;	SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 27738                                  ;	AL = Drive #
 27739                                  
 27740                                  	cmp	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0 ;Secondary cache in-use?
 27741                                  	je	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 27742                                  
 27743                                  ;	If any of the sectors to be written are in the secondary cache (SC),
 27744                                  ;	invalidate the entire SC. (This is an optimization; we really only
 27745                                  ;	need to invalidate those sectors which intersect, but that's slower.)
 27746                                  
 27747                                  	cmp	al,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	;Same drive?
 27748                                  	jne	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 27749                                  
 27750                                  	push    ax
 27751                                  	mov     ax,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]
 27752                                  	mov     di,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]	;DI:AX = SC start.
 27753                                  
 27754                                  	;Cmp32	si,cx,di,ax		;Extent end < SC start?
 27755                                  	;jbe	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 27756                                  
 27757                                  	cmp	si,di
 27758                                  	jne	short sc01
 27759                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 27760                                  sc01: 
 27761                                  	jbe	short sc5
 27762                                  
 27763                                  	add	ax,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]
 27764                                  	adc	di,0                    ;DI:AX = SC end + 1.
 27765                                  	
 27766                                  	;Cmp32	bx,dx,di,ax             ;Extent start > SC end?
 27767                                  	;jae	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 27768                                  
 27769                                  	cmp	bx,di
 27770                                  	jne	short sc02
 27771                                  	cmp	dx,ax
 27772                                  sc02:
 27773                                  	jnb	short sc5
 27774                                  
 27775                                  	mov	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	;Extent intersects SC: invalidate SC.
 27776                                  sc5:	
 27777                                  	pop     ax
 27778                                  
 27779                                  %endif
 27780                                  
 27781                                  ;	Free any buffered sectors which are in Extent; they are being over-
 27782                                  ;	written.
 27783                                  
 27784                                  nosc:	
 27785 000046D7 E8EA21                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> first buffer in queue.
 27786                                  
 27787                                  _bufq:	
 27788                                  	;cmpo	al,[di+4]
 27789 000046DA 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 27790 000046DD 7527                    	jne	short bufq5		; -no, jump.
 27791                                  
 27792                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 27793                                  ;       ja	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 27794                                  
 27795                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 27796 000046DF 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 27797 000046E2 7503                    	jne	short bufq04
 27798                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 27799 000046E4 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 27800                                  bufq04:
 27801 000046E7 771D                    	ja	short bufq5
 27802                                  
 27803                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 27804                                  ;       jbe	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent end < buffer sector.
 27805                                  
 27806                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 27807 000046E9 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 27808 000046EC 7503                    	jne	short bufq05
 27809                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 27810 000046EE 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 27811                                  bufq05:
 27812 000046F1 7613                    	jbe	short bufq5
 27813                                  
 27814                                  ;	Buffer's sector is in Extent, so free it; it is being over-written.
 27815                                  
 27816                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 27817 000046F3 F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 27818 000046F7 7403                    	jz	short bufq4		; -no, jump.
 27819 000046F9 E8DC24                  	call	DEC_DIRTY_COUNT		; -yes, decrement dirty count.
 27820                                  bufq4:
 27821                                  	;mov	word [di+4],20FFh
 27822 000046FC C74504FF20              	mov     word [di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID],((buf_visit<<8)|0FFh)
 27823                                  
 27824 00004701 E8D221                  	call	SCANPLACE
 27825 00004704 EB02                    	jmp     short bufq6
 27826                                  bufq5: 
 27827 00004706 8B3D                    	mov     di,[di]
 27828                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next]
 27829                                  bufq6: 
 27830 00004708 363B3E[7E11]            	cmp	di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 27831 0000470D 75CB                    	jne	short _bufq		; --no, go do next buffer.
 27832                                  	
 27833                                  	;RestoreReg <cx,bx>
 27834 0000470F 59                      	pop	cx
 27835 00004710 5B                      	pop	bx
 27836 00004711 C3                      	retn
 27837                                  
 27838                                  ;EndProc DskWrtBufPurge
 27839                                  
 27840                                  ;Break   <DIV32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT DIVIDE>
 27841                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27842                                  ;
 27843                                  ; Procedure Name : DIV32
 27844                                  ;
 27845                                  ; Inputs:
 27846                                  ;       DX:AX = 32 bit dividend   BX= divisor
 27847                                  ; Function:
 27848                                  ;       Perform 32 bit division:  DX:AX/BX = CX:AX + DX (rem.)
 27849                                  ; Outputs:
 27850                                  ;       CX:AX = quotient , DX= remainder
 27851                                  ; Uses:
 27852                                  ;       All registers except AX,CX,DX preserved.
 27853                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27854                                  ;M039: DIV32 optimized for divisor of 512 (common sector size).
 27855                                  
 27856                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27857                                  ; DOSCODE:7C94h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27858                                  
 27859                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27860                                  ; DOSCODE:7C5Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27861                                  
 27862                                  DIV32:
 27863 00004712 81FB0002                	cmp	bx,512
 27864 00004716 7515                    	jne	short div5
 27865                                  
 27866 00004718 89D1                    	mov	cx,dx
 27867 0000471A 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax           ; CX:AX = Dividend
 27868 0000471C 81E2FF01                	and	dx,(512-1)      ; DX = Remainder
 27869 00004720 88E0                    	mov	al,ah
 27870 00004722 88CC                    	mov	ah,cl
 27871 00004724 88E9                    	mov	cl,ch
 27872 00004726 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch
 27873 00004728 D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 27874 0000472A D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 27875 0000472C C3                      	retn
 27876                                  div5:	
 27877 0000472D 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 27878 0000472F 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx
 27879 00004731 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 27880 00004733 F7F3                    	div	bx              ; 0:AX/BX
 27881 00004735 91                      	xchg	cx,ax
 27882 00004736 F7F3                    	div	bx              ; DX:AX/BX
 27883 00004738 C3                      	retn
 27884                                  
 27885                                  ;Break   <SHR32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT SHIFT RIGHT>
 27886                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27887                                  ;
 27888                                  ; Procedure Name : SHR32
 27889                                  ;
 27890                                  ; Inputs:
 27891                                  ;	DX:AX = 32 bit sector number
 27892                                  ; Function:
 27893                                  ;       Perform 32 bit shift right
 27894                                  ; Outputs:
 27895                                  ;	AX = cluster number
 27896                                  ;	ZF = 1 if no error
 27897                                  ;	   = 0 if error (cluster number > 64k)
 27898                                  ; Uses:
 27899                                  ;       DX,CX
 27900                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27901                                  ; M017	- SHR32 rewritten for better performance
 27902                                  ; M039	- Additional optimization
 27903                                  
 27904                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27905                                  ; DOSCODE:7CBBh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27906                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27907                                  ; DOSCODE:7C81h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 27908                                  
 27909                                  SHR32:
 27910                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 27911 00004739 268A4E05                	mov	cl,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 27912 0000473D 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch	    ;ZF=1
 27913 0000473F E306                    	jcxz	norota
 27914                                  
 27915                                  rotashft2:
 27916 00004741 D1EA                    	shr	dx,1	    ;ZF reflects state of DX.
 27917 00004743 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1	    ;ZF not affected.
 27918 00004745 E2FA                    	loop	rotashft2
 27919                                  norota:
 27920 00004747 C3                      	retn
 27921                                  
 27922                                  ;============================================================================
 27923                                  ; DIR.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 27924                                  ;============================================================================
 27925                                  ; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 27926                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27927                                  
 27928                                  ;	TITLE	DIR - Directory and path cracking
 27929                                  ;	NAME	Dir
 27930                                  
 27931                                  ;Break	<FINDENTRY -- LOOK FOR AN ENTRY>
 27932                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27933                                  ;
 27934                                  ; Procedure Name : FINDENTRY,SEARCH
 27935                                  ;
 27936                                  ; Inputs:
 27937                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 27938                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 27939                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Starting directory sector number
 27940                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Next cluster of directory
 27941                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors/Cluster
 27942                                  ;	[NAME1] = Name to look for
 27943                                  ; Function:
 27944                                  ;	Find file name in disk directory.
 27945                                  ;	"?" matches any character.
 27946                                  ; Outputs:
 27947                                  ;	Carry set if name not found
 27948                                  ;	ELSE
 27949                                  ;	Zero set if attributes match (always except when creating)
 27950                                  ;	AH = Device ID (bit 7 set if not disk)
 27951                                  ;	[THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters
 27952                                  ;	DS = DOSGROUP
 27953                                  ;	ES = DOSGROUP
 27954                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer into directory buffer
 27955                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:SI = Pointer to First Cluster field in directory entry
 27956                                  ;	[CURBUF] has directory record with match
 27957                                  ;	[NAME1] has file name
 27958                                  ;	[LASTENT] is entry number of the entry
 27959                                  ; All other registers destroyed.
 27960                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27961                                  
 27962                                  ;hkn; called from rename.asm and dir2.asm. DS must be already set up at
 27963                                  ;hkn; this point.
 27964                                  
 27965                                  SEARCH:
 27966                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27967                                  	; DOSCODE:7C90h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27968                                  
 27969                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27970                                  	; DOSCODE:7CCAh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27971                                  
 27972                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 27973                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 45B3h
 27974                                  	; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 27975                                  
 27976                                  	; 24/01/2024
 27977                                  
 27978                                  	; 13/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 27979                                  	; DOSCODE:8797h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 27980                                  
 27981                                  	;entry	FindEntry
 27982                                  FINDENTRY:
 27983 00004748 E86F06                  	call	STARTSRCH
 27984 0000474B A0[6B05]                	MOV	AL,[ATTRIB]
 27985                                  	;and	al,9Eh
 27986 0000474E 24DE                    	AND	AL,~attr_ignore		; Ignore useless bits
 27987                                  	;cmp	al,8
 27988 00004750 3C08                    	CMP	AL,attr_volume_id	; Looking for vol ID only ?
 27989 00004752 7503                    	JNZ	short NOTVOLSRCH	; No
 27990 00004754 E83B02                  	CALL	SETROOTSRCH		; Yes force search of root
 27991                                  NOTVOLSRCH:
 27992 00004757 E84C01                  	CALL	GETENTRY
 27993                                  	;JNC	short SRCH
 27994                                  	;JMP	SETESRET
 27995                                  	; 24/01/2024
 27996 0000475A 724F                    	jc	short SETESRET
 27997                                  
 27998                                  	;entry	Srch
 27999                                  SRCH:
 28000                                  	;;;
 28001                                  	; 13/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 28002 0000475C C706[A50A]0000          	mov     word [LNE_COUNT],0	; reset long name entry count
 28003                                  SRCH2:
 28004                                  	;;;
 28005                                  
 28006 00004762 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 28007 00004763 8E1E[E405]              	MOV	DS,[CURBUF+2]
 28008                                  
 28009                                  ;	(DS:BX) = directory entry address
 28010                                  
 28011 00004767 8A27                    	mov	ah,[BX]
 28012                                  	;MOV	AH,[BX+dir_entry.dir_name] ; mov ah,[bx+0]
 28013 00004769 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH			; End of directory?
 28014 0000476B 7461                    	JZ	short FREE
 28015                                  
 28016                                  	;;;
 28017                                  	; 13/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 28018 0000476D 50                      	push	ax
 28019 0000476E 8A470B                  	mov	al,[bx+0Bh]		; [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 28020 00004771 E8A103                  	call	check_longname
 28021 00004774 58                      	pop	ax
 28022 00004775 7447                    	jz	short NEXTENT2
 28023                                  	;;;
 28024                                  
 28025                                  ;hkn; SS override
 28026 00004777 363A26[7F05]            	CMP	AH,[SS:DELALL]		; Free entry?
 28027 0000477C 7450                    	JZ	short FREE
 28028                                  	;test	byte [bx+0Bh],8
 28029 0000477E F6470B08                	TEST	byte [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_volume_id
 28030                                  					; Volume ID file?
 28031 00004782 7405                    	JZ	short CHKFNAM 		; NO
 28032

 28034 00004784 36FE06[7B05]            	INC	BYTE [SS:VOLID]
 28035                                  CHKFNAM:

 28040

 28042 0000478F BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 28043                                  ;;;;; 7/29/86
 28044

 28046                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SS:NAME1],0E5H	; special char check

 28051 00004796 7504                    	jnz	short NO_E5

 28053                                  NO_E5:
 28054                                  ;;;;; 7/29/86
 28055 0000479C E88100                  	CALL	MetaCompare
 28056 0000479F 7449                    	JZ	short FOUND
 28057 000047A1 1F                      	POP	DS
 28058                                  
 28059                                  	;entry	NEXTENT
 28060                                  NEXTENT:

 28066                                  SETESRET:

 28107 000047E3 890E[DA05]              	MOV	[ENTLAST],CX
 28108 000047E7 F9                      	STC
 28109 000047E8 EBC1                    	JMP	SHORT SETESRET
 28110                                  
 28111                                  FOUND:
 28112                                  ; We have a file with a matching name. We must now consider the attributes:
 28113                                  ; ATTRIB	Action
 28114                                  ; ------	------
 28115                                  ; Volume_ID	Is Volume_ID in test?
 28116                                  ; Otherwise	If no create then Is ATTRIB+extra superset of test?
 28117                                  ;		If create then Is ATTRIB equal to test?
 28118

 28120 000047EC 1F                      	POP	DS
 28121 000047ED 8A26[6B05]              	MOV	AH,[ATTRIB]		; Attributes of search
 28122                                  	;and	ah,9Eh
 28123 000047F1 80E4DE                  	AND	AH,~attr_ignore
 28124                                  	;lea	si,[si+15]

 28126                                  					; point to first cluster field

 28130                                  	;test	ah,8
 28131 000047FC F6C408                  	TEST	AH,attr_volume_id	; Can we find Volume ID?
 28132                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Nope, (not even $FCB_CREATE)
 28133                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28134 000047FF 74A1                    	jz	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 28135                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28136                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ

 28138 00004803 EB11                    	JMP	SHORT RETFF		; Found Volume ID
 28139                                  check_one_volume_id:
 28140                                  	;CMP	ah,8
 28141 00004805 80FC08                  	CMP	AH,attr_volume_id	; Looking only for Volume ID?
 28142                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Yes, continue search
 28143                                  	; 16/12/2022

 28146 0000480A E8C105                  	CALL	MatchAttributes
 28147 0000480D 7407                    	JZ	SHORT RETFF

 28149                                  	; 16/12/2022

 28151 00004814 748C                    	jz	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 28152                                  RETFF:

 28154                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)

 28165                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28166                                  ;
 28167                                  ; Procedure Name : MetaCompare
 28168                                  ;
 28169                                  ; Inputs:
 28170                                  ;	DS:SI -> 11 character FCB style name NO '?'
 28171                                  ;	    Typically this is a directory entry. It MUST be in upper case
 28172                                  ;	ES:DI -> 11 character FCB style name with possible '?'
 28173                                  ;	    Typically this is a FCB or SFT. It MUST be in upper case
 28174                                  ; Function:
 28175                                  ;	Compare FCB style names allowing for ? match to any char
 28176                                  ; Outputs:
 28177                                  ;	Zero if match else NZ
 28178                                  ; Destroys CX,SI,DI all others preserved
 28179                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28180                                  
 28181                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28182                                  	; DOSCODE:7D3Fh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 28183                                  
 28184                                  MetaCompare:
 28185 00004820 B90B00                  	MOV	CX,11
 28186                                  WILDCRD:
 28187 00004823 F3A6                    	REPE	CMPSB
 28188 00004825 7407                    	JZ	short MetaRet 		; most of the time we will fail.
 28189                                  CHECK_META:
 28190 00004827 26807DFF3F              	CMP	BYTE [ES:DI-1],"?"
 28191 0000482C 74F5                    	JZ	short WILDCRD
 28192                                  MetaRet:
 28193 0000482E C3                       	retn				; Zero set, Match
 28194

 28197                                  ;
 28198                                  ; Procedure Name : NEXTENTRY
 28199                                  ;

 28202                                  ; Function:

 28204                                  ;	Carry set if no more.

 28207                                  NEXTENTRY:
 28208                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 28210                                  
 28211                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 28213

 28215                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 4671h 
 28216                                  	; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 28217                                  
 28218                                  	; 14/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 28219                                  	; DOSCODE:8884h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 28220

 28232

 28236 00004845 750F                    	jnz	short nextentry_cont
 28237 00004847 833E[DC0A]00            	cmp	word [DIRSTART_HW],0

 28239                                  	;cmp	ax,[es:bp+9]

 28241                                  	;jnb	short NONE
 28242                                  	;jmp	short GETENT
 28243 00004852 7255                    	jb	short GETENT
 28244                                  NONE:		; 14/02/2024
 28245 00004854 F9                      	stc
 28246 00004855 C3                      	retn
 28247                                  	
 28248                                  nextentry_cont:
 28249                                  	;;;
 28250                                  
 28251 00004856 8A1E[7305]              	MOV	BL,[SECCLUSPOS]

 28253 0000485C 3A1E[7705]              	CMP	BL,[CLUSFAC]
 28254 00004860 7223                    	JB	short SAMECLUS
 28255                                  	;;;

 28278                                  ;NONE:
 28279                                  	;STC

 28338                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28339                                  ;
 28340                                  ; Procedure Name : GETENTRY
 28341                                  ;
 28342                                  ; Inputs:
 28343                                  ;	[LASTENT] has directory entry
 28344                                  ;	ES:BP points to drive parameters
 28345                                  ;	[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[ENTLAST] set for DIR involved
 28346                                  ; Function:
 28347                                  ;	Locates directory entry in preparation for search
 28348                                  ;	GETENT provides entry for passing desired entry in AX
 28349                                  ; Outputs:
 28350                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer to next directory entry in CURBUF
 28351                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:DX = Pointer to first byte after end of CURBUF
 28352                                  ;	[LASTENT] = New directory entry number
 28353                                  ;	[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS] set via DIRREAD
 28354                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 28355                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28356                                  
 28357                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28358                                  GETENTRY:
 28359                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 28360 000048A6 A1[4803]                	MOV	AX,[LASTENT]
 28361                                  
 28362                                  	;entry	GETENT
 28363                                  GETENT:
 28364 000048A9 A3[4803]                	MOV	[LASTENT],AX
 28365                                  ;
 28366                                  ; Convert the entry number in AX into a byte offset from the beginning of the
 28367                                  ; directory.
 28368                                  ;
 28369 000048AC B105                    	mov	cl,5			; shift left by 5 = mult by 32
 28370 000048AE D3C0                    	rol	ax,cl			; keep hight order bits
 28371 000048B0 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax
 28372                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28373                                  	;and	ax,0FFE0h
 28374                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28375                                  	;and	ax,~(32-1)		; mask off high order bits
 28376                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28377 000048B2 24E0                    	and	al,0E0h ; ~31
 28378 000048B4 83E21F                  	and	dx,1Fh
 28379                                  	;and	dx,32-1			; mask off low order bits
 28380                                  ;
 28381                                  ; DX:AX contain the byte offset of the required directory entry from the
 28382                                  ; beginning of the directory. Convert this to a sector number. Round the
 28383                                  ; sector size down to a multiple of 32.
 28384                                  ;
 28385                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+2]
 28386 000048B7 268B5E02                	MOV	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 28387 000048BB 80E3E0                  	and	bl,0E0h
 28388                                  	;AND	BL,255-31		; Must be multiple of 32
 28389 000048BE F7F3                    	DIV	BX
 28390                                  	; 14/02/2024
 28391                                  	;MOV	BX,DX			; Position within sector
 28392                                  				; NOTE: This BX value is not used in DIRREAD
 28393                                  				; Erdogan Tan - 14/02/2024
 28394                                  	;PUSH	BX
 28395 000048C0 52                      	push	dx
 28396                                  	;
 28397 000048C1 E82CF6                  	call	DIRREAD
 28398 000048C4 5B                      	POP	BX
 28399                                  	;retc
 28400 000048C5 72BD                    	jc	short nextentry_retn
 28401                                  SETENTRY:
 28402 000048C7 8B16[E205]              	MOV	DX,[CURBUF]
 28403                                  	;;;add	dx,16 ; MSDOS 3.3
 28404                                  	;;add	dx,20 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 28405                                  	;add	dx,24 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 14/02/2024	
 28406 000048CB 83C218                  	ADD	DX,BUFINSIZ
 28407 000048CE 01D3                    	ADD	BX,DX
 28408                                  	;add	dx,[es:bp+2]
 28409 000048D0 26035602                	ADD	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]  ; Always clears carry
 28410                                  	; 29/12/2022
 28411                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS contains a 'CLC' here, at DOSCODE:7E15h
 28412                                  	; 27/06/2024
 28413                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM contains 'CLC' here, at DOSCODE:8931h
 28414 000048D4 F8                      	clc
 28415 000048D5 C3                      	retn
 28416

 28418                                  
 28419                                  ; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 28421                                  
 28422                                  sft_fcb_table:
 28423 000048D6 00<rep 14h>             	times 20 db 0
 28424                                  sftfcb.cluster:
 28425 000048EA 00000000                	dd	0
 28426                                  sftfcb.direntry:

 28441                                  ;
 28442                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDIRSRCH,SETROOTSRCH
 28443                                  ;
 28444                                  ; Inputs:
 28445                                  ;	BX cluster number of start of directory
 28446                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 28447                                  ;	DI next cluster number from fastopen extended info. DOS 3.3 only
 28448                                  ; Function:
 28449                                  ;	Set up a directory search
 28450                                  ; Outputs:
 28451                                  ;	[DIRSTART] = BX
 28452                                  ;	[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC] set
 28453                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 28454                                  ; destroys AX,DX,BX
 28455                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28456                                  
 28457                                  ; 23/01/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 28458                                  %if 0
 28459                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28460                                  SETDIRSRCH:
 28461                                  	OR	BX,BX
 28462                                  	JZ	short SETROOTSRCH
 28463                                  	MOV	[DIRSTART],BX
 28464                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 28465                                  	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 28466                                  	INC	AL
 28467                                  	MOV	[CLUSFAC],AL
 28468                                  
 28469                                  ; DOS 3.3 for FastOPen	F.C. 6/12/86
 28470                                  	;SAVE	<SI>
 28471                                  	push	si
 28472                                  	;test	byte [FastOpenFlg],2
 28473                                  	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],Lookup_Success
 28474                                  	JNZ	short UNP_OK
 28475                                  
 28476                                  ; DOS 3.3 for FastOPen	F.C. 6/12/86
 28477                                  	;invoke	UNPACK
 28478                                  	call	UNPACK
 28479                                  	JNC	short UNP_OK
 28480                                  	;RESTORE <SI>
 28481                                  	pop	si
 28482                                  	;return
 28483                                  	retn
 28484                                  
 28485                                  UNP_OK:

 28487                                  	MOV	DX,BX
 28488                                  	XOR	BL,BL

 28490                                  	;invoke	FIGREC
 28491                                  	call	FIGREC
 28492                                  	;RESTORE <SI>
 28493                                  	pop	si
 28494

 28496

 28498                                  	;PUSH	DX			   ;AN000; >32mb

 28501                                  	;POP	DX			   ;AN000; >32mb
 28502

 28506                                  	;mov	[DIRSEC+2],dx

 28515                                  	; cf=0 (at the return of FIGREC)
 28516                                  	;CLC

 28518

 28543                                  	;;;
