 28899                                  ;============================================================================
 28900                                  ; DIR2.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 28901                                  ;============================================================================
 28902                                  ; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 28903                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28904                                  ; 14/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 28905                                  
 28906                                  ;	TITLE	DIR2 - Directory and path cracking
 28907                                  ;	NAME	Dir2
 28908                                  
 28909                                  ;Break	<GETPATH -- PARSE A WFP>
 28910                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28911                                  ;
 28912                                  ; Procedure Name : GETPATH
 28913                                  ;
 28914                                  ; Inputs:
 28915                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:\" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 28916                                  ;		terminated; d:/ (note forward slash) indicates a real device).
 28917                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 28918                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 28919                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 28920                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 28921                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 28922                                  ;	[NoSetDir] set
 28923                                  ;	[THISDPB] set to DPB if disk otherwise garbage.
 28924                                  ; Function:
 28925                                  ;	Crack the path
 28926                                  ; Outputs:
 28927                                  ;	Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk if disk file
 28928                                  ;	Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Unk if char device
 28929                                  ;	ID1 field of [THISCDS] updated appropriately
 28930                                  ;	[ATTRIB] = [SATTRIB]
 28931                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 28932                                  ;	Carry set if bad path
 28933                                  ;	   SI Points to path element causing failure
 28934                                  ;	   Zero set
 28935                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC] are set up to
 28936                                  ;	      start a search on the last directory
 28937                                  ;	      CL is zero if there is a bad name in the path
 28938                                  ;	      CL is non-zero if the name was simply not found
 28939                                  ;		 [ENTFREE] may have free spot in directory
 28940                                  ;		 [NAME1] is the name.
 28941                                  ;		 CL = 81H if '*'s or '?' in NAME1, 80H otherwise
 28942                                  ;	   Zero reset
 28943                                  ;	      File in middle of path or bad name in path or attribute mismatch
 28944                                  ;		or path too long or malformed path
 28945                                  ;	ELSE
 28946                                  ;	   [CurBuf] = -1 if root directory
 28947                                  ;	   [CURBUF] contains directory record with match
 28948                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:BX Points into [CURBUF] to start of entry
 28949                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:SI Points into [CURBUF] to dir_first field for entry
 28950                                  ;	   AH = device ID
 28951                                  ;	      bit 7 of AH set if device SI and BX
 28952                                  ;	      will point DOSGROUP relative The firclus
 28953                                  ;	      field of the device entry contains the device pointer
 28954                                  ;	   [NAME1] Has name looked for
 28955                                  ;	   If last element is a directory zero is set and:
 28956                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC]
 28957                                  ;	      are set up to start a search on it.
 28958                                  ;	      unless [NoSetDir] is non zero in which case the return is
 28959                                  ;	      like that for a file (except for zero flag)
 28960                                  ;	   If last element is a file zero is reset
 28961                                  ;	      [DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],
 28962                                  ;	      [LASTENT], [ENTLAST] are set to continue search of last
 28963                                  ;	      directory for furthur matches on NAME1 via the NEXTENT
 28964                                  ;	      entry point in FindEntry (or GETENT entry in GETENTRY in
 28965                                  ;	      which case [NXTCLUSNUM] and [SECCLUSPOS] need not be valid)
 28966                                  ; DS preserved, Others destroyed
 28967                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28968                                  
 28969                                  ;hkn; called from delete.asm, finfo.asm, mknode.asm and rename.asm.
 28970                                  ;hkn; DS already set up at this point.
 28971                                  
 28972                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28973                                  
 28974                                  	; 15/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 28975                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:8B99h
 28976                                  
 28977                                  GETPATH:
 28978                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E500h
 28979 00004B1A C706[7E05]00E5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256+0 ; Not Creating, not DEL *.*
 28980                                  
 28981                                  ; Same as GetPath only CREATING and DELALL already set
 28982                                  
 28983                                  	;entry	GetPathNoSet
 28984                                  GetPathNoSet:
 28985                                  	;;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],2
 28986                                  	;MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk
 28987                                  	; 15/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 28988 00004B20 E8C3C7                  	call	set_exerr_locus_disk
 28989                                  	;
 28990 00004B23 C706[E205]FFFF          	MOV	word [CURBUF],-1	; initial setting
 28991                                  
 28992                                  ; See if the input indicates a device that has already been detected. If so,
 28993                                  ; go build the guy quickly. Otherwise, let findpath find the device.
 28994                                  
 28995 00004B29 8B3E[B205]              	MOV	DI,[WFP_START]		; point to the beginning of the name
 28996                                  	;cmp	word [DI+1],5C3Ah
 28997                                  	;CMP	WORD [DI+1],'\' << 8 + ':'
 28998 00004B2D 817D013A5C              	cmp	word [DI+1],':\'
 28999 00004B32 7435                    	JZ	short CrackIt
 29000                                  
 29001                                  ; Let ChkDev find it in the device list
 29002                                  
 29003 00004B34 83C703                  	ADD	DI,3
 29004                                  	; 18/08/2018
 29005                                  	;MOV	SI,DI			; let CHKDEV see the original name
 29006                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 29007                                  	; 16/12/2022
 29008                                  	;mov	si,di ; not required ! (it is written in CHKDEV proc already!)
 29009 00004B37 E8B200                  	CALL	CHKDEV
 29010 00004B3A 722B                    	JC	short InternalError
 29011                                  
 29012                                  Build_devJ:
 29013 00004B3C A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 29014 00004B3F A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL
 29015                                  	; 15/02/2024
 29016                                  	;;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],1
 29017                                  	;MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; In the particular case of
 29018                                  					; "finding" a char device
 29019                                  					; set LOCUS to Unknown. This makes
 29020                                  					; certain idiotic problems reported
 29021                                  					; by a certain 3 letter OEM go away.
 29022                                  	; 15/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 29023 00004B42 E898C7                  	call	set_exerr_locus_unk
 29024                                  
 29025                                  ; Take name in name1 and pack it back into where wfp_start points. This
 29026                                  ; guarantees wfp_start pointing to a canonical representation of a device.
 29027                                  ; We are allowed to do this as GetPath is *ALWAYS* called before entering a
 29028                                  ; wfp into the share set.
 29029                                  ;
 29030                                  ; We copy chars from name1 to wfp_start remembering the position of the last
 29031                                  ; non-space seen +1.  This position is kept in DX.

 29251                                  ;Break	<ROOTPATH, FINDPATH -- PARSE A PATH>
 29252                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29253                                  ;
 29254                                  ; Procedure Name : ROOTPATH,FINDPATH
 29255                                  ;
 29256                                  ; Inputs:
 29257                                  ;	Same as FINDPATH but,
 29258                                  ;	SI Points to asciz string of path which is assumed to start at
 29259                                  ;		the root (no leading '/').
 29260                                  ; Function:
 29261                                  ;	Search from root for path
 29262                                  ; Outputs:
 29263                                  ;	Same as FINDPATH but:
 29264                                  ;	If root directory specified, [CURBUF] and [NAME1] are NOT set, and
 29265                                  ;	[NoSetDir] is ignored.
 29266                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29267                                  
 29268                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 29269                                  	; DOSCODE:7F47h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 29270                                  
 29271                                  	; 15/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 29272                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:8C9Dh
 29273                                  
 29274                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:7F82h)
 29275                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:829Eh)
 29276                                  
 29277                                  ROOTPATH:
 29278 00004C16 E879FD                  	call	SETROOTSRCH
 29279                                  	; 24/09/2023
 29280 00004C19 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah
 29281                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SI],0
 29282 00004C1B 3824                    	cmp	[si],ah ; 0
 29283 00004C1D 7507                    	JNZ	short FINDPATH
 29284                                  
 29285                                  	;;;
 29286                                  	;; 15/02/2024
 29287                                  	; Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:82A6h
 29288                                  	;mov	word [CURBUF],0FFFFh
 29289                                  	;;;
 29290                                  
 29291                                  ; Root dir specified
 29292 00004C1F A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 29293 00004C22 A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL
 29294                                  	; 24/09/2023
 29295                                  	;XOR	AH,AH			; Sets "device ID" byte, sets zero
 29296                                  					; (dir), clears carry.
 29297 00004C25 C3                      	retn
 29298                                  
 29299                                  ; Inputs:
 29300                                  ;	[ATTRIB] Set to get through directories
 29301                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Set to find last element
 29302                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 29303                                  ;	SI Points to asciz string of path (no leading '/').
 29304                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 29305                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Phys sec # of first sector of directory
 29306                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Cluster # of next cluster
 29307                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors per cluster
 29308                                  ;	[NoSetDir] set
 29309                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 29310                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 29311                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 29312                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 29313                                  ;	[CREATING] and [DELALL] set
 29314                                  ; Function:
 29315                                  ;	Parse path name
 29316                                  ; Outputs:
 29317                                  ;	ID1 field of [THISCDS] updated appropriately
 29318                                  ;	[ATTRIB] = [SATTRIB]
 29319                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 29320                                  ;	[THISDPB] = ES:BP
 29321                                  ;	Carry set if bad path
 29322                                  ;	   SI Points to path element causing failure
 29323                                  ;	   Zero set
 29324                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC] are set up to
 29325                                  ;	      start a search on the last directory
 29326                                  ;	      CL is zero if there is a bad name in the path
 29327                                  ;	      CL is non-zero if the name was simply not found
 29328                                  ;		 [ENTFREE] may have free spot in directory
 29329                                  ;		 [NAME1] is the name.
 29330                                  ;		 CL = 81H if '*'s or '?' in NAME1, 80H otherwise
 29331                                  ;	   Zero reset
 29332                                  ;	      File in middle of path or bad name in path
 29333                                  ;		or path too long or malformed path
 29334                                  ;	ELSE
 29335                                  ;	   [CURBUF] contains directory record with match
 29336                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:BX Points into [CURBUF] to start of entry
 29337                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to fcb_FIRCLUS field for entry
 29338                                  ;	   [NAME1] Has name looked for
 29339                                  ;	   AH = device ID
 29340                                  ;	      bit 7 of AH set if device SI and BX
 29341                                  ;	      will point DOSGROUP relative The firclus
 29342                                  ;	      field of the device entry contains the device pointer
 29343                                  ;	   If last element is a directory zero is set and:
 29344                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC]
 29345                                  ;	      are set up to start a search on it,
 29346                                  ;	      unless [NoSetDir] is non zero in which case the return is
 29347                                  ;	      like that for a file (except for zero flag)
 29348                                  ;	   If last element is a file zero is reset
 29349                                  ;	      [DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],
 29350                                  ;	      [LASTENT], [ENTLAST] are set to continue search of last
 29351                                  ;	      directory for furthur matches on NAME1 via the NEXTENT
 29352                                  ;	      entry point in FindEntry (or GETENT entry in GETENTRY in
 29353                                  ;	      which case [NXTCLUSNUM] and [SECCLUSPOS] need not be valid)
 29354                                  ; Destroys all other registers
 29355                                  
 29356                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 29357                                  	; DOSCODE:7F58h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 29358                                  
 29359                                  	; 15/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 29360                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:8CAEh
 29361                                  
 29362                                      	;entry	FINDPATH
 29363                                  FINDPATH:
 29364 00004C26 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 29365 00004C27 56                      	PUSH	SI
 29366 00004C28 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 29367 00004C2A 8B0E[C205]              	MOV	CX,[DIRSTART]		; Get start clus of dir being searched
 29368 00004C2E 833E[B605]FF            	CMP	word [CURR_DIR_END],-1
 29369 00004C33 7415                    	JZ	short NOIDS		; No current dir part
 29370 00004C35 3B3E[B605]              	CMP	DI,[CURR_DIR_END]
 29371 00004C39 750F                    	JNZ	short NOIDS		; Not to current dir end yet
 29372 00004C3B C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 29373                                  	;;;
 29374                                  	; 15/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 29375 00004C3F A1[DC0A]                	mov	ax,[DIRSTART_HW]
 29376                                  	;mov	[es:di+4Bh],ax
 29377 00004C42 2689454B                	mov	[es:di+curdir.ID+2],ax
 29378                                  	;;;
 29379                                  	;mov	[es:di+73],cx
 29380 00004C46 26894D49                	MOV	[ES:DI+curdir.ID],CX	; Set current directory cluster
 29381                                  NOIDS:
 29382                                  
 29383                                  ; Parse the name off of DS:SI into NAME1. AL = 1 if there was a meta
 29384                                  ; character in the string. CX,DI may be destroyed.
 29385                                  ;
 29386                                  ;	invoke	NAMETRANS
 29387                                  ;	MOV	CL,AL
 29388                                  ;
 29389                                  ; The above is the slow method. The name has *already* been munged by
 29390                                  ; TransPath so no special casing needs to be done. All we do is try to copy
 29391                                  ; the name until ., \ or 0 is hit.
 29392                                  
 29393                                  	;MOV	AX,SS
 29394                                  	;MOV	ES,AX
 29395                                  	; 15/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 29396 00004C4A 16                      	push	ss
 29397 00004C4B 07                      	pop	es
 29398                                  
 29399                                  ;hkn; Name1 is in DOSDATA
 29400 00004C4C BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 29401 00004C4F B82020                  	MOV	AX,'  ' ; 2020h
 29402 00004C52 AA                      	STOSB
 29403 00004C53 AB                      	STOSW
 29404 00004C54 AB                      	STOSW
 29405 00004C55 AB                      	STOSW
 29406 00004C56 AB                      	STOSW
 29407 00004C57 AB                      	STOSW
 29408                                  
 29409                                  ;hkn; Name1 is in DOSDATA
 29410 00004C58 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 29411 00004C5B 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH			; bits for CL
 29412                                  GetNam:
 29413                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29414                                  	;INC	CL ; ?*! ; MSDOS 6.0	;AN000; KK increment volid count
 29415                                  
 29416                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 29417                                  	; 16/12/2022
 29418                                  	;inc	cl ; not required !
 29419                                  	
 29420 00004C5D AC                      	LODSB
 29421 00004C5E 3C2E                    	CMP	AL,'.'	; 2Eh
 29422 00004C60 7412                    	JZ	short _SetExt
 29423 00004C62 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 29424 00004C64 7424                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 29425 00004C66 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'	; 5Ch
 29426 00004C68 7420                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 29427 00004C6A 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,'?'	; 3Fh
 29428 00004C6C 7503                    	JNZ	short StoNam
 29429 00004C6E 80CC01                  	OR	AH,1
 29430                                  StoNam: 
 29431 00004C71 AA                      	STOSB
 29432 00004C72 EBE9                    	JMP	short GetNam
 29433                                  _SetExt:
 29434 00004C74 BF[5305]                	MOV	DI,NAME1+8
 29435                                  GetExt:
 29436 00004C77 AC                      	LODSB
 29437 00004C78 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 29438 00004C7A 740E                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 29439 00004C7C 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'
 29440 00004C7E 740A                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 29441 00004C80 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,'?'
 29442 00004C82 7503                    	JNZ	short StoExt
 29443 00004C84 80CC01                  	OR	AH,1
 29444                                  StoExt: 
 29445 00004C87 AA                      	STOSB
 29446 00004C88 EBED                    	JMP	short GetExt
 29447                                  _GetDone:
 29448 00004C8A 4E                      	DEC	SI
 29449 00004C8B 88E1                    	MOV	CL,AH  ; 0 or 1 ; 29/12/2022
 29450 00004C8D 80C980                  	OR	CL,80H
 29451 00004C90 5F                      	POP	DI			; Start of this element
 29452 00004C91 07                      	POP	ES			; Restore ES:BP
 29453 00004C92 39FE                    	CMP	SI,DI
 29454 00004C94 7503                    	JNZ	short check_device
 29455 00004C96 E9ED00                  	JMP	_BADPATH		; NUL parse (two delims most likely)
 29456                                  check_device:
 29457 00004C99 56                      	PUSH	SI			; Start of next element
 29458                                  	;MOV	AL,[SI]
 29459                                  	; 15/02/2024
 29460 00004C9A 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 29461                                  	; 23/09/2023
 29462                                  	;cmp	byte [si],0
 29463 00004C9C 7508                    	JNZ	short NOT_LAST
 29464                                  
 29465                                  ; for last element of the path switch to the correct search attributes
 29466                                  
 29467 00004C9E 8A3E[6D05]              	MOV	BH,[SATTRIB]
 29468 00004CA2 883E[6B05]              	MOV	[ATTRIB],BH
 29469                                  
 29470                                  NOT_LAST:
 29471                                  
 29472                                  ; check name1 to see if we have a device...
 29473                                  
 29474 00004CA6 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 29475                                  
 29476                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 29477                                  	;context ES
 29478 00004CA7 16                      	push	ss
 29479 00004CA8 07                      	pop	es
 29480 00004CA9 E82F01                  	call	DEVNAME 		; blast BX
 29481 00004CAC 07                      	POP	ES			; Restore ES:BP
 29482 00004CAD 7208                    	JC	short FindFile		; Not a device
 29483 00004CAF 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL			; Test next char again
 29484                                  	;JZ	short GO_BDEV
 29485                                  	;JMP	FILEINPATH		; Device name in middle of path
 29486                                  	; 27/06/2024
 29487 00004CB1 752D                    	jnz	short FILEINPATH_j
 29488                                  
 29489                                  GO_BDEV:
 29490 00004CB3 5E                      	POP	SI			; Points to NUL at end of path
 29491 00004CB4 E985FE                  	JMP	Build_devJ
 29492

 29732                                  ; Inputs:

 29772                                  ;
 29773                                  ; the result is non-zero if an attribute is not in the search set

 29796                                  ;
 29797                                  ; Inputs:

 29800                                  ;	ATTRIB set so that we can error out if looking for Volume IDs
 29801                                  ; Function:
 29802                                  ;	Determine if file is in list of I/O drivers
 29803                                  ; Outputs:
 29804                                  ;	Carry set if not a device
 29805                                  ;	ELSE

 29884                                  ;BREAK <Build_device_ent - Make a Directory entry>
 29885                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29886                                  ; Procedure Name : Build_device_ent
 29887                                  ;
 29888                                  ; Inputs:
 29889                                  ;	[NAME1] has name
 29890                                  ;	BH is attribute field (supplied by DEVNAME)
 29891                                  ;	[DEVPT] points to device header (supplied by DEVNAME)
 29892                                  ; Function:
 29893                                  ;	Build a directory entry for a device at DEVFCB
 29894                                  ; Outputs:
 29895                                  ;	BX points to DEVFCB
 29896                                  ;	SI points to dir_first field

 29902                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------

 29918

 29958                                  ;Break	<ValidateCDS - given a CDS, validate the media and the current directory>
 29959                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29960                                  ;
 29961                                  ;   ValidateCDS - Get current CDS. Splice it. Call FatReadCDS to check
 29962                                  ;   media. If media has been changed, do DOS_Chdir to validate path.
 29963                                  ;   If invalid, reset original CDS to root.
 29964                                  ;
 29965                                  ;   Inputs:	ThisCDS points to CDS of interest

 30159                                  ;Break	<CheckThisDevice - Check for being a device>
 30160                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30161                                  ;
 30162                                  ;   CheckThisDevice - Examine the area at DS:SI to see if there is a valid
 30163                                  ;   device specified. We will return carry if there is a device present. 
 30164                                  ;   The forms of devices we will recognize are:
 30165                                  ;
 30166                                  ;	[path]device
 30167                                  ;
 30168                                  ;   Note that the drive letter has *already* been removed. All other forms
 30169                                  ;   are not considered to be devices. If such a device is found we change
 30170                                  ;   the source pointer to point to the device component.
 30171                                  ;
 30172                                  ;   Inputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 30173                                  ;		DS:SI contains name
 30174                                  ;   Outputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 30175                                  ;		DS:SI point to name or device
 30176                                  ;		Carry flag set if device was found
 30177                                  ;		Carry flag reset otherwise
 30178                                  ;   Registers Modified: all except ES:DI, DS
 30179                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30180                                  
 30181                                  CheckThisDevice:
 30182 00004F34 57                      	push	di
 30183 00004F35 56                      	push	si
 30184 00004F36 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 30185                                  
 30186                                  ; Check for presence of \dev\ (Dam multiplan!)
 30187                                  
 30188 00004F38 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 30189 00004F3A E8B50E                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; is it a path char?
 30190 00004F3D 7517                    	JNZ	short ParseDev		; no, go attempt to parse device
 30191 00004F3F 46                      	INC	SI			; simulate LODSB
 30192                                  
 30193                                  ; We have the leading path separator. Look for DEV part.
 30194                                  
 30195 00004F40 AD                      	LODSW
 30196 00004F41 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020h
 30197 00004F44 3D6465                  	cmp	ax,"de"
 30198                                  	;CMP	AX,"e"<< 8 + "d"
 30199 00004F47 752D                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; not "de", assume not device
 30200 00004F49 AC                      	LODSB
 30201 00004F4A 0C20                    	OR	AL,20h
 30202 00004F4C 3C76                    	CMP	AL,"v"                  ; Not "v", assume not device
 30203 00004F4E 7526                    	JNZ	short NotDevice
 30204 00004F50 AC                      	LODSB
 30205 00004F51 E89E0E                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; do we have the last path separator?
 30206 00004F54 7520                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; no. go for it.
 30207                                  
 30208                                  ; DS:SI now points to a potential drive. Preserve them as NameTrans advances
 30209                                  ; SI and DevName may destroy DS.
 30210                                  
 30211                                  ParseDev:
 30212 00004F56 1E                      	push	ds
 30213 00004F57 56                      	push	si			; preserve the source pointer
 30214 00004F58 E8DB0D                  	call	NameTrans		; advance DS:SI
 30215 00004F5B 803C00                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0		; parse entire string?
 30216 00004F5E F9                      	STC				; simulate a Carry return from DevName
 30217 00004F5F 750B                    	JNZ	short SkipSearch	; no parse. simulate a file return.
 30218                                  
 30219                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 30220 00004F61 16                      	push	ss
 30221 00004F62 1F                      	pop	ds
 30222                                  
 30223                                  ; M026 - start - fix ported from ROMDOS2 for bug # 2849
 30224                                  ;
 30225                                  ; SR;
 30226                                  ; We have to set Attrib before invoking DevName. Otherwise, the value from
 30227                                  ; a previous DOS call is used and DevName thinks it is not a device if the
 30228                                  ; old call set the volume attribute bit.
 30229                                  
 30230 00004F63 A0[6D05]                	mov	al,[SATTRIB]
 30231 00004F66 A2[6B05]                	mov	[ATTRIB],al		;set Attrib for DevName
 30232                                  
 30233                                  ; M026 - end
 30234                                  
 30235 00004F69 E86FFE                  	call	DEVNAME
 30236                                  
 30237                                  SkipSearch:
 30238 00004F6C 5E                      	pop	si
 30239 00004F6D 1F                      	pop	ds
 30240                                  
 30241                                  ; SI points to the beginning of the potential device. If we have a device
 30242                                  ; then we do not change SI. If we have a file, then we reset SI back to the
 30243                                  ; original value. At this point Carry set indicates FILE.
 30244                                  
 30245                                  CheckReturn:
 30246 00004F6E 5F                      	pop	di			; get original SI
 30247 00004F6F 7302                    	JNC	short Check_Done	; if device then do not reset pointer
 30248 00004F71 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 30249                                  Check_Done:
 30250 00004F73 5F                      	pop	di
 30251 00004F74 F5                      	CMC				; invert carry. Carry => device
 30252 00004F75 C3                      	retn
 30253                                  NotDevice:
 30254 00004F76 F9                      	STC
 30255 00004F77 EBF5                    	JMP	short CheckReturn

 30631                                  ;Break	<IOFUNC -- DO FUNCTION 1-12 I/O>
 30632                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30633                                  ;
 30634                                  ; Procedure Name : IOFUNC
 30635                                  ;
 30636                                  ; Inputs:
 30637                                  ;	DS:SI Points to SFT
 30638                                  ;	AH is function code
 30639                                  ;		= 0 Input
 30640                                  ;		= 1 Input Status
 30641                                  ;		= 2 Output
 30642                                  ;		= 3 Output Status
 30643                                  ;		= 4 Flush
 30644                                  ;		= 5 Input Status - System WAIT invoked for K09 if no char
 30645                                  ;				   present.
 30646                                  ;	AL = character if output
 30647                                  ; Function:
 30648                                  ;	Perform indicated I/O to device or file
 30649                                  ; Outputs:
 30650                                  ;	AL is character if input
 30651                                  ;	If a status call
 30652                                  ;		zero set if not ready
 30653                                  ;		zero reset if ready (character in AL for input status)
 30654                                  ; For regular files:
 30655                                  ;	Input Status
 30656                                  ;		Gets character but restores position
 30657                                  ;		Zero set on EOF
 30658                                  ;	Input
 30659                                  ;		Gets character advances position
 30660                                  ;		Returns ^Z on EOF
 30661                                  ;	Output Status
 30662                                  ;		Always ready
 30663                                  ; AX altered, all other registers preserved
 30664                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30665                                  
 30666                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30667                                  ; DOSCODE:83D8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30668                                  
 30669                                  ; 21/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 30670                                  ; DOSCODE:9175h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)

 31337                                  ; 22/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31338                                  %if 0	; SC
 31339                                  
 31340                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31341                                  ; DOSCODE:86A8h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31342                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31343                                  ; DOSCODE:866Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31344                                  
 31345                                  ;Break	<RW_SC -- Read Write Secondary Cache>
 31346                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31347                                  ;
 31348                                  ; Procedure Name : RW_SC
 31349                                  ;
 31350                                  ; Inputs:
 31351                                  ;	 [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= secondary cache count
 31352                                  ;	 [SC_STATUS]= SC validity status
 31353                                  ;	 [SEQ_SECTOR]= last sector read
 31354                                  ; Function:
 31355                                  ;	Read from or write through secondary cache
 31356                                  ; Output:
 31357                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 31358                                  ;	carry clear, I/O is not done
 31359                                  ;		     [SC_FLAG]=1 if continuos sectors will be read
 31360                                  ;	carry set, I/O is done
 31361                                  ;
 31362                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31363                                  
 31364                                  RW_SC:
 31365                                  	; SS override for all variables used.
 31366                                  	
 31367                                  	CMP	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0  ;AN000;LB. secondary cache exists?
 31368                                  	JZ	short scexit4		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 31369                                  	CMP	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;LB. sector count = 1 (buffer I/O)
 31370                                  	JNZ	short scexit4 		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 31371                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 31372                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;LB. yes
 31373                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;LB. save registers
 31374                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 31375                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;LB.
 31376                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 31377                                  
 31378                                  	MOV	DX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. starting sector
 31379                                  	CMP	BYTE [ss:DEVCALL_REQFUNC],DEVRD ;AN000;LB. read ?
 31380                                  	JZ	short doread		    ;AN000;LB. yes
 31381                                  	CALL	INVALIDATE_SC		    ;AN000;LB. invalidate SC
 31382                                  	JMP	scexit2 		    ;AN000;LB. back to normal
 31383                                  scexit4:				    ;AN000;
 31384                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. I/O not done yet
 31385                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 31386                                  doread: 				    ;AN000;
 31387                                  	CALL	SC2BUF			    ;AN000;LB. check if in SC
 31388                                  	JC	short readSC		    ;AN000;LB.
 31389                                  	MOV	word [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STDON ;AN000;LB. fake done and ok
 31390                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 31391                                  	JMP	short saveseq 		    ;AN000;LB. save seq. sector #
 31392                                  readSC: 				    ;AN000;
 31393                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]   	    ;AN000;LB. subtract sector num from
 31394                                  	MOV	CX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. saved sequential sector
 31395                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR]    	    ;AN000;LB. number
 31396                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2]  	    ;AN000;LB.
 31397                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31398                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;LB. greater than 64K
 31399                                  	JNZ	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. yes,save seq. sector #
 31400                                  chklow: 						
 31401                                  	CMP	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. <= 1
 31402                                  	JA	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. no, not sequential
 31403                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],-1	    ;AN000;LB. presume all SC valid
 31404                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;LB. yes, sequential
 31405                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLSCNT],AX	    ;AN000;LB. read continuous sectors
 31406                                  readsr:
 31407                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD+2]	    ;AN000;LB. save buffer addr
 31408                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. in temp vars
 31409                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD]	    	    ;AN000;LB.
 31410                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 31411                                  
 31412                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. use SC cache addr as
 31413                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;LB. transfer addr
 31414                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 31415                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 31416                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],1	    ;AN000;LB. flag it for later;
 31417                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;LB. current drive
 31418                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_DRIVE],AL	    ;AN000;LB. set current drive
 31419                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. current sector
 31420                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR],AX	    ;AN000;LB. set current sector
 31421                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB.
 31422                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 31423                                  saveseq2:				    ;AN000;
 31424                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 31425                                  saveseq:				    ;AN000;	
 31426                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB. save current sector #
 31427                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. for access mode ref.
 31428                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB.	
 31429                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR],AX 	    ;AN000;LB.	
 31430                                  	JMP	short scexit 		    ;AN000;LB.	
 31431                                  scexit2:				    ;AN000;LB.
 31432                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB.	clear carry
 31433                                  scexit: 				    ;AN000;		
 31434                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 31435                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;LB. restore registers
 31436                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 31437                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;LB.
 31438                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;LB.
 31439                                  	POP	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 31440                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 31441                                  
 31442                                  ;Break	<IN_SC -- check if in secondary cache>
 31443                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31444                                  ;
 31445                                  ; Procedure Name : IN_SC
 31446                                  ;
 31447                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 31448                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 31449                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 31450                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 31451                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 31452                                  ; Function:
 31453                                  ;	Check if the sector is in secondary cache
 31454                                  ; Output:
 31455                                  ;	carry clear, in SC
 31456                                  ;	   CX= the index in the secondary cache
 31457                                  ;	carry set, not in SC
 31458                                  ;
 31459                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31460                                  
 31461                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31462                                  IN_SC:
 31463                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 31464                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. current drive
 31465                                  	CMP	AL,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. same as SC drive
 31466                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 31467                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;;LB. subtract sector num from
 31468                                  	MOV	CX,DX			    ;AN000;;LB. secondary starting sector
 31469                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]        ;AN000;;LB. number
 31470                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]      ;AN000;;LB.
 31471                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31472                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;;LB. greater than 64K
 31473                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 31474                                  	CMP	CX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;;LB. greater than SC count
 31475                                  	JAE	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 31476                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. clear carry
 31477                                  	;JMP	short inexit		    ;AN000;;LB. in SC
 31478                                  	; 16/12/2022
 31479                                  	retn	; 30/04/2019
 31480                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 31481                                  	;jmp	short inexit
 31482                                  
 31483                                  outrange2:				    ;AN000;;LB. set carry
 31484                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31485                                  inexit: 				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31486                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31487                                  
 31488                                  ;Break	<INVALIDATE_SC - invalide secondary cache>
 31489                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31490                                  ;
 31491                                  ; Procedure Name : Invalidate_Sc
 31492                                  ;
 31493                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 31494                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 31495                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 31496                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 31497                                  ;	   [SC_STATUS]= SC status word
 31498                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 31499                                  ;
 31500                                  ; Function:
 31501                                  ;	invalidate secondary cache if in there
 31502                                  ; Output:
 31503                                  ;	[SC_STATUS] is updated
 31504                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31505                                  
 31506                                  INVALIDATE_SC:
 31507                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 31508                                  
 31509                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;;LB. in secondary cache
 31510                                  	JC	short outrange		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 31511                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate the sector
 31512                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;;LB. in the secondary cache
 31513                                  	NOT	AX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31514                                  	AND	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;;LB. save the status
 31515                                  outrange:				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31516                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31517                                  
 31518                                  ; DOSCODE:87A5h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31519                                  ; 22/11/2022
 31520                                  ; DOSCODE:876Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31521                                  
 31522                                  ;Break	<VIRREAD- virtually read data into buffer>
 31523                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31524                                  ;
 31525                                  ; Procedure Name : SC_FLAG
 31526                                  ;
 31527                                  ; Inputs:  SC_FLAG = 0, no sectors were read into SC
 31528                                  ;		     1, continuous sectors were read into SC
 31529                                  ; Function:
 31530                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 31531                                  ; Output:
 31532                                  ;	 carry clear, data is moved to buffer
 31533                                  ;	 carry set, bad sector or exceeds maximum sector
 31534                                  ;	   SC_FLAG =0
 31535                                  ;	   CALLSCNT=1
 31536                                  ;	   SC_STATUS= -1 if succeeded
 31537                                  ;     
 31538                                  ;		       0 if failed
 31539                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31540                                  
 31541                                  VIRREAD:
 31542                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 31543                                  
 31544                                  	CMP	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. from SC fill
 31545                                  	JZ	short sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 31546                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]	    ;AN000;;LB. restore buffer addr
 31547                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;;LB.
 31548                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR]	    ;AN000;;LB.
 31549                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;;LB.
 31550                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sc_flag
 31551                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. one sector transferred
 31552                                  
 31553                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STERR ;AN000;;LB. error?
 31554                                  	test	byte [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT+1],(STERR>>8) ; 80h
 31555                                  	JNZ	short scerror 		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 31556                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31557                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31558                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31559                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31560                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31561                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31562                                  	XOR	CX,CX			    ;AN000;;LB. we want first sector in SC
 31563                                  	CALL	SC2BUF2 		    ;AN000;;LB. move data from SC to buf
 31564                                  	POP	CX
 31565                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31566                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31567                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31568                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31569                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31570                                  	JMP	SHORT sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. return
 31571                                  scerror:				    ;AN000;
 31572                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sector count to 1
 31573                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate all SC sectors
 31574                                  	MOV	byte [ss:CurSC_DRIVE],-1    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate drive
 31575                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry set
 31576                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31577                                  sc2end: 				    ;AN000;
 31578                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry clear
 31579                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31580                                  
 31581                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro  DOS v4.0
 31582                                  ; DOSCODE:87FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31583                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31584                                  ; DOSCODE:87C2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31585                                  
 31586                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 31587                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31588                                  ;
 31589                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 31590                                  ;
 31591                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 31592                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 31593                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 31594                                  ; Function:
 31595                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 31596                                  ; Output:
 31597                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved
 31598                                  ;	   carry set, not in SC and data is not moved
 31599                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31600                                  
 31601                                  SC2BUF:
 31602                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 31603                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache
 31604                                  	;JC	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. no
 31605                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31606                                  	jc	short sexit
 31607                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;LB. check if valid sector
 31608                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 31609                                  	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 31610                                  	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid
 31611                                  ;entry SC2BUF2
 31612                                  SC2BUF2:				    ;AN000;
 31613                                  	;MOV	AX,CX			    ;AN000;LB. times index with
 31614                                  	;MUL	word [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]    ;AN000;LB. sector size
 31615                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31616                                  	mov	ax,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 31617                                  	xchg	ax,cx ; cx = [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 31618                                  	mul	cx
 31619                                  	ADD	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. add SC starting addr
 31620                                  	ADC	DX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 31621                                  	MOV	DS,DX			    ;AN000;LB. DS:SI-> SC sector addr
 31622                                  	MOV	SI,AX			    ;AN000;LB.
 31623                                  	MOV	ES,[ss:CALLXAD+2]		    ;AN000;LB. ES:DI-> buffer addr
 31624                                  	MOV	DI,[ss:CALLXAD]		    ;AN000;LB.
 31625                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31626                                  	;MOV	CX,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]	    ;AN000;LB. count= sector size
 31627                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. may use DWORD move for 386
 31628                                  ;entry MOVWORDS
 31629                                  MOVWORDS:				    ;AN000;
 31630                                  	CMP	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0	    ;AN000;LB. 386 ?
 31631                                  	JZ	short nodd		    ;AN000;LB. no
 31632                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. words/2
 31633                                  	DB	66H			    ;AN000;LB. use double word move
 31634                                  nodd:
 31635                                  	REP	MOVSW			    ;AN000;LB. move to buffer
 31636                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 31637                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB. exit
 31638                                  noSC:					    ;AN000;
 31639                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 31640                                  sexit:					    ;AN000;
 31641                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 31642

 31675                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 31676                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31677                                  ;
 31678                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 31679                                  ;
 31680                                  ; Inputs:
 31681                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 31682                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 31683                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 31684                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 31685                                  ;               entries
 31686                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 31687                                  ; Function:
 31688                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 31689                                  ; Outputs:
 31690                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 31691                                  ;       ELSE
 31692                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 31693                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 31694                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 31695                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 31696                                  ;
 31697                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31698                                  
 31699                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31700                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)

 31702                                  ; DOSCODE:880Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31703

 31712                                  BUILDDIR:

 31718                                  	;JZ	short CHECK_IF_ROOT
 31719                                  	;CLC
 31720                                  	;retn

 31722 00005363 750E                    	jne	short builddir_cmc_retn  ; cf=1 (will be 0)

 31726                                  	;;;

 31728 0000536A 7509                    	jnz	short NEWDIR

 31731 00005371 7502                    	JNZ	short NEWDIR
 31732                                  	;STC				; Can't grow root
 31733                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31734                                  	; [DIRSTART]=0, cf=0, zf=1 (cf will be 1 after cmc instruction)
 31735                                  builddir_cmc_retn:

 31737 00005373 F5                      	cmc	; cf=1 <-> cf=0
 31738                                  builddir_retn:

 31747 0000537D 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31748                                  	;;;
 31749 0000537F 8B1E[C205]              	MOV	BX,[DIRSTART]

 31757 0000538C 72E6                    	jc	short builddir_retn	; Screw up
 31758                                  NULLDIR:
 31759                                  	;MOV	CX,1

 31764 00005394 41                      	inc	cx ; 1

 31767 00005398 72DA                    	jc	short builddir_retn

 31775 000053A6 7515                    	JNZ	short ADDINGDIR
 31776                                  	; 23/02/2024

 31789 000053BE FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]

 31969                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 31970                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31971                                  ;
 31972                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 31973                                  ;
 31974                                  ; Inputs:
 31975                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 31976                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 31977                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 31978                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 31979                                  ;
 31980                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 31981                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 31982                                  ;
 31983                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 31984                                  ;               terminated)
 31985                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 31986                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 31987                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 31988                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 31989                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 31990                                  ; Function:
 31991                                  ;       Make a new node
 31992                                  ; Outputs:
 31993                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 31994                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 31995                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 31996                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 31997                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 31998                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 31999                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 32000                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 32001                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 32002                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 32003                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 32004                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 32005                                  ;       ELSE
 32006                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 32007                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 32008                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 32009                                  ;               containing new node.
 32010                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 32011                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 32012                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 32013                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 32014                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 32015                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 32016                                  ;
 32017                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32018                                  
 32019                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32020                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 32021                                  
 32022                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32023                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 32024                                  
 32025                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32026                                  ; DOSCODE:951Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 32027                                  
 32028                                  MakeNode:
 32029                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 32030 00005463 C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*

 32032 0000546A C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 32033 0000546F A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 32034 00005472 E8ABF6                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 32035 00005475 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL		; Save CL info
 32036                                  	;MOV	CX,AX		; Device ID to CH
 32037                                  	; 23/02/2024

 32039 00005478 58                      	POP	AX		; Get back AH
 32040 00005479 732D                    	JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 32041 0000547B 7505                    	JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 32042 0000547D 80FA80                  	CMP	DL,80h		; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 32043 00005480 7405                    	JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 32044                                  make_err_4:

 32046                                  make_err_ret:

 32048                                  	; 23/02/2024
 32049 00005484 98                      	cbw
 32050 00005485 F9                      	STC

 32052 00005486 C3                      	retn

 32057                                  ;Extended Open hooks

 32066 00005498 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;

 32075                                  
 32076                                  make_type2:

 32078 000054A3 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX		; nothing exists Disk Node
 32079 000054A5 F9                      	STC			; Not found

 32081                                  
 32082                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 32083                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 32084                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 32085                                  ;   else => file
 32086                                  
 32087                                  make_exists:
 32088 000054A8 7447                    	JZ	short make_exists_dir

 32090                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h

 32092 000054B1 753A                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5

 32094                                  				;  if making DIR or Volume ID
 32095 000054B3 08ED                    	OR	CH,CH
 32096 000054B5 781A                    	JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 32097 000054B7 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 32098 000054B9 75C9                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 32099 000054BB 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save device ID
 32100 000054BC 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]
 32101                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 32102 000054C0 268A6F0B                	MOV	CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 32103                                  	;test	ch,1
