 47437                                  ;Break <$CreateNewFile - Create a new directory entry>
 47438                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47439                                  ;   CreateNew - Create a new directory entry. Return a file handle if there
 47440                                  ;	was no previous directory entry, and fail if a directory entry with
 47441                                  ;	the same name existed previously.
 47442                                  ;
 47443                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to an ASCIZ file name
 47444                                  ;		CX contains default file attributes
 47445                                  ;   Outputs:	Carry Clear:
 47446                                  ;		    AX has file handle opened for read/write
 47447                                  ;		Carry Set:
 47448                                  ;		    AX has error code
 47449                                  ;   Registers modified: All
 47450                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47451                                  
 47452                                  _$CreateNewFile:
 47453 000081B5 51                      	push	cx			; Save attributes on stack
 47454 000081B6 B9[8D31]                	MOV	CX,DOS_Create_New	; routine to call
 47455 000081B9 E9F1FE                  	JMP	AccessSet		; use good ol' open
 47456                                  
 47457                                  ;**	BinToAscii - convert a number to a string.
 47458                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47459                                  ;	BinToAscii converts a 16 bit number into a 4 ascii characters.
 47460                                  ;	This routine is used to generate temp file names so we don't spend
 47461                                  ;	the time and code needed for a true hex number, we just use
 47462                                  ;	A thorugh O.
 47463                                  ;
 47464                                  ;	ENTRY	(ax) = value
 47465                                  ;		(es:di) = destination
 47466                                  ;	EXIT	(es:di) updated by 4
 47467                                  ;	USES	cx, di, flags
 47468                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47469                                  
 47470                                  ; MSDOS 3.3
 47471                                  ;BinToAscii:
 47472                                  ;	mov     cx,4
 47473                                  ;bta5:
 47474                                  ;	push    cx
 47475                                  ;	mov     cl,4
 47476                                  ;	rol     ax,cl
 47477                                  ;	push    ax
 47478                                  ;	and     al,0Fh
 47479                                  ;	add     al,'0'
 47480                                  ;	cmp     al,'9'
 47481                                  ;	jbe     short bta6
 47482                                  ;	add     al,7
 47483                                  ;bta6: 
 47484                                  ;	stosb
 47485                                  ;	pop     ax
 47486                                  ;	pop     cx
 47487                                  ;	loop    bta5
 47488                                  ;	retn
 47489                                  
 47490                                  ; 15/03/2024
 47491                                  ; MSDOS 5.0-6.22 & Windows ME
 47492                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0B0D9h)
 47493                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0ABA4h)
 47494                                  %if 0
 47495                                  
 47496                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 47497                                  BinToAscii:
 47498                                  	mov	cx,404h			; (ch) = digit counter, (cl) = shift cnt
 47499                                  bta5:	
 47500                                  	ROL	AX,CL			; move leftmost nibble into rightmost
 47501                                  	push	ax			; preserve remainder of digits
 47502                                  	AND	AL,0Fh			; grab low nibble
 47503                                  	ADD	AL,'A'			; turn into ascii
 47504                                  	STOSB				; drop in the character
 47505                                  	pop	ax			; (ax) = shifted number
 47506                                  	dec	ch
 47507                                  	jnz	short bta5		; process 4 digits
 47508                                  	retn
 47509                                  %else
 47510                                  ; 15/03/2024
 47511                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0C385h
 47512                                  
 47513                                  BinToAscii:
 47514 000081BC 50                      	push	ax		; convert a number to a string ; ax = value
 47515 000081BD 86E0                    	xchg	ah,al
 47516                                  	;db	0D4h,10h
 47517 000081BF D410                    	aam	10h		; AH = AL / 16 and AL = remainder
 47518 000081C1 054141                  	add	ax,4141h	; 'AA'
 47519 000081C4 AB                      	stosw
 47520 000081C5 58                      	pop	ax
 47521                                  	;db	0D4h,10h
 47522 000081C6 D410                    	aam	10h
 47523 000081C8 054141                  	add	ax,4141h	; add ax,'AA'
 47524 000081CB AB                      	stosw
 47525 000081CC C3                      	retn	
 47526                                  %endif
 47527                                  
 47528                                  ;Break	<$CreateTempFile - create a unique name>
 47529                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47530                                  ;   $CreateTemp - given a directory, create a unique name in that directory.
 47531                                  ;	Method used is to get the current time, convert to a name and attempt
 47532                                  ;	a create new. Repeat until create new succeeds.
 47533                                  ;
 47534                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:DX point to a null terminated directory name.
 47535                                  ;		CX  contains default attributes
 47536                                  ;   Outputs:	Unique name is appended to DS:DX directory.
 47537                                  ;		AX has handle
 47538                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 47539                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47540                                  
 47541                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 47542                                  	; 15/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 47543                                  
 47544                                  _$CreateTempFile:
 47545                                  	;Enter
 47546 000081CD 55                      	push	bp
 47547 000081CE 89E5                    	mov	bp,sp
 47548                                  
 47549                                  	;LocalVar  EndPtr,DWORD
 47550                                  	;LocalVar  FilPtr,DWORD
 47551                                  	;LocalVar  Attr,WORD
 47552                                  
 47553 000081D0 83EC0A                  	sub	sp,10
 47554                                  
 47555                                  	;test	cx,0FFD8h
 47556 000081D3 F7C1D8FF                	test	CX,~attr_changeable
 47557 000081D7 7405                    	JZ	short OKatts		; Ok if no non-changeable bits set
 47558                                  
 47559                                  ; We need this "hook" here to detect these cases (like user sets one both of
 47560                                  ; vol_id and dir bits) because of the structure of the or $CreateNewFile loop
 47561                                  ; below. The code loops on error_access_denied, but if one of the non
 47562                                  ; changeable attributes is specified, the loop COULD be infinite or WILL be
 47563                                  ; infinite because CreateNewFile will fail with access_denied always. Thus we
 47564                                  ; need to detect these cases before getting to the loop.
 47565                                  
 47566                                  	;mov	ax, 5
 47567 000081D9 B80500                  	MOV	AX,error_access_denied
 47568 000081DC EB7A                    	JMP	SHORT SETTMPERR
 47569                                  
 47570                                  OKatts:
 47571                                  	;MOV	attr,CX 		; save attribute
 47572 000081DE 894EF6                  	mov     [bp-10],cx
 47573                                  	;MOV	FilPtrL,DX		; pointer to file
 47574 000081E1 8956F8                  	mov	[bp-8],dx
 47575                                  	;MOV	FilPtrH,DS
 47576 000081E4 8C5EFA                  	mov	[bp-6],ds
 47577                                  	;MOV	EndPtrH,DS		; seg pointer to end of dir
 47578 000081E7 8C5EFE                  	mov	[bp-2],ds
 47579 000081EA 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 47580 000081EB 07                      	POP	ES			; destination for nul search
 47581 000081EC 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX
 47582 000081EE 89F9                    	MOV	CX,DI
 47583 000081F0 F7D9                    	NEG	CX			; number of bytes remaining in segment
 47584                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 47585 000081F2 09C9                    	OR	CX,CX			;AN000;MS. cx=0 ? ds:dx on segment boundary
 47586 000081F4 7501                    	JNZ	short okok		;AN000;MS. no
 47587                                  	;MOV	CX,-1			;AN000;MS.
 47588                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 47589                                  	; 17/12/2022
 47590 000081F6 49                      	dec	cx  ; mov cx,-1
 47591                                  	;mov	cx,-1 ; 0FFFh
 47592                                  okok:					;AN000;
 47593 000081F7 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX			;AN000;
 47594 000081F9 F2AE                    	REPNZ	SCASB			;AN000;
 47595                                  					;AN000;
 47596 000081FB 4F                      	DEC	DI			; point back to the null
 47597 000081FC 268A45FF                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI-1]		; Get char before the NUL
 47598 00008200 E8EFDB                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; Is it a path separator?
 47599 00008203 7403                    	JZ	short SETENDPTR		; Yes
 47600                                  STOREPTH:
 47601 00008205 B05C                    	MOV	AL,'\'
 47602 00008207 AA                      	STOSB				; Add a path separator (and INC DI)
 47603                                  SETENDPTR:
 47604                                  	;MOV	EndPtrL,DI		; pointer to the tail
 47605 00008208 8856FC                  	mov	[bp-4],dl
 47606                                  CreateLoop:
 47607 0000820B 16                      	push	ss			; let ReadTime see variables
 47608 0000820C 1F                      	pop	ds
 47609 0000820D 55                      	push	bp
 47610 0000820E E87989                  	call	READTIME		; go get time
 47611 00008211 5D                      	pop	bp
 47612                                  ;
 47613                                  ; Time is in CX:DX. Go drop it into the string.
 47614                                  ;
 47615                                  	;les	di,EndPtr		; point to the string
 47616 00008212 C47EFC                  	les	di,[BP-4]
 47617 00008215 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 47618 00008217 E8A2FF                  	call	BinToAscii		; store upper word
 47619 0000821A 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx
 47620 0000821C E89DFF                  	call	BinToAscii		; store lower word
 47621 0000821F 30C0                    	xor	al,al
 47622 00008221 AA                      	STOSB				; nul terminate
 47623                                  	;LDS	DX,FilPtr		; get name
 47624 00008222 C556F8                  	lds	dx,[bp-8]
 47625                                  	;MOV	CX,Attr 		; get attr
 47626 00008225 8B4EF6                  	mov	cx,[bp-10]
 47627 00008228 55                      	push	bp
 47628 00008229 E889FF                  	CALL	_$CreateNewFile		; try to create a new file
 47629 0000822C 5D                      	pop	bp
 47630 0000822D 732A                    	JNC	short CreateDone	; failed, go try again
 47631                                  
 47632                                  ; The operation failed and the error has been mapped in AX. Grab the extended
 47633                                  ; error and figure out what to do.
 47634                                  
 47635                                  	;; MSDOS 3.3			; M049 - start
 47636                                  ;;	mov	ax,[ss:EXTERR]				;smr;SS Override
 47637                                  ;;	cmp	al,error_file_exists
 47638                                  ;;	jz	short CreateLoop	; file existed => try with new name
 47639                                  ;;	cmp	al,error_access_denied
 47640                                  ;;	jz	short CreateLoop	; access denied (attr mismatch)
 47641                                  
 47642                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 47643                                  	;cmp	al,50h
 47644 0000822F 3C50                    	CMP	AL,error_file_exists	; Q: did file already exist
 47645 00008231 74D8                    	JZ	short CreateLoop	; Y: try again
 47646                                  	;cmp	al,5
 47647 00008233 3C05                    	CMP	AL,error_access_denied	; Q: was it access denied
 47648 00008235 7521                    	JNZ	short SETTMPERR		; N: Error out
 47649                                  					; Y: Check to see if we got this due
 47650                                  					;    to the network drive. Note that
 47651                                  					;    the redir will set the exterr
 47652                                  					;    to error_cannot_make if this is 
 47653                                  					;    so.
 47654                                  ; 15/03/2024
 47655                                  %if 0
 47656                                  	CMP	byte [SS:EXTERR],error_net_access_denied ; M069
 47657                                  					; See if it's REALLY an att mismatch
 47658                                  	je	short SETTMPERR		; no, network error, stop
 47659                                  ;M070
 47660                                  ; If the user failed on an I24, we do not want to try again
 47661                                  ;
 47662                                  	cmp	byte [SS:EXTERR],error_FAIL_I24 ;User failed on I24? ;M070
 47663                                  	;je	short SETTMPERR		;yes, do not try again ;M070
 47664                                  
 47665                                  	;jmp	short CreateLoop	;attr mismatch, try again ;M070
 47666                                  	; 17/12/2022
 47667                                  	jne	short CreateLoop ; 10/06/2019 
 47668                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 47669                                  	;jz	short SETTMPERR
 47670                                  	;jmp	short CreateLoop
 47671                                  %else
 47672                                  	; 15/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 47673                                  	;;;
 47674 00008237 36A0[2403]              	mov	al,[ss:EXTERR]
 47675 0000823B 3C41                    	cmp	al,41h			; error_net_access_denied
 47676 0000823D 7419                    	je	short SETTMPERR
 47677 0000823F 3C53                    	cmp	al,53h			; error_FAIL_I24
 47678 00008241 7415                    	je	short SETTMPERR
 47679 00008243 3C50                    	cmp	al,50h			; error_file_exists
 47680 00008245 74C4                    	je	short CreateLoop
 47681 00008247 36C43E[A205]            	les	di,[ss:THISCDS]
 47682 0000824C 83FFFF                  	cmp	di,0FFFFh ; -1
 47683 0000824F 74BA                    	je	short CreateLoop	; No CDS
 47684                                  	;;test	word [es:di+43h],8000h
 47685                                  	;test	word [es:di+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet
 47686 00008251 26F6454480              	test	byte [es:di+curdir.flags+1],(curdir_isnet>>8)
 47687 00008256 75B3                    	jnz	short CreateLoop
 47688                                  	;;;
 47689                                  %endif
 47690                                  
 47691                                  ;;	MOV	AL,error_access_denied	; Return this "extended" error
 47692                                  					; M049 - end
 47693                                  SETTMPERR:
 47694 00008258 F9                      	STC
 47695                                  CreateDone:
 47696                                  	;Leave
 47697 00008259 89EC                    	mov	sp,bp
 47698 0000825B 5D                      	pop	bp
 47699 0000825C 7203                    	JC	short CreateFail
 47700 0000825E E90D84                  	jmp	SYS_RET_OK		; success!
 47701                                  CreateFail:
 47702 00008261 E91484                  	jmp	SYS_RET_ERR
 47703                                  
 47704                                  ;   SetAttrib will set the search attribute (SAttrib) either to the normal
 47705                                  ;   (CH) or to the value in CL if the current system call is through
 47706                                  ;   serverdoscall.
 47707                                  ;
 47708                                  ;   Inputs:	fSharing == FALSE => set sattrib to CH
 47709                                  ;		fSharing == TRUE => set sattrib to CL
 47710                                  ;   Outputs:	none
 47711                                  ;   Registers changed:	CX
 47712

 47739                                  ;Break	<Extended_Open- Extended open the file>
 47740                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47741                                  ; Input: AL= 0 reserved  AH=6CH
 47742                                  ;	 BX= mode
 47743                                  ;	 CL= create attribute  CH=search attribute (from server)
 47744                                  ;	 DX= flag
 47745                                  ;	 DS:SI = file name
 47746                                  ;	 ES:DI = parm list
 47747                                  ;			   DD  SET EA list (-1) null
 47748                                  ;			   DW  n  parameters
 47749                                  ;			   DB  type (TTTTTTLL)
 47750                                  ;			   DW  IOMODE

 47752                                  ; Output: carry clear

 47982                                  ;BREAK <$LockOper - Lock Calls>
 47983                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 47984                                  ;
 47985                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 47986                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle	       (DOS 3.3)
 47987                                  ;	    MOV     CX, OffsetHigh
 47988                                  ;	    MOV     DX, OffsetLow
 47989                                  ;	    MOV     SI, LengthHigh
 47990                                  ;	    MOV     DI, LengthLow
 47991                                  ;	    MOV     AH, LockOper
 47992                                  ;	    MOV     AL, Request
 47993                                  ;	    INT     21h
 47994                                  ;
 47995                                  ;   Error returns:
 47996                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 47997                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 47998                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 47999                                  ;
 48000                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 48001                                  ;	    MOV     AX, 5C??	       (DOS 4.00)
 48002                                  ;
 48003                                  ;				    0? lock all
 48004                                  ;				    8? lock write
 48005                                  ;				    ?2 lock multiple
 48006                                  ;				    ?3 unlock multiple
 48007                                  ;				    ?4 lock/read
 48008                                  ;				    ?5 write/unlock
 48009                                  ;				    ?6 add (lseek EOF/lock/write/unlock)
 48010                                  ;	    MOV     BX, Handle
 48011                                  ;	    MOV     CX, count or size
 48012                                  ;	    LDS     DX, buffer
 48013                                  ;	    INT     21h
 48014                                  ;
 48015                                  ;   Error returns:
 48016                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_handle
 48017                                  ;	       = error_invalid_function
 48018                                  ;	       = error_lock_violation
 48019                                  ;
 48020                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48021                                  
 48022                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 48023                                  
 48024                                  	; 17/03/2024
 48025                                  	; 16/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 48026

 48030

 48033 00008398 731B                    	JNC	short lock_do 		       ; have valid handle
 48034 0000839A 5F                      	POP	DI			       ; Clean stack

 48044                                  	;jmp	short lockoperr ; jmp SYS_RET_ERR

 48084                                  ;			; STACK: WORD low word of size, ES:DI -> SFT for file

 48101                                  ;	test	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet
 48102                                  ;	JZ	short LOCAL_LOCK

 48104                                  ;	mov     ax, 110Ah
 48105                                  ;	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - LOCK REGION OF FILE
 48106                                  ;			; BX = file handle, CX:DX = starting offset, SI = high word of size

 48260                                  ; LOCK_CHECK
 48261                                  ;MSDOS 6.0 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 48262                                  
 48263                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48264                                  ; Inputs:
 48265                                  ;	Outputs of SETUP
 48266                                  ;	[USER_ID] Set
 48267                                  ;	[PROC_ID] Set
 48268                                  ; Function:
 48269                                  ;	Check for lock violations on local I/O
 48270                                  ;	Retries are attempted with sleeps in between
 48271                                  ; Outputs:
 48272                                  ;    Carry clear
 48273                                  ;	Operation is OK
 48274                                  ;    Carry set
 48275                                  ;	A lock violation detected
 48276                                  ; Outputs of SETUP preserved
 48277                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48278                                  
 48279                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 48280                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 48281                                  LOCK_CHECK:
 48282 000083EC 8B1E[1A00]              	MOV	BX,[RetryCount]	; Number retries
 48283                                  LockRetry:
 48284 000083F0 53                      	push	bx		; save regs
 48285 000083F1 50                      	push	ax ; MSDOS 6.0
 48286                                  
 48287                                  	;MSDOS 3.3
 48288                                  	;Call	far [ss:JShare+(8*4)]	; 8 = chk_block
 48289                                  	;MSDOS 6.0
 48290 000083F2 FF1E[B000]              	Call	far [JShare+(8*4)]	; 8 = chk_block
 48291                                  
 48292 000083F6 58                      	pop	ax ; MSDOS 6.0
 48293 000083F7 5B                      	pop	bx		; restrore regs
 48294 000083F8 7307                    	jnc	short lc_ret_label ; There are no locks (retnc)
 48295                                  LockN:
 48296 000083FA E8E793                  	call	Idle		; wait a while
 48297 000083FD 4B                      	DEC	BX		; remember a retry
 48298 000083FE 75F0                    	JNZ	short LockRetry	; more retries left...
 48299 00008400 F9                      	STC
 48300                                  lc_ret_label:
 48301 00008401 C3                      	retn

 48304                                  ; LOCK_VIOLATION
 48305                                  ;MSDOS 6.0 (& MSDOS 3.3)

 48307                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 48309                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 48310                                  ;	[READOP] indicates whether error on read or write
 48311                                  ; Function:

 48313                                  ; Outputs:
 48314                                  ;	Carry set if user says FAIL, causes error_lock_violation

 48316                                  ;

 48333 00008415 89F9                    	MOV	CX,DI

 48345                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+29h]
 48346 00008427 268B5629                	mov	dx,[es:bp+DPB.FCLUS_FSECTOR]

 48348                                  lockv_1:
 48349 0000842D 8916[0706]              	mov     [HIGH_SECTOR],dx ; 0
 48350                                  	;;;
 48351

 48392                                  ; SHARE_CHECK
 48393                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48394                                  ; Inputs:
 48395                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to filled in local file/device SFT for new
 48396                                  ;               instance of file sf_mode ALWAYS has mode (even on FCB SFTs)
 48397                                  ;       [WFP_START] has full path of name
 48398                                  ;       [USER_ID] Set
 48399                                  ;       [PROC_ID] Set
 48400                                  ; Function:
 48401                                  ;       Check for sharing violations on local file/device access
 48402                                  ; Outputs:
 48403                                  ;    Carry clear
 48404                                  ;       Sharing approved
 48405                                  ;    Carry set
 48406                                  ;       A sharing violation detected
 48407                                  ;           AX is error code
 48408                                  ; USES    ALL but DS
 48409                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48410                                  
 48411                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 48412                                  SHARE_CHECK:
 48413                                  	; 26/07/2019

 48415                                  shchk_retn:

 48417                                  
 48418                                  ; SHARE_VIOLATION
 48419                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48420                                  ; Inputs:
 48421                                  ;       [THISDPB] Set
 48422                                  ;       AX has error code
 48423                                  ; Function:
 48424                                  ;       Handle Sharing errors
 48425                                  ; Outputs:
 48426                                  ;       Carry set if user says FAIL, causes error_sharing_violation
 48427                                  ;       Carry clear if user wants a retry
 48428                                  ;
 48429                                  ; DS, ES, DI preserved, others destroyed
 48430                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48431                                  
 48432                                  	; 19/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 48433                                  
 48434                                  SHARE_VIOLATION:
 48435 00008454 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 48436 00008455 06                      	PUSH	ES
 48437 00008456 57                      	PUSH	DI
 48438                                  	; 19/03/2024
 48439 00008457 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx	; Retro DOS v5.0
 48440                                  	;
 48441                                  	;MOV	byte [READOP],0	; All share errors are reading
 48442 00008459 8816[7505]              	mov	[READOP],dl ; 0
 48443                                  	;		
 48444                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 48445 0000845D C606[4B03]18            	MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 48446 00008462 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 48447 00008466 BF0100                  	MOV	DI,1			; Fake some registers
 48448 00008469 89F9                    	MOV	CX,DI
 48449                                  	
 48450                                  	; 19/03/2024
 48451                                  	;;mov	dx,[es:bp+17]
 48452                                  	;MOV	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.DIR_SECTOR]
 48453                                  
 48454                                  	; 19/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 48455                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 48456                                  	;;;
 48457                                   	;cmp	word [es:bp+0Fh],0
 48458 0000846B 2639560F                	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],dx ; 0
 48459 0000846F 740A                    	jz	short sharev_1 ; FAT32
 48460                                  	; FAT16 or FAT12
 48461                                  	;mov	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0
 48462 00008471 8916[0706]              	mov	[HIGH_SECTOR],dx ; 0
 48463                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+11h]

 48465 00008479 EB0C                    	jmp     short sharev_2
 48466                                  sharev_1:
 48467                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+2Bh]
 48468 0000847B 268B562B                	mov	dx,[es:bp+DPB.FCLUS_FSECTOR+2]
 48469 0000847F 8916[0706]              	mov	[HIGH_SECTOR],dx
 48470                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+29h]
 48471 00008483 268B5629                	mov	dx,[es:bp+DPB.FCLUS_FSECTOR]
 48472                                  sharev_2: 
 48473                                  	;;;
 48474 00008487 E8D2DB                  	call	HARDERR
 48475 0000848A 5F                      	POP	DI
 48476 0000848B 07                      	POP	ES
 48477 0000848C 1F                      	POP	DS
 48478 0000848D 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1
 48479 0000848F 74C2                    	jz	short shchk_retn	; 1 = retry, carry clear
 48480 00008491 F9                      	STC
 48481 00008492 C3                      	retn
 48482                                  
 48483                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48484                                  ;   ShareEnd - terminate sharing info on a particular SFT/UID/PID. This does
 48485                                  ;       NOT perform a close, it merely asserts that the sharing information
 48486                                  ;       for the SFT/UID/PID may be safely released.
 48487                                  ;
 48488                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI points to an SFT
 48489                                  ;   Outputs:    None
 48490                                  ;   Registers modified: all except DS,ES,DI
 48491                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48492                                  
 48493                                  ShareEnd:
 48494                                  	; 26/07/2019
 48495 00008493 FF1E[9800]              	call	far [JShare+(2*4)]	; 2 = MFTClose
 48496 00008497 C3                      	retn
 48497                                  
 48498                                  ;Break <ShareEnter - attempt to enter a node into the sharing set>
 48499                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48500                                  ;   ShareEnter - perform a retried entry of a nodde into the sharing set. If
 48501                                  ;   the max number of retries is exceeded, we notify the user via int 24.
 48502                                  ;
 48503                                  ;   Inputs:     ThisSFT points to the SFT
 48504                                  ;               WFP_Start points to the WFP
 48505                                  ;   Outputs:    Carry clear => successful entry
 48506                                  ;               Carry set => failed system call
 48507                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 48508                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48509                                  
 48510                                  ShareEnter:
 48511 00008498 51                      	push	cx
 48512                                  retry:
 48513 00008499 8B0E[1A00]              	mov     cx,[RetryCount]
 48514                                  attempt:
 48515 0000849D C43E[9E05]              	les     di,[THISSFT]		; grab sft
 48516 000084A1 31C0                    	XOR     AX,AX
 48517                                   	;mov	[es:di+51],ax
 48518 000084A3 26894533                	MOV     [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_MFT],AX ; indicate free SFT
 48519 000084A7 51                      	push	cx
 48520 000084A8 E8A4FF                  	call    SHARE_CHECK             ; attempt to enter into the sharing set
 48521 000084AB 59                      	pop	cx
 48522 000084AC 730A                    	jnc	short done		; success, let the user see this
 48523 000084AE E83393                  	call	Idle                    ; wait a while
 48524 000084B1 E2EA                    	loop    attempt                 ; go back for another attempt
 48525 000084B3 E89EFF                  	call    SHARE_VIOLATION         ; signal the problem to the user
 48526 000084B6 73E1                    	jnc	short retry		; user said to retry, go do it
 48527                                  done:
 48528 000084B8 59                      	pop	cx
 48529 000084B9 C3                      	retn
 48530                                  
 48531                                  ;============================================================================
 48532                                  ; EXEPATCH.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 48533                                  ;============================================================================
 48534                                  ; 29/04/2019 - Retro DOS 4.0
 48535                                  ; 20/03/2024 - Retro DOS 5.0
 48536                                  
 48537                                  ;** EXEPATCH.ASM 
 48538                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48539                                  ;	Contains the foll:
 48540                                  ;
 48541                                  ;		- code to find and overlay buggy unpack code
 48542                                  ;		- new code to be overlayed on buggy unpack code 
 48543                                  ;		- old code sequence to identify buggy unpack code
 48544                                  ;
 48545                                  ;	Revision history:
 48546                                  ;
 48547                                  ;		Created: 5/14/90
 48548                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48549                                  
 48550                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48551                                  ;
 48552                                  ; M020 : Fix for rational bug - for details see routine header
 48553                                  ; M028 : 4b04 implementation
 48554                                  ; M030 : Fixing bug in EXEPACKPATCH (EXEC_CS is an un-relocated value)
 48555                                  ; M032 : set turnoff bit only if DOS in HMA.
 48556                                  ; M033 : if IP < 2 then not exepacked.
 48557                                  ; M046 : support for a 4th version of exepacked files.
 48558                                  ; M068 : support for copy protected apps.
 48559                                  ; M071 : use A20OFF_COUNT of 10.
 48560                                  ;
 48561                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48562                                  
 48563                                  PATCH1_COM_OFFSET	EQU	06CH
 48564                                  PATCH1_OFFSET		EQU	028H
 48565                                  PATCH1_CHKSUM		EQU	0EF4EH
 48566                                  CHKSUM1_LEN		EQU	11CH/2 ; 142
 48567                                  
 48568                                  PATCH2_COM_OFFSET	EQU	076H
 48569                                  PATCH2_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 48570                                  
 48571                                  	; The strings that start at offset 076h have two possible 
 48572                                  	; check sums that are defined as PATCH2_CHKSUM PATCH2A_CHKSUM
 48573                                  
 48574                                  PATCH2_CHKSUM		EQU	78B2H
 48575                                  CHKSUM2_LEN		EQU	119H/2
 48576                                  PATCH2A_CHKSUM		EQU	1C47H		; M046
 48577                                  CHKSUM2A_LEN		EQU	103H/2		; M046
 48578                                  
 48579                                  PATCH3_COM_OFFSET	EQU	074H
 48580                                  PATCH3_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 48581                                  PATCH3_CHKSUM		EQU	4EDEH
 48582                                  CHKSUM3_LEN		EQU	117H/2
 48583                                  
 48584                                  ;**	Data structure passed for ExecReady call
 48585                                  ;
 48586                                  ;struc ERStruc
 48587                                  ; .ER_Reserved:	resw	1	; reserved, should be zero
 48588                                  ; .ER_Flags:	resw	1
 48589                                  ; .ER_ProgName:	resd	1	; ptr to ASCIIZ str of prog name
 48590                                  ; .ER_PSP:	resw	1	; PSP of the program
 48591                                  ; .ER_StartAddr: resd	1	; Start CS:IP of the program
 48592                                  ; .ER_ProgSize:	resd	1	; Program size including PSP
 48593                                  ; .size:
 48594                                  ;endstruc
 48595                                  
 48596                                  ;DOSCODE SEGMENT
 48597                                  
 48598                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 48599                                  	; DOSCODE:B3DDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 48600                                  
 48601                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 48602                                  	; DOSCODE:B37Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 48603                                  
 48604                                  	; 20/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 48605                                  	; DOSCODE:C697h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 48606                                  
 48607                                  ; M028 - BEGIN
 48608                                  
 48609                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48610                                  ;
 48611                                  ;	Procedure Name		: ExecReady
 48612                                  ;
 48613                                  ;	Input			: DS:DX -> ERStruc (see exe.inc)
 48614                                  ;
 48615                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48616                                  
 48617                                  ExecReady:
 48618 000084BA 89D6                    	mov	si,dx			; move the pointer into a friendly one
 48619                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 48620                                  	; 17/12/2022
 48621 000084BC F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 48622                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; COM or EXE ?
 48623 000084C0 7418                    	jz	short er_setver		; only setver for .COM files
 48624                                  
 48625                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 48626 000084C2 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 48627 000084C5 83C010                  	add	ax,10h
 48628 000084C8 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 48629                                  
 48630                                  	;mov	cx,[si+10]
 48631 000084CA 8B4C0A                  	mov	cx,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr]   ; M030
 48632                                  	;mov	ax,[si+12]	; 11/04/2024
 48633 000084CD 8B440C                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr+2] ; M030
 48634                                  
 48635                                  	;call	[ss:FixExePatch]
 48636 000084D0 36FF16[670D]            	call	word [ss:FixExePatch] ; 28/12/2022
 48637                                  	
 48638                                  	; 20/03/2024
 48639                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 48640 000084D5 36FF16[3E13]            	call	word [ss:Rational386PatchPtr]
 48641                                  
 48642                                  er_setver:
 48643                                  	;;test	word [si+2],2		; Q: is this an overlay
 48644                                  	; 17/12/2022
 48645 000084DA F6440202                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY ; 2
 48646                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY
 48647 000084DE 7518                    	jnz	short er_chkdoshi	; Y: set A20OFF_COUNT if DOS high
 48648                                  					; N: set up lie version first
 48649 000084E0 1E                      	push	ds
 48650 000084E1 56                      	push	si
 48651                                  	;lds	si,[si+4]
 48652 000084E2 C57404                  	lds	si,[si+ERStruc.ER_ProgName]
 48653 000084E5 E8D2EC                  	call	Scan_Execname1
 48654 000084E8 E8E3EC                  	call	Scan_Special_Entries
 48655 000084EB 5E                      	pop	si
 48656 000084EC 1F                      	pop	ds
 48657                                  	;mov	es,[si+8]
 48658 000084ED 8E4408                  	mov	es,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 48659 000084F0 36A1[BB0E]              	mov	ax,[ss:SPECIAL_VERSION]
 48660                                  	;mov	[es:40h],ax ; 11/04/2024
 48661 000084F4 26A34000                	mov	[es:PDB.Version],ax
 48662                                  
 48663                                  er_chkdoshi:
 48664 000084F8 36803E[660D]00          	cmp	byte [ss:DosHasHMA],0	; M032: Q: is dos in HMA (M021)
 48665 000084FE 741F                    	je	short er_done		; M032: N: done
 48666                                  
 48667                                  					; M068 - Start
 48668                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 48669 00008500 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]	; ax = PSP
 48670                                  
 48671                                  	;or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],4
 48672 00008503 36800E[8600]04          	or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],EXECA20OFF ; Set bit to signal int 21
 48673                                  					; ah = 25 & ah= 49. See dossym.inc 
 48674                                  					; under TAG M003 & M009 for 
 48675                                  					; explanation
 48676                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 48677                                  	; 17/12/2022
 48678 00008509 F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 48679                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; Q: COM file
 48680 0000850D 7507                    	jnz	short er_setA20		; N: inc a20off_count, set 
 48681                                  					;    a20off_psp and ret
 48682 0000850F 1E                         	push	ds
 48683 00008510 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; DS = load segment of com file.
 48684 00008512 E8AD05                  	call	IsCopyProt		; check if copy protected
 48685 00008515 1F                      	pop	ds
 48686                                  
 48687                                  er_setA20:
 48688                                  	; We need to inc the A20OFF_COUNT here. Note that if the count
 48689                                  	; is non-zero at this point it indicates that the A20 is to be 
 48690                                  	; turned off for that many int 21 calls made by the app. In 
 48691                                  	; addition the A20 has to be turned off when we exit from this 
 48692                                  	; call. Hence the inc.
 48693                                  
 48694 00008516 36FE06[8500]            	inc	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT]		
 48695 0000851B 36A3[6300]              	mov	[ss:A20OFF_PSP],ax	; set the PSP for which A20 is to be
 48696                                  					; turned OFF.
 48697                                  er_done:				; M068 - End
 48698 0000851F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 48699 00008521 C3                      	retn
 48700                                  
 48701                                  ; M028 - END
 48702                                  
 48703                                  ; 20/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 48704                                  ;%if 1
 48705                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 48706                                  ;%if 0

 48708                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48709                                  ;
 48710                                  ; procedure : Rational386Patch
 48711                                  ;
 48712                                  ; Older versions of the Rational DOS Extender have several bugs which trash
 48713                                  ; 386 registers (usually just the high word of 32 bit registers) during
 48714                                  ; interrupt processing. Lotus 123 3.1+ is a popular application that uses a
 48715                                  ; version of the Rational extender with the 32 bit register trashing bugs.
 48716                                  ;
 48717                                  ; This routine applies patches to the Rational DOS Extender to work around
 48718                                  ; most of the register trashing bugs.
 48719                                  ;
 48720                                  ; Note that there are additional register trashing bugs not fixed by these
 48721                                  ; patches. In particular, the high word of ESP and the FS and GS registers
 48722                                  ; may be modified on interrupts.
 48723                                  ;
 48724                                  ; There are two different Rational DOS Extender patchs in this module.
 48725                                  ; Rational386Patch is to correct 386 register trashing bugs on 386 or later
 48726                                  ; processors. This patch code is executed when MS-DOS is running on a 386
 48727                                  ; or later processor, regardless of whether MS-DOS is running in the HMA
 48728                                  ; or not.
 48729                                  ;
 48730                                  ; The other Rational patch routine (RationalPatch, below) fixes a register
 48731                                  ; trashing problem on 286 processors, and is only executed if MS-DOS is
 48732                                  ; running in the HMA.
 48733                                  ;
 48734                                  ; This patch detection and replacement is based on an example supplied by
 48735                                  ; Ben Williams at Rational.
 48736                                  ;
 48737                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48738                                  
 48739                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 48740                                  ; DOSCODE:B448h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 48741                                  
 48742                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48743                                  ;
 48744                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 48745                                  ;
 48746                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 48747                                  
 48748                                  rpFind1:
 48749 00008522 FAE4216033C0E6438B-     	db	0FAh, 0E4h, 21h, 60h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 43h, 8Bh, 16h
 48749 0000852B 16                 
 48750                                  
 48751                                  rpFind1Len equ	$ - rpFind1
 48752                                  
 48753                                  ;	cli
 48754                                  ;	in	al, 21h
 48755                                  ;	pusha
 48756                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 48757                                  ;	out	43h, al
 48758                                  ;	mov	dx, ...
 48759                                  
 48760                                  rpFind1a:
 48761 0000852C B00EE63733C0E6F2        	db	0B0h, 0Eh, 0E6h, 37h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 0F2h
 48762                                  
 48763                                  rpFind1aLen equ	$ - rpFind1a
 48764                                  
 48765                                  ;	mov	al, 0Eh
 48766                                  ;	out	37h, al
 48767                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 48768                                  ;	out	0F2h, al
 48769                                  
 48770                                  ; bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 48771                                  
 48772                                  rpFind2:
 48773 00008534 0F20C0                  	db	0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 48774                                  
 48775                                  rpFind2Len equ	$ - rpFind2
 48776                                  
 48777                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0	;may be preceeded by PUSH CX (51h)
 48778                                  
 48779                                  rpFind3:
 48780 00008537 0F22C0EA                	db	0Fh, 22h, 0C0h, 0EAh
 48781                                  
 48782                                  rpFind3Len equ	$ - rpFind3
 48783                                  
 48784                                  ;	mov	cr0, eax	;may be preceeded by POP CX (59h)
 48785                                  ;	jmp	far ptr xxx	;change far ptr to go to replace3
 48786                                  ;	mov	ss, bx		;8E D3 ... and come back at or after this
 48787                                  
 48788                                  ; note, there is no rpRepl1 string
 48789                                  
 48790                                  rpRepl2:
 48791 0000853B 6650510F20C0             	db	66h, 50h, 51h, 0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 48792                                  
 48793                                  rpRepl2Len equ	$ - rpRepl2
 48794                                  
 48795                                  ;	push	eax
 48796                                  ;	push	cx
 48797                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0
 48798                                  
 48799                                  rpRepl3:
 48800 00008541 8ED3596658              	db	8Eh, 0D3h, 59h, 66h, 58h
 48801                                  
 48802                                  rpRepl3Len equ	$ - rpRepl3
 48803                                  
 48804                                  ;	mov	ss, bx
 48805                                  ;	pop	cx
 48806                                  ;	pop	eax
 48807                                  
 48808                                  ; bug # 2 -- loss of high EAX and ESI on 386+ only if VCPI
 48809                                  
 48810                                  rpFind4:
 48811 00008546 93588BCC                	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 48812                                  
 48813                                  rpFind4Len equ	$ - rpFind4
 48814                                  
 48815                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 48816                                  ;	pop	ax
 48817                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 48818                                  
 48819                                  rpFind5:
 48820 0000854A B80CDECD678BE1FFE3      	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 0CDh, 67h, 8Bh, 0E1h, 0FFh, 0E3h
 48821                                  
 48822                                  rpFind5Len equ	$ - rpFind5
 48823                                  
 48824                                  ;	mov	ax, DE0Ch
 48825                                  ;	int	67h
 48826                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 48827                                  ;	jmp	bx
 48828                                  
 48829                                  rpRepl4:
 48830 00008553 93588BCC                	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 48831 00008557 2E66A3                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 0A3h
 48832                                  
 48833                                  rpRepl4o1Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 48834                                  
 48835 0000855A 0000                    	db	00h, 00h
 48836 0000855C 2E668936                	db	02Eh, 066h, 89h, 36h
 48837                                  
 48838                                  rpRepl4o2Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 48839                                  
 48840 00008560 0000                    	db	00h, 00h
 48841                                  
 48842                                  rpRepl4Len equ	$ - rpRepl4
 48843                                  
 48844                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 48845                                  ;	pop	ax
 48846                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 48847                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], eax
 48848                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], esi
 48849                                  
 48850                                  rpRepl5:
 48851 00008562 8BE1                    	db	8Bh, 0E1h
 48852 00008564 2E66A1                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 0A1h
 48853                                  
 48854                                  rpRepl5o1Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 48855                                  
 48856 00008567 0000                    	db	00h, 00h
 48857 00008569 2E668B36                	db	2Eh, 66h, 8Bh, 36h
 48858                                  
 48859                                  rpRepl5o2Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 48860                                  
 48861 0000856D 0000                    	db	00h, 00h
 48862 0000856F FFE3                    	db	0FFh, 0E3h
 48863                                  
 48864                                  rpRepl5Len equ	$ - rpRepl5
 48865                                  
 48866                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 48867                                  ;	mov	eax, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 48868                                  ;	mov	esi, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 48869                                  ;	jmp	bx
 48870                                  
 48871                                  ; bug # 3 -- loss of high EAX, EBX, ECX, EDX on 386+ only if VCPI
 48872                                  
 48873                                  rpFind6:

 48875                                  
 48876                                  rpFind6Len equ	$ - rpFind6
 48877                                  
 48878                                  ;	cli
 48879                                  ;	push	dx
 48880                                  ;	push	cx
 48881                                  
 48882                                  rpFind7a:
 48883 00008574 B80CDE6626FF1E          	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 66h, 26h, 0FFh, 1Eh
 48884                                  
 48885                                  rpFind7aLen equ	$ - rpFind7a
 48886                                  
 48887                                  ;	mov	ax, 0DE0Ch
 48888                                  ;	call	fword ptr es:[xxxx]
 48889                                  
 48890                                  rpFind7b:
 48891 0000857B 595A5B                  	db	59h, 5Ah, 5Bh
 48892                                  
 48893                                  rpFind7bLen equ	$ - rpFind7b
 48894                                  
 48895                                  ;	pop	cx
 48896                                  ;	pop	dx
 48897                                  ;	pop	bx
 48898                                  
 48899                                  rpRepl6:
 48900 0000857E FA6650665366516652      	db	0FAh, 66h, 50h, 66h, 53h, 66h, 51h, 66h, 52h
 48901                                  
 48902                                  rpRepl6Len equ	$ - rpRepl6
 48903                                  
 48904                                  ;	cli
 48905                                  ;	push	eax
 48906                                  ;	push	ebx
 48907                                  ;	push	ecx
 48908                                  ;	push	edx
 48909                                  
 48910                                  rpRepl7:

 48912

 48914                                  
 48915                                  ;	pop	edx
 48916                                  ;	pop	ecx
 48917                                  ;	pop	ebx
 48918                                  ;	pop	eax
 48919                                  ;	pop	bx
 48920

 48922                                  
 48923                                  rpFind8:

 48925

 48927                                  
 48928                                  ;	pusha
 48929                                  ;	push	es
 48930                                  ;	push	ds
 48931                                  ;	mov	ax, dgroup	;jump back to here from replace8
 48932                                  ;	mov	ds, ax
 48933

 48935 00008598 1F0761                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 61h
 48936                                  
 48937                                  rpFind9Len equ	$ - rpFind9
 48938                                  
 48939                                  ;	pop	ds
 48940                                  ;	pop	es
 48941                                  ;	popa
 48942

 48944 0000859B 6660061E                 	db	66h, 60h, 06h, 1Eh
 48945                                  
 48946                                  rpRepl8Len equ	$ - rpRepl8
 48947                                  
 48948                                  ;	pushad
 48949                                  ;	push	es
 48950                                  ;	push	ds
 48951                                  
 48952                                  rpRepl9:
 48953 0000859F 1F076661C3              	db	1Fh, 07h, 66h, 61h, 0C3h
 48954                                  
 48955                                  rpRepl9Len equ	$ - rpRepl9
 48956                                  
 48957                                  ;	pop	ds
 48958                                  ;	pop	es
 48959                                  ;	popad
 48960                                  ;	retn			;no need to jmp back to main-line
 48961

 48963                                  
 48964                                  struc SearchPair
 48965 00000000 ????                     .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 48966 00000002 ????                     .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 48967 00000004 ????                     .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 48968 00000006 ????                     .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 48969 00000008 ????                     .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 48970                                   .size:
 48971                                  endstruc

 49007 000085CA 8000                    	dw	80h

 49010                                  
 49011                                  struc StackVars
 49012 00000000 ????                     .sv_wVersion:	resw 1		; Rational extender version #
 49013 00000002 ????                     .sv_cbCodeSeg: resw 1		; code seg size to scan
 49014 00000004 ????                     .sv_pPatch:	resw 1		; offset of next avail patch byte
 49015                                   .size:
 49016                                  endstruc

 49018                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49019                                  
 49020                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 49021                                  
 49022                                  Rational386Patch:
 49023                                  	; Do a few quick checks to see if this looks like a Rational
 49024                                  	; Extended application. Hopefully this will quickly weed out
 49025                                  	; most non Rational apps.
 49026                                  
 49027 000085CC 26813E00008B01          	cmp	word [es:0],395		; version number goes here - versions
 49028 000085D3 7322                    	jae	short rp3QuickOut	;   3.95+ don't need patching
 49029                                  
 49030 000085D5 26833E0C0020            	cmp	word [es:0Ch],20h	; always has this value here
 49031 000085DB 751A                    	jne	short rp3QuickOut
 49032                                  
 49033 000085DD 50                      	push	ax ; *
 49034                                  
 49035 000085DE B81800                  	mov	ax,18h 			; extender has 18h at
 49036 000085E1 2639061800              	cmp	[es:24],ax		;   offsets 24, 28, & 36
 49037 000085E6 750E                    	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 49038 000085E8 2639061C00              	cmp	[es:28],ax
 49039 000085ED 7507                    	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 49040 000085EF 2639062400              	cmp	[es:36],ax
 49041 000085F4 7402                    	je	short rp3Maybe
 49042                                  rp3QO_ax:
 49043 000085F6 58                      	pop	ax
 49044                                  rp3QuickOut:
 49045 000085F7 C3                      	retn
 49046                                  
 49047                                  ; It might be the rational extender, do more extensive checking
 49048                                  
 49049                                  rp3Maybe:
 49050 000085F8 FC                      	cld
 49051                                  
 49052                                  ; 20/03/2024
 49053                                  %if 0
 49054                                  	push	bx			; note ax pushed above
 49055                                  	push	cx
 49056                                  	push	dx
 49057                                  	push	si
 49058                                  	push	di
 49059                                  	push	es
 49060                                  	push	ds			; we use all of them
 49061                                  	push	bp
 49062                                  %else
 49063                                  	; 20/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 49064                                  	;;;
 49065 000085F9 60                      	pusha
 49066 000085FA 06                      	push	es
 49067 000085FB 1E                      	push	ds
 49068                                  	;;;	
 49069                                  %endif
 49070 000085FC 83EC06                  	sub	sp,StackVars.size  ; 6	; make space for stack variables
 49071 000085FF 89E5                    	mov	bp,sp
 49072                                  
 49073 00008601 0E                      	push	cs
 49074 00008602 1F                      	pop	ds
 49075                                  
 49076 00008603 26A10000                	mov	ax,[es:0]		; save version #
 49077                                  	;mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],ax
 49078 00008607 894600                  	mov	[bp],ax	
 49079                                  					; check that binary version # matches
 49080 0000860A E89901                  	call	VerifyVersion		;   ascii string
 49081 0000860D 7521                    	jne	short rp3Exit_j
 49082                                  
 49083                                  ; Looks like this is it, find where to put the patch code.  The
 49084                                  ; patch will be located on top of Rational code specific to 80286
 49085                                  ; processors, so these patchs MUST NOT be applied if running on
 49086                                  ; an 80286 system.
 49087                                  
 49088                                  	; Rational says the code to patch will never be beyond offset 46xxh
 49089                                  
 49090 0000860F B90045                  	mov	cx,4500h		; force search len to 4700h (searches
 49091                                  	;mov	[bp+2],cx
 49092 00008612 894E02                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg],cx	; start at offset 200h)
 49093                                  
 49094 00008615 268E062000              	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=code segment
 49095                                  
 49096 0000861A BE[2285]                	mov	si,rpFind1		; string to find
 49097 0000861D BA0A00                  	mov	dx,rpFind1Len ; 10	; length to match
 49098 00008620 E86B01                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq
 49099 00008623 740E                    	jz	short rpGotPatch
 49100                                  
 49101                                  ; According to Rational, some very old versions of the extender may not
 49102                                  ; have the find1 code sequence. If the find1 code wasn't found above,
 49103                                  ; try an alternative patch area which is on top of NEC 98xx switching code.
 49104                                  
 49105 00008625 BE[2C85]                	mov	si,rpFind1a
