 49311                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49312                                  ;
 49313                                  ; FindBadCode
 49314                                  ;
 49315                                  ; Searches Rational code segment looking for a pair of find strings (all
 49316                                  ; patches have at least two find strings).
 49317                                  ;
 49318                                  ; Entry:
 49319                                  ;	ES    = code segment to search
 49320                                  ;	DS:BX = search pair structure for this search
 49321                                  ;	[bp].sv_cbCodeSeg = length of code seg to search
 49322                                  ;
 49323                                  ; Exit:
 49324                                  ;	CY flag clear if both strings found, and
 49325                                  ;	SI    = offset in ES of 1st string
 49326                                  ;	DI    = offset in ES of 2nd string
 49327                                  ;	CY set if either string not found, or strings too far apart
 49328                                  ;
 49329                                  ; Used:
 49330                                  ;	CX
 49331                                  ;
 49332                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49333                                  
 49334                                  ;struc SearchPair
 49335                                  ; .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 49336                                  ; .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 49337                                  ; .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 49338                                  ; .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 49339                                  ; .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 49340                                  ; .size:
 49341                                  ;endstruc
 49342                                  
 49343                                  FindBadCode:
 49344                                  	;mov	cx,[bp+2]
 49345 00008739 8B4E02                  	mov	cx,[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg]	; search length
 49346                                  
 49347 0000873C 8B37                    	mov	si,[bx]	; mov si,[bx+0]
 49348                                  	;mov	si,[bx+Searchpair.sp_off1] ; ds:si -> search string
 49349                                  	
 49350                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+2]
 49351 0000873E 8B5702                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len1] ; dx = search len
 49352 00008741 E84A00                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 49353 00008744 751A                    	jnz	short fbc_error		; done if 1st not found
 49354                                  
 49355 00008746 57                      	push	di			; save 1st string offset
 49356                                  
 49357                                  	;mov	si,[bx+4]
 49358 00008747 8B7704                  	mov	si,[bx+SearchPair.sp_off2]
 49359                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+6]
 49360 0000874A 8B5706                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len2]
 49361 0000874D E84100                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di		; don't change flags after this!
 49362                                  
 49363 00008750 5E                      	pop	si			; restore 1st string offset
 49364 00008751 750D                    	jnz	short fbc_error
 49365                                  
 49366 00008753 89F8                    	mov	ax,di			; sanity check that
 49367 00008755 29F0                    	sub	ax,si			;   si < di && di - si <= allowed diff
 49368 00008757 7207                    	jc	short fbc_error
 49369                                  	;cmp	ax,[bx+8]
 49370 00008759 3B4708                  	cmp	ax,[bx+SearchPair.sp_diff]
 49371 0000875C 7702                    	ja	short fbc_error
 49372                                  
 49373 0000875E F8                      	clc
 49374 0000875F C3                      	retn
 49375                                  
 49376                                  fbc_error:
 49377 00008760 F9                      	stc
 49378 00008761 C3                      	retn
 49379                                  
 49380                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49381                                  ;
 49382                                  ; GenPatch
 49383                                  ;
 49384                                  ; Generate a patch sequence. 1) insert a jump at the buggy code location
 49385                                  ; (jumps to the patch code area), 2) copy the selected patch code to the
 49386                                  ; patch area, 3) insert a jump from the patch area back to the main-line
 49387                                  ; code.
 49388                                  ;
 49389                                  ; Entry:
 49390                                  ;	ES:DI = start of buggy code to be patched
 49391                                  ;	DX    = length of buggy code to be patched
 49392                                  ;	DS:SI = replacement patch code
 49393                                  ;	CX    = length of replacement patch code
 49394                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 49395                                  ;
 49396                                  ; Exit:
 49397                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after generated patch code
 49398                                  ;
 49399                                  ; Used:
 49400                                  ;	AX, BX, SI, Flags
 49401                                  ;
 49402                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49403                                  
 49404                                  GenPatch:
 49405 00008762 57                      	push	di			;save offset of buggy code
 49406                                  
 49407                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 49408 00008763 8B5E04                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]
 49409                                  					;jump from buggy code to patch area
 49410 00008766 E81900                  	call	GenJump
 49411                                  
 49412 00008769 E80A00                  	call	CopyPatch		;copy replacement code to patch area
 49413                                  
 49414 0000876C 5B                      	pop	bx			;offset of buggy code + buggy code
 49415 0000876D 01D3                    	add	bx,dx			;  length = return from patch offset
 49416                                  
 49417 0000876F E81000                  	call	GenJump 		;jump from patch area back to main-
 49418                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 49419 00008772 897E04                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di
 49420                                  					;  line code, update patch pointer
 49421 00008775 C3                      	retn
 49422                                  
 49423                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49424                                  ;
 49425                                  ; CopyPatch
 49426                                  ;
 49427                                  ; Copies patch code to patch location.
 49428                                  ;
 49429                                  ; Entry:
 49430                                  ;	DS:SI = patch code to be copied
 49431                                  ;	ES    = segment of code to patch
 49432                                  ;	CX    = length of code to copy
 49433                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 49434                                  ;
 49435                                  ; Exit:
 49436                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after copied patch code
 49437                                  ;
 49438                                  ; Used:
 49439                                  ;	SI, Flags
 49440                                  ;
 49441                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49442                                  
 49443                                  CopyPatch:
 49444 00008776 51                      	push	cx
 49445                                  	;mov	di,[bp+4]
 49446 00008777 8B7E04                  	mov	di,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch] ;patch pointer is the dest offset
 49447 0000877A FC                      	cld
 49448 0000877B F3A4                    	rep movsb
 49449 0000877D 59                      	pop	cx
 49450                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 49451 0000877E 897E04                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di ;update net pointer location
 49452 00008781 C3                      	retn
 49453                                  
 49454                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49455                                  ;
 49456                                  ; GenJump
 49457                                  ;
 49458                                  ; Generates a rel16 JMP instruction at location 'from' to location 'to'.
 49459                                  ;
 49460                                  ; Entry:
 49461                                  ;	ES:DI = from location (where to put jmp instruction)
 49462                                  ;	BX    = to location (where to jump to)
 49463                                  ;
 49464                                  ; Exit:
 49465                                  ;	DI = byte after generated jump
 49466                                  ;
 49467                                  ; Used:
 49468                                  ;	AX
 49469                                  ;
 49470                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49471                                  
 49472                                  GenJump:
 49473 00008782 B0E9                    	mov	al,0E9h		; jmp rel16 opcode
 49474 00008784 AA                      	stosb
 49475                                  
 49476 00008785 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx		; calc offset to 'to' location
 49477 00008787 29F8                    	sub	ax,di
 49478 00008789 83E802                  	sub	ax,2
 49479                                  
 49480 0000878C AB                      	stosw			; output offset
 49481                                  
 49482 0000878D C3                      	retn
 49483                                  
 49484                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49485                                  ;
 49486                                  ; ScanCodeSeq
 49487                                  ;
 49488                                  ; Looks for a pattern pointed to by DS:SI & len DX in ES:200 to ES:200+CX-1
 49489                                  ;
 49490                                  ; returns in ES:DI the start of the pattern if Zero flag is set
 49491                                  ;
 49492                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49493                                  
 49494                                  ScanCodeSeq:
 49495 0000878E BF0002                  	mov	di,200h
 49496                                  ScanCodeSeq_di:
 49497 00008791 51                      	push	cx
 49498 00008792 29D1                    	sub	cx,dx
 49499 00008794 41                      	inc	cx
 49500                                  scsagain:
 49501 00008795 56                      	push	si
 49502 00008796 57                      	push	di
 49503 00008797 51                      	push	cx
 49504 00008798 89D1                    	mov	cx,dx
 49505 0000879A F3A6                    	rep	cmpsb
 49506 0000879C 59                      	pop	cx
 49507 0000879D 5F                      	pop	di
 49508 0000879E 5E                      	pop	si
 49509 0000879F 7403                    	je	short scsfound
 49510 000087A1 47                      	inc	di
 49511 000087A2 E2F1                    	loop	scsagain
 49512                                  scsfound:
 49513 000087A4 59                      	pop	cx
 49514                                  vvexit:		; 18/12/2022
 49515 000087A5 C3                      	retn
 49516                                  	
 49517                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49518                                  ;
 49519                                  ; VerifyVersion
 49520                                  ;
 49521                                  ; Checks whether the binary version from ES:0 matches the ASCII version
 49522                                  ; from ES:2A.
 49523                                  ;
 49524                                  ;       Entry: AX = binary version number 
 49525                                  ;       Exit : Z flag set if version numbers match
 49526                                  ;
 49527                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 49528                                  
 49529                                  VerifyVersion:
 49530 000087A6 268B362A00              	mov	si,[es:2Ah]		; offset of version number
 49531                                  					;  in ascii
 49532 000087AB B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 49533 000087AD 83C603                  	add	si,3			; point to last digit
 49534                                  
 49535 000087B0 E80E00                  	call	VVDigit
 49536 000087B3 75F0                    	jne	short vvexit
 49537 000087B5 E80900                  	call	VVDigit
 49538 000087B8 75EB                    	jne	short vvexit
 49539 000087BA 26803C2E                	cmp	byte [es:si],'.'
 49540 000087BE 75E5                    	jne	short vvexit
 49541 000087C0 4E                      	dec	si
 49542                                  	;call	VVDigit
 49543                                  	; 18/12/2022
 49544                                  	;jmp	short VVDigit
 49545                                  ;vvexit:
 49546                                  	;retn
 49547                                  VVDigit:
 49548 000087C1 F6F3                    	div	bl
 49549 000087C3 80C430                  	add	ah,'0'
 49550 000087C6 4E                      	dec	si
 49551 000087C7 26386401                	cmp	[es:si+1],ah
 49552 000087CB B400                    	mov	ah,0			; do not xor or sub we need Z
 49553 000087CD C3                      	retn
 49554                                  
 49555                                  ; 20/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 49556                                  ;%endif

 49825                                  	;jmp	short ExePackPatch
 49826                                  
 49827                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 49828                                  ;
 49829                                  ; Procedure Name 	: ExePackPatch
 49830                                  ;
 49831                                  ; Inputs	 	: DS 			-> DOSDATA
 49832                                  ;			  ES:0 			-> read in image
 49833                                  ;			  ax:cx = start cs:ip of program
 49834                                  ; Output		:		
 49835                                  ;
 49836                                  ;	1. If ES <= 0fffh
 49837                                  ;	   2. if exepack signature ('RB') found
 49838                                  ;	      3. if common code to patch compares (for 3 diff. versions)
 49839                                  ;	       	 4. if rest of the code & checksum compares
 49840                                  ;	  	    5. overlay buggy code with code in 
 49841                                  ;		       doscode:str1.
 49842                                  ;		 6. endif
 49843                                  ;	      7. endif
 49844                                  ;	   8. endif
 49845                                  ;	9. endif
 49846                                  ;
 49847                                  ;
 49848                                  ; Uses			: NONE
 49849                                  ;
 49850                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 49851                                  	
 49852                                  	; 21/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 49853                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 49854                                  	; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 49855                                  ExePackPatch:
 49856 00008927 53                      	push	bx
 49857 00008928 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; bx has load segment
 49858 0000892A 81FBFF0F                	cmp	bx,0FFFh		; Q: is the load segment > 64K
 49859 0000892E 7602                    	jbe	short ep_cont		; N: 
 49860 00008930 5B                      	pop	bx			; Y: no need to patch
 49861 00008931 C3                      	retn
 49862                                  ep_cont:
 49863 00008932 1E                      	push	ds
 49864 00008933 06                      	push	es
 49865 00008934 50                      	push	ax
 49866 00008935 51                      	push	cx
 49867 00008936 56                      	push	si
 49868 00008937 57                      	push	di
 49869                                  	
 49870                                  		; M033 - start
 49871                                  		; exepacked programs have an IP of 12h (>=2)
 49872                                  
 49873 00008938 83E902                  	sub	cx,2			; Q: is IP >=2
 49874 0000893B 7303                    	jnb	short epp_1		; N: exit
 49875 0000893D E9B500                  	jmp	ep_notpacked
 49876                                  					; ax:cx now points to location of
 49877                                  					; 'RB' if this is an exepacked file.
 49878                                  		; M033 - end
 49879                                  epp_1:
 49880 00008940 89CF                    	mov	di,cx
 49881 00008942 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 49882 00008944 36893E[8700]            	mov	[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET],di	; save pointer to 'RB' in
 49883                                  					; unpack_offset
 49884                                  
 49885 00008949 26813D5242              	cmp	word [es:di],'RB' ; 4252h
 49886                                  	;ljne	ep_notpacked
 49887 0000894E 7403                    	je	short epp_2
 49888 00008950 E9A200                  	jmp	ep_notpacked
 49889                                  epp_2:
 49890 00008953 0E                      	push	cs
 49891 00008954 1F                      	pop	ds			; set ds to cs
 49892                                  
 49893                                  	;add	di,6Ch
 49894 00008955 83C76C                  	add	di,PATCH1_COM_OFFSET	; es:di -> points to place in packed
 49895                                  					;          file where we hope to find
 49896                                  					;	   scan string. 
 49897                                  
 49898 00008958 E8A200                  	call	chk_common_str		; check for match
 49899                                  
 49900 0000895B 7521                    	jnz	short ep_chkpatch2	; Q: does the patch match
 49901                                  					; N: check at patch2_offset
 49902                                  					; Y: check for rest of patch string
 49903 0000895D BE[3488]                	mov	si,scan_patch1
 49904                                  					; ds:si -> scan string 
 49905 00008960 368B3E[8700]            	mov	di,[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET]	; restore di to point to 'RB'
 49906                                  
 49907                                  	;add	di,28h
 49908                                  	; 07/12/2022
 49909 00008965 83C728                  	add	di,PATCH1_OFFSET	; es:di -> points to place in packed
 49910                                  					;          file where we hope to find
 49911                                  					;	   scan string. 
 49912                                  	;;mov	cx,68
 49913                                  	;mov	cx,size_scan_patch1
 49914                                  	; 21/03/2024
 49915 00008968 B144                    	mov	cl,size_scan_patch1 ; 68
 49916                                  
 49917                                  	;mov	bx,142
 49918 0000896A BB8E00                  	mov	bx,CHKSUM1_LEN
 49919                                  	;mov	ax,0EF4Eh
 49920 0000896D B84EEF                  	mov	ax,PATCH1_CHKSUM
 49921 00008970 E89E00                  	call	chk_patchsum		; check if patch and chk sum compare
 49922 00008973 7207                    	jc	short ep_done1		; Q: did we pass the test
 49923                                  					; N: exit
 49924                                  					; Y: overlay code with new 
 49925 00008975 BE[CE87]                	mov	si,str1
 49926                                  	;;mov	cx,102
 49927                                  	;mov	cx,size_str1
 49928                                  	; 21/03/2024
 49929 00008978 B166                    	mov	cl,size_str1 ; 102
 49930                                  
 49931 0000897A F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 49932                                  ep_done1:
 49933 0000897C EB77                    	jmp	short ep_done ; 21/03/2024
 49934                                  
 49935                                  ep_chkpatch2:
 49936                                  	;mov	di,76h
 49937 0000897E BF7600                  	mov	di,PATCH2_COM_OFFSET	; es:di -> possible location of patch
 49938                                  					; in another version of unpack
 49939 00008981 E87900                  	call	chk_common_str		; check for match
 49940                                  
 49941 00008984 753D                    	jnz	short ep_chkpatch3	; Q: does the patch match
 49942                                  					; N: check for patch3_offset
 49943                                  					; Y: check for rest of patch string
 49944                                  
 49945 00008986 BE[7888]                	mov	si,scan_patch2
 49946                                  					; ds:si -> scan string
 49947                                  	;mov	di,32h
 49948 00008989 BF3200                  	mov	di,PATCH2_OFFSET	; es:di -> points to place in packed
 49949                                  					;          file where we hope to find

 49951                                  	;mov	cx,size_scan_patch2

 49953 0000898C B144                    	mov	cl,size_scan_patch2 ; 68

 49956                                  	;mov	ax,78B2h
 49957 00008991 B8B278                  	mov	ax,PATCH2_CHKSUM
 49958 00008994 E87A00                  	call	chk_patchsum		; check if patch and chk sum compare
 49959                                  
 49960                                  					; M046 - Start
 49961                                  					; Q: did we pass the test
 49962 00008997 7310                    	jnc	short ep_patchcode2	; Y: overlay code with new
 49963                                  					; N: try with a different chksum
 49964                                  
 49965 00008999 BE[7888]                	mov	si,scan_patch2
 49966                                  					; ds:si -> scan string
 49967                                  	;;mov	cx,68
 49968                                  	;mov	cx,size_scan_patch2
 49969                                  	; 21/03/2024
 49970 0000899C B144                    	mov	cl,size_scan_patch2 ; 68

 49973                                  	;mov	ax,1C47h
 49974 000089A1 B8471C                  	mov	ax,PATCH2A_CHKSUM
 49975 000089A4 E86A00                  	call	chk_patchsum		; check if patch and chk sum compare
 49976                                  					; Q: did we pass the test
 49977 000089A7 724C                    	jc	short ep_notpacked	; N: try with a different chksum
 49978                                  					; Y: overlay code with new
 49979                                  						
 49980                                  ep_patchcode2:			       	; M046 - End
 49981 000089A9 BE[CE87]                	mov	si,str1
 49982                                  	;;mov	cx,3
 49983                                  	;mov	cx,first_stop
 49984                                  	; 21/03/2024
 49985 000089AC B103                    	mov	cl,first_stop ; 3
 49986 000089AE F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 49987 000089B0 B89048                  	mov	ax,4890h		; ax = opcodes for dec ax, nop

 50079                                  ; 	Procedure Name	: chk_common_str
 50080                                  ;
 50081                                  ;	Input		: DS = DOSCODE
 50082                                  ;			; ES:DI points to string in packed file
 50083                                  ;
 50084                                  ;	Output		; Z if match else NZ

 50089                                  chk_common_str:
 50090 000089FD BE[FE88]                	mov	si,scan_com
 50091                                  					; ds:si -> scan string 
 50092                                  	;mov	cx,32
 50093 00008A00 B92000                  	mov	cx,size_scan_com
 50094                                  
 50095 00008A03 F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb
 50096                                  
 50097                                  					; M046 - start
 50098                                  	; a fourth possible version of these exepacked programs have a
 50099                                  	; 056h instead of 06Bh. See scan_com above
 50100                                  	;
 50101                                  	; 	db  75h, 6Bh		;jne CorruptExe
 50102                                  	;
 50103                                  	; If the mismatch at this point is due to a 56h instead of 6Bh
 50104                                  	; we shall try to match the rest of the string
 50105                                  	;
 50106                                  
 50107 00008A05 7409                    	jz	short ccs_done
 50108 00008A07 26807DFF56              	cmp	byte [es:di-1],56h
 50109 00008A0C 7502                    	jnz	short ccs_done

 50115                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50116                                  ;
 50117                                  ;	Procedure Name	: chk_patchsum
 50118                                  ;
 50119                                  ;	Input		: DS:SI -> string we're looking for
 50120                                  ;			: ES:DI -> offset in packed file
 50121                                  ;			: CX 	= scan length
 50122                                  ;			: BX	= length of check sum
 50123                                  ;			: AX 	= value of check sum
 50124                                  ;
 50125                                  ;	Output		: if patch & check sum compare
 50126                                  ;				NC
 50127                                  ;			  else
 50128                                  ;				CY
 50129                                  ;
 50130                                  ;	Uses		: AX, BX, CX, SI
 50131                                  ;
 50132                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50133                                  
 50134                                  	; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 50135                                  chk_patchsum:
 50136 00008A11 57                      	push	di
 50137                                  
 50138 00008A12 F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb
 50139                                  
 50140 00008A14 7518                    	jnz	short cp_fail		; Q: does the patch match
 50141                                  					; N: exit
 50142                                  					; Y:
 50143                                  
 50144                                  		; we do a check sum starting from the location of the
 50145                                  		; exepack signature 'RB' up to 11c/2 bytes, the end of the
 50146                                  		; unpacking code.
 50147                                  
 50148 00008A16 368B3E[8700]            	mov	di,[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET]	; di -> start of unpack code
 50149 00008A1B 89D9                    	mov	cx,bx			; cx = length of check sum
 50150                                  
 50151 00008A1D 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; save check sum passed to us in bx
 50152 00008A1F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 50153                                  ep_chksum:
 50154 00008A21 260305                  	add	ax,[es:di]
 50155 00008A24 83C702                  	add	di,2
 50156 00008A27 E2F8                    	loop	ep_chksum
 50157                                  
 50158 00008A29 5F                      	pop	di			; restore di
 50159                                  
 50160 00008A2A 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		 	; Q: does the check sum match
 50161                                  	;jne	short cp_fail		; N: exit
 50162                                  					; Y:
 50163                                  	; 25/09/2023
 50164                                  	;clc	
 50165                                  	;retn
 50166 00008A2C 74E2                    	je	short ccs_done ; cf=0
 50167                                  	
 50168                                  cp_fail:
 50169 00008A2E F9                      	stc
 50170 00008A2F C3                      	retn

 50179                                  ; M020 : BEGIN
 50180                                  ;
 50181                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50182                                  ;
 50183                                  ; procedure : RationalPatch
 50184                                  ;
 50185                                  ; A routine (in Ration DOS extender) which is invoked at hardware interrupts
 50186                                  ; clobbers CX register on 286 machines. (123 release 3 uses Rational DOS
 50187                                  ; extender). This routine identifies Buggy Rational EXEs and fixes the bug.
 50188                                  ;
 50189                                  ; THE BUG is in the following code sequence:
 50190                                  ;
 50191                                  ;8b 0e 10 00	mov	cx, ds:[10h]		; delay count
 50192                                  ;90		even				; word align
 50193                                  ;e2 fe		loop	$			; wait		CLOBBERS CX
 50194                                  ;e8 xx xx	call	set_A20			; enable A20
 50195                                  ;
 50196                                  ; This patch routine replaces the mov & the loop with a far call into a
 50197                                  ; routine in DOS data segment which is in low memory (because A20 line
 50198                                  ; is off). The routine (RatBugCode) in DOS data saves & restores CX around
 50199                                  ; a mov & loop.
 50200                                  ;
 50201                                  ; Identification of Buggy Rational EXE
 50202                                  ; ====================================
 50203                                  ;
 50204                                  ; (ALL OFFSETS ARE IN THE PROGRAM SECTION - EXCLUDING THE EXE HEADER)
 50205                                  ;
 50206                                  ; OFFSET				Contains
 50207                                  ; ------				--------
 50208                                  ; 0000h			100 times Version number in binary
 50209                                  ;			bug exists in version 3.48 thru 3.83 (both inclusive)
 50210                                  ;
 50211                                  ; 000ah			the WORDS : 0000h, 0020h, 0000h, 0040h, 0001h
 50212                                  ;
 50213                                  ; 002ah			offset where version number is stored in ASCII
 50214                                  ;				e.g. '3.48A'
 50215                                  ;
 50216                                  ; 0030h			offset of copyright string. Copyright strings either
 50217                                  ;			start with "DOS/16M Copyright...." or
 50218                                  ;			"Copyright.....". The string contains
 50219                                  ;			"Rational Systems, Inc."
 50220                                  ;
 50221                                  ; 0020h			word : Paragraph offset of the buggy code segment
 50222                                  ;				from the program image
 50223                                  ; 0016h			word : size of buggy code segment
 50224                                  ;
 50225                                  ;	Buggy code is definite to start after offset 200h in its segment
 50226                                  ;
 50227                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50228                                  
 50229                                  ; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 50230                                  ; DOSCODE:B976h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 50231                                  
 50232                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 50233                                  ; DOSCODE:B654h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 50234                                  
 50235                                  RScanPattern1:
 50236 00008A30 000020000000400001-     	db	0, 0, 20h, 0, 0, 0, 40h, 0, 1, 0
 50236 00008A39 00                 
 50237                                  
 50238                                  RLen1 equ $ - RScanPattern1
 50239                                  
 50240                                  RScanPattern2:
 50241 00008A3A 8B0E100090E2FEE8        	db	8Bh, 0Eh, 10h, 00h, 90h, 0E2h, 0FEh, 0E8h
 50242                                  
 50243                                  RLen2 equ $ - RScanPattern2
 50244                                  
 50245                                  RScanPattern3:
 50246 00008A42 8B0E1000E2FEE8          	db	8Bh, 0Eh, 10h, 00h, 0E2h, 0FEh, 0E8h
 50247                                  
 50248                                  RLen3 equ $ - RScanPattern2
 50249                                  
 50250                                  ; DOSCODE:B98Fh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 50251                                  ; DOSCODE:B66Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 50252                                  
 50253                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50254                                  ;
 50255                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 50256                                  ;
 50257                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50258                                  
 50259                                  	; 21/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 50260                                  	; DOSCODE:CC2Fh (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 50261                                  
 50262                                  RationalPatch:
 50263 00008A49 FC                      	cld
 50264                                  
 50265                                  ; 21/03/2024
 50266                                  %if 0
 50267                                  	push	ax
 50268                                  	push	bx
 50269                                  	push	cx
 50270                                  	push	dx
 50271                                  	push	si
 50272                                  	push	di
 50273                                  %else
 50274                                  	; 21/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 50275                                  	;;;
 50276 00008A4A 60                      	pusha
 50277                                  	;;;
 50278                                  %endif
 50279 00008A4B 06                      	push	es
 50280 00008A4C 1E                      	push	ds			; we use all of them
 50281 00008A4D BF0A00                  	mov	di,0Ah			; look for pat1 at offset 0Ah
 50282 00008A50 0E                      	push	cs
 50283 00008A51 1F                      	pop	ds
 50284                                  	
 50285 00008A52 BE[308A]                	mov	si,RScanPattern1
 50286                                  	;mov	cx,10
 50287 00008A55 B90A00                  	mov	cx,RLen1
 50288 00008A58 F3A6                    	rep	cmpsb			; do we have the pattern ?
 50289 00008A5A 754A                    	jne	short rpexit
 50290 00008A5C 26A10000                	mov	ax,[es:0]
 50291 00008A60 3D5C01                  	cmp	ax,348			; is it a buggy version ?
 50292 00008A63 7241                    	jb	short rpexit
 50293 00008A65 3D7F01                  	cmp	ax,383			; is it a buggy version ?
 50294 00008A68 773C                    	ja	short rpexit
 50295                                  
 50296 00008A6A E839FD                  	call	VerifyVersion
 50297 00008A6D 7537                    	jne	short rpexit
 50298                                  
 50299 00008A6F 268B0E1600              	mov	cx,[es:16h]		; Length of buggy code seg
 50300 00008A74 81E90002                	sub	cx,200h			; Length we search (we start
 50301                                  					;  at offset 200h)
 50302 00008A78 268E062000              	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=buggy code segment
 50303 00008A7D BE[3A8A]                	mov	si,RScanPattern2
 50304                                  	;mov	dx,8	
 50305 00008A80 BA0800                  	mov	dx,RLen2
 50306 00008A83 E808FD                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq with nop
 50307 00008A86 740B                    	jz	short rpfound
 50308                                  
 50309 00008A88 BE[428A]                	mov	si,RScanPattern3
 50310                                  	;mov	dx,15
 50311 00008A8B BA0F00                  	mov	dx,RLen3
 50312 00008A8E E8FDFC                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq w/o nop
 50313 00008A91 7513                    	jnz	short rpexit
 50314                                  
 50315                                  rpfound:
 50316                                  	
 50317                                  ;	we set up a far call into DOS data
 50318                                  ;	dx has the length of the code seq we were searching for
 50319                                  
 50320 00008A93 B09A                    	mov	al,9Ah			; far call opcode
 50321 00008A95 AA                      	stosb
 50322 00008A96 B8[2611]                	mov	ax,RatBugCode
 50323 00008A99 AB                      	stosw
 50324 00008A9A 8CD0                    	mov	ax,ss
 50325 00008A9C AB                      	stosw
 50326 00008A9D 89D1                    	mov	cx,dx
 50327 00008A9F 83E906                  	sub	cx,6			; filler (with NOPs)
 50328 00008AA2 B090                    	mov	al,90h
 50329 00008AA4 F3AA                    	rep	stosb
 50330                                  rpexit:
 50331 00008AA6 1F                      	pop	ds
 50332 00008AA7 07                      	pop	es
 50333                                  
 50334                                  ; 21/03/2024
 50335                                  %if 0
 50336                                  	pop	di
 50337                                  	pop	si
 50338                                  	pop	dx
 50339                                  	pop	cx
 50340                                  	pop	bx
 50341                                  	pop	ax
 50342                                  %else
 50343                                  	; 21/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 50344                                  	;;;
 50345 00008AA8 61                      	popa
 50346                                  	;;;
 50347                                  %endif
 50348 00008AA9 C3                      	retn
 50349                                  
 50350                                  ; M020 END

 50357                                  ;
 50358                                  ;	M068
 50359                                  ;
 50360                                  ; 	Procedure Name	: IsCopyProt
 50361                                  ;
 50362                                  ;	Inputs		: DS:100 -> start of com file just read in
 50363                                  ;
 50364                                  ;	Outputs		: sets the A20OFF_COUNT variable to 10 if 
 50365                                  ;			  the program loaded in DS:100 uses a MICROSOFT
 50366                                  ;			  copy protect scheme that relies on the A20 line
 50367                                  ;			  being turned off for it's scheme to work.
 50368                                  ;
 50369                                  ;			  Note: The int 21 function dispatcher will turn 
 50370                                  ;				a20 off, if the A20OFF_COUNT is non-zero 
 50371                                  ;				and dec the A20OFF_COUNT before	iretting 
 50372                                  ;				to the user. 
 50373                                  ;
 50374                                  ;	Uses		: ES, DI, SI, CX
 50375                                  ;
 50376                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50377                                  
 50378                                  ; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 50379                                  
 50380                                  CPStartOffset	EQU	0175h
 50381                                  CPID1Offset	EQU	011Bh
 50382                                  CPID2Offset	EQU	0173h
 50383                                  CPID3Offset	EQU	0146h
 50384                                  CPID4Offset	EQU	0124h
 50385                                  ID1		EQU	05343h
 50386                                  ID2		EQU	05044h
 50387                                  ID3		EQU	0F413h
 50388                                  ID4		EQU	08000h
 50389                                  
 50390                                  ; DOSCODE:B9FAh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 50391                                  
 50392                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 50393                                  ; DOSCODE:B71Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 50394                                  
 50395                                  ; 21/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 50396                                  ; DOSCODE:CC90h (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 50397                                  
 50398                                  CPScanPattern:
 50399 00008AAA 89264801                	db	89h,26h,48h,01h		 ; mov [148],sp
 50400 00008AAE 8C0E4C01                	db	8Ch,0Eh,4Ch,01h		 ; mov [14C],cs
 50401 00008AB2 C7064A010001            	db	0C7h,06h,4Ah,01h,00h,01h ; mov [14A],100h 
 50402 00008AB8 8C0E1301                	db 	8Ch,0Eh,13h,01h		 ; mov [113],cs
 50403 00008ABC B82001                  	db	0B8h,20h,01h		 ; mov ax,120h
 50404 00008ABF BE0001                  	db	0BEh,00h,01h		 ; mov si,100h
 50405                                  
 50406                                  CPSPlen	EQU $ - CPScanPattern
 50407                                  
 50408                                  ; DOSCODE:BA12h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 50409                                  ; DOSCODE:B734h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 50410                                  ; 21/03/2024
 50411                                  ; DOSCODE:CCA8h (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 50412                                  
 50413                                  IsCopyProt:
 50414 00008AC2 813E1B014353            	cmp	word [CPID1Offset],ID1
 50415 00008AC8 752D                    	jne	short CP_done
 50416                                  
 50417 00008ACA 813E73014450            	cmp	word [CPID2Offset],ID2
 50418 00008AD0 7525                    	jne	short CP_done
 50419                                  
 50420 00008AD2 813E460113F4            	cmp	word [CPID3Offset],ID3
 50421 00008AD8 751D                    	jne	short CP_done
 50422                                  
 50423 00008ADA 813E24010080            	cmp	word [CPID4Offset],ID4
 50424 00008AE0 7515                    	jne	short CP_done
 50425                                  
 50426 00008AE2 0E                      	push	cs
 50427 00008AE3 07                      	pop	es
 50428 00008AE4 BF[AA8A]                	mov	di,CPScanPattern	; es:di -> Pattern to find
 50429                                  
 50430 00008AE7 BE7501                  	mov	si,CPStartOffset	; ds:si -> possible location 
 50431                                  					; of pattern
 50432                                  
 50433 00008AEA B91800                  	mov	cx,CPSPlen ; 24		; cx = length of pattern
 50434 00008AED F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb
 50435 00008AEF 7506                    	jnz	short CP_done
 50436                                  
 50437 00008AF1 36C606[8500]0A          	mov	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT],0Ah ; M071
 50438                                  CP_done:
 50439 00008AF7 C3                      	retn
 50440

 50504                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50505                                  ;
 50506                                  ; Procedure Name : WhatCPUType
 50507                                  ;
 50508                                  ; Inputs	 : none
 50509                                  ;
 50510                                  ; Outputs	 : AL = 0 if CPU <  286
 50511                                  ;		      = 1 if CPU == 286
 50512                                  ;		      = 2 if CPU >= 386
 50513                                  ;
 50514                                  ; Regs. Mod.	 : AX
 50515                                  ;
 50516                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50517                                  
 50518                                  WhatCPUType:
 50519                                  	; 25/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 50520                                  	;get_cpu_type	; done with a MACRO which can't be generated > once
 50521                                  
 50522                                  	;CPUTYPE.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 50523                                  
 50524                                  ; Note: this must be a macro, and not a subroutine in the BIOS since
 50525                                  ; 	it is called from both CODE and SYSINITSEG.
 50526                                  ;
 50527                                  ;------GET_CPU_TYPE-----------------------------------May, 88 by M.Williamson
 50528                                  ;  Returns: AX = 0 if 8086 or 8088
 50529                                  ;              = 1 if 80286
 50530                                  ;              = 2 if 80386
 50531                                  
 50532                                  	; 04/11/2022
 50533                                  	; MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0BB03h
 50534                                  
 50535                                  	; 22/03/2024
 50536                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0CCEDh
 50537                                  
 50538                                  Get_CPU_Type:	;macro
 50539 00008B07 9C                      	pushf
 50540 00008B08 53                      	push	bx			; preserve bx
 50541 00008B09 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; init bx to zero
 50542                                  
 50543 00008B0B 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; 0000 into AX
 50544 00008B0D 50                      	push	ax			; put it on the stack...
 50545 00008B0E 9D                      	popf				; ...then shove it into the flags
 50546 00008B0F 9C                      	pushf				; get it back out of the flags...
 50547 00008B10 58                      	pop	ax			; ...and into ax
 50548 00008B11 2500F0                  	and	ax,0F000h		; mask off high four bits
 50549 00008B14 3D00F0                  	cmp	ax,0F000h		; was it all 1's?
 50550 00008B17 740E                    	je	short cpu_8086		; aye; it's an 8086 or 8088
 50551                                  
 50552 00008B19 B800F0                  	mov	ax,0F000h		; now try to set the high four bits..
 50553 00008B1C 50                      	push	ax
 50554 00008B1D 9D                      	popf
 50555 00008B1E 9C                      	pushf
 50556 00008B1F 58                      	pop	ax			; ...and see what happens
 50557 00008B20 2500F0                  	and	ax,0F000h		; any high bits set ?
 50558 00008B23 7401                    	jz	short cpu_286		; nay; it's an 80286
 50559                                  
 50560                                  cpu_386:				; bx starts as zero
 50561 00008B25 43                      	inc	bx			; inc twice if 386
 50562                                  cpu_286:				; just inc once if 286
 50563 00008B26 43                      	inc	bx
 50564                                  cpu_8086:				; don't inc at all if 086
 50565 00008B27 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; put CPU type value in ax
 50566 00008B29 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore original bx
 50567 00008B2A 9D                      	popf
 50568                                  	
 50569                                  	;endm
 50570                                  
 50571                                  	; 04/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 50572 00008B2B C3                      	retn	; 19/09/2023
 50573                                  
 50574                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 50575                                  %endif	; 28/12/2022
 50576

 51508                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 51509                                  ;
 51510                                  ;	check_XMM: routine to check presence of XMM driver
 51511                                  ;
 51512                                  ;	Exit:   Sets up the XMM entry point in XMMcontrol in DOSDATA
 51513                                  ;
 51514                                  ;	USED:	none
 51515                                  ;
 51516                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 51517                                  
 51518                                  check_XMM: ; proc near
 51519                                  ;
 51520                                  ; determine whether or not an XMM driver is installed
 51521                                  ;
 51522 00008E4F 50                      	push	ax
 51523                                  	;mov	ax,(XMM_MULTIPLEX<<8)+XMM_INSTALL_CHECK
 51524 00008E50 B80043                  	mov	ax,4300h
 51525 00008E53 CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 51526                                  		; - Multiplex - XMS - INSTALLATION CHECK
 51527                                  		; Return: AL = 80h XMS driver installed
 51528                                  		; AL <> 80h no driver
 51529 00008E55 3C80                    	cmp	al,80h			; Q: installed
 51530 00008E57 751D                    	jne	short cXMM_no_driver	; N: set error, quit
 51531                                  ;
 51532                                  ; get the XMM control functions entry point, save it, we
 51533                                  ; need to call it later.
 51534                                  ;
 51535 00008E59 53                      	push	bx
 51536 00008E5A 52                      	push	dx
 51537 00008E5B 1E                      	push	ds
 51538 00008E5C 06                      	push	es
 51539                                  	;mov	ax,(XMM_MULTIPLEX<<8)+XMM_FUNCTION_ADDR
 51540 00008E5D B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 51541 00008E60 CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 51542                                  		; - Multiplex - XMS - GET DRIVER ADDRESS
 51543                                  		; Return: ES:BX -> driver entry point
 51544                                  
 51545 00008E62 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 51546                                  
 51547 00008E67 891E[7B10]              	mov	[XMMcontrol],bx
 51548 00008E6B 8C06[7D10]              	mov	[XMMcontrol+2],es
 51549                                  cXMMexit:
 51550 00008E6F F8                      	clc
 51551 00008E70 07                      	pop	es
 51552 00008E71 1F                      	pop	ds
 51553 00008E72 5A                      	pop	dx
 51554 00008E73 5B                      	pop	bx
 51555 00008E74 58                      	pop	ax
 51556 00008E75 C3                      	retn				; done
 51557                                  ;
 51558                                  ; set carry if XMM driver not present
 51559                                  ;
 51560                                  cXMM_no_driver:
 51561 00008E76 F9                      	stc
 51562 00008E77 58                      	pop	ax
 51563 00008E78 C3                      	retn

 51565                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 51566                                  ;
 51567                                  ; Procedure Name : seg_reinit
 51568                                  ;
 51569                                  ; Inputs	 : ES has final dos code location
 51570                                  ;		   AX = 0 / 1
 51571                                  ;
 51572                                  ; Outputs	 : Patch in the sharer and other tables with seg in ES
 51573                                  ;		   if AX =0
 51574                                  ;		      if first entry
 51575                                  ;			 patch segment & offset of vectors with stub
 51576                                  ;			 and stub with segment in ES
 51577                                  ;		      else
 51578                                  ;			 patch stub with segment in ES
 51579                                  ;
 51580                                  ;		   else if AX = 1
 51581                                  ;			patch segment of vectors with segment in ES
 51582                                  ;
 51583                                  ; NOTE		 : This routine can be called at most twice!
 51584                                  ;
 51585                                  ; Regs Mod.	 : es, ax, di, cx, bx
 51586                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 51587                                  
 51588 00008E79 00                      num_entry: db	0		; keeps track of the # of times this routine
 51589                                  				; has been called. (0 or 1)
 51590                                  
 51591                                  	; 04/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (ref: MSDOS 5.0)
 51592                                  	; MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0BAB7h
 51593                                  	; 25/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 (ref: MSDOS 6.21)
 51594                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0BDA5h
 51595                                  
 51596                                  	; 23/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (ref: PCDOS 7.1)
 51597                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0D07Eh
 51598                                  
 51599                                  seg_reinit:	; proc	far
 51600 00008E7A 1E                      	push	ds
 51601                                  
 51602 00008E7B 2E8E1E[0700]            	mov	ds,[cs:DosDSeg]
 51603                                  
 51604 00008E80 E89300                  	call	patch_misc_segments	; patch in segments for sharer and 
 51605                                  					; other tables with seg in ES.
 51606                                  	
 51607                                  	; 17/12/2022
 51608                                  	; cx = 0
 51609 00008E83 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx ; 0
 51610                                  	;cmp	ax,0
 51611 00008E85 754A                    	jne	short patch_vec_seg	; patch vectors with segment in es
 51612                                  	; 23/03/2024
 51613                                  	;or	ax, ax
 51614                                  	;jnz	short patch_vec_seg
 51615                                  
 51616                                  	; 23/03/2024
 51617                                  	;cmp	[cs:num_entry],al ; 0
 51618                                  	; 17/12/2022
 51619 00008E87 2E380E[798E]            	cmp	[cs:num_entry],cl ; 0
 51620                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:num_entry],0	; Q: is it the first call to this
 51621 00008E8C 7508                    	jne	short second_entry	; N: just patch the stub with 
 51622                                  					;    segment in ES
 51623                                  					; Y: patch the vectors with stub
 51624 00008E8E 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 51625 00008E90 E84B00                  	call	patch_vec_segments	; patch the segment of vectors
 51626 00008E93 E8CA00                  	call	patch_offset		; patch the offsets of vectors
 51627                                  					; with those in the stub.
 51628                                  	; 17/12/2022
 51629                                  	; cx = 0
 51630                                  second_entry:
 51631 00008E96 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es			; patch the stub with segment in es
 51632                                  
 51633                                  	;mov	di,OFFSET DOSDATA:DOSINTTABLE
 51634                                  	;;mov	di,1062h	; (same table addr for MSDOS 5.0 and MSDOS 6.21)
 51635                                  	;mov	di,0F7Ah ; 23/03/2024 ; PCDOS 7.1
 51636 00008E98 BF[7A0F]                	mov	di,DOSINTTABLE
 51637                                  	
 51638                                  	; 17/12/2022
 51639                                  	; cx = 0
 51640                                  	;;mov	cx,9
 51641                                  	;mov	cl,9
 51642                                  	; 23/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 51643                                  	;;;
 51644                                  	;mov	cx,8
 51645 00008E9B B108                    	mov	cl,8
 51646                                  	;;;
 51647 00008E9D 1E                      	push	ds			
 51648 00008E9E 07                      	pop	es			; es:di -> DOSINTTABLE
 51649                                  
 51650                                  dosinttabloop:
 51651                                  	;add	di,2
 51652                                  	; 19/06/2023
 51653 00008E9F 47                      	inc	di
 51654 00008EA0 47                      	inc	di
 51655 00008EA1 AB                      	stosw
 51656 00008EA2 E2FB                    	loop	dosinttabloop	
 51657                                  
 51658                                  ; For ROMDOS, this routine will only be called when the DOS wants to
 51659                                  ; use the HMA, so we don't want to check CS
 51660                                  
 51661                                  ;ifndef ROMDOS

 51671                                  ; M021-

 51675

 51677                                  					; patches buggy exepacked code.

 51680                                  					; M068: set pointer to the routine 
 51681                                  					; M068: that detects copy protected
 51682                                  					; M068: apps
 51683                                  	;mov	[ChkCopyProt],offset DOSCODE:IsCopyProt
 51684 00008EBC C706[6100][C28A]        	mov	word [ChkCopyProt],IsCopyProt
 51685                                  
 51686                                  	; 23/03/2024 - PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0D0C7h
 51687                                  	;	      (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0BDF1h)

 51689 00008EC5 3C01                    	cmp	al,1
 51690 00008EC7 750D                    	jne	short sr_done	; we need Rational Patch only on 286 systems
 51691 00008EC9 C706[690D][498A]        	mov	word [RationalPatchPtr],RationalPatch
 51692                                  
 51693                                  	; 19/09/2023
 51694 00008ECF EB05                    	jmp	short sr_done
 51695                                  
 51696                                  	; 23/03/2024
 51697                                  patch_vec_seg:				; patch vectors with segment in es
 51698 00008ED1 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 51699 00008ED3 E80800                  	call	patch_vec_segments	; patch in DOSCODE for the segments
 51700                                  					; NOTE we don't have to patch the 
 51701                                  					; offsets as they have been already
 51702                                  					; set to the doscode offsets at
 51703                                  					; DOSINIT.
 51704                                  sr_done:
 51705 00008ED6 2EC606[798E]01          	mov	byte [cs:num_entry],1
 51706 00008EDC 1F                      	pop	ds
 51707 00008EDD CB                      	retf	; ! far return !

 51709                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 51710                                  ;
 51711                                  ; Procedure Name : patch_vec_segments
 51712                                  ;
 51713                                  ; Inputs	 : ax -> has segment address to patch in
 51714                                  ;		   ds -> DOSDATA
 51715                                  ;
 51716                                  ; Outputs	 : Patches in AX as the segment for the following vectors:
 51717                                  ;			
 51718                                  ;			0,20-28,3a-3f
 51719                                  ;

 51721                                  ;

 51723

 51735

 51740                                  	;mov	cl,2

 51747                                  	;loop	ps_set1
 51748                                  
 51749                                  	; 17/12/2022
 51750 00008EED AB                      	stosw	; int 21h segment
 51751                                  	;inc	di

 51759

 51847                                  	;mov	bx,[0AA3h] ; 23/03/2024 ; PCDOS 7.1 
 51848 00008F20 8B1E[A30A]              	mov	bx,[TEMP_DOSLOC]	; bx = location to which the share
 51849                                  					; table was patched during the first
 51850                                  					; call to this routine
 51851 00008F24 B90F00                  	mov	cx,15
 51852                                  jumptabloop:

 52059                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 52060                                  ;
 52061                                  ; 	Procedure Name	:	patch_in_nops
 52062                                  ;
 52063                                  ; 	Entry		: 	ES -> DOSDATA
 52064                                  ;
 52065                                  ;	Regs Mod	: 	cx, di
 52066                                  ;
 52067                                  ;	Description:
 52068                                  ;		This routine patches in 2 nops at the offsets specified in 
 52069                                  ;	patch_table. This basically enables the low mem stub to start 
 52070                                  ;	making XMS calls.
 52071                                  ;
 52072                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 52073                                  
 52074                                  	; 04/11/2022
 52075                                  	; MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0BC50h
 52076                                  
 52077                                  	; 23/03/2024
 52078                                  	; MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0BF42h
 52079                                  	; 23/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 52080                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0D1E9h
 52081                                  
 52082                                  patch_table:	; label	byte
 52083                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i0patch
 52084                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i20patch
 52085                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i21patch
 52086                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i25patch
 52087                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i26patch
 52088                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i27patch
 52089                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i2fpatch
 52090                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:cpmpatch
 52091 00008FCB [9E0F]                  	dw	i0patch
 52092 00008FCD [A80F]                  	dw	i20patch
 52093 00008FCF [B20F]                  	dw	i21patch
 52094 00008FD1 [BC0F]                  	dw	i25patch
 52095 00008FD3 [C60F]                  	dw	i26patch
 52096 00008FD5 [D00F]                  	dw	i27patch
 52097 00008FD7 [DA0F]                  	dw	i2fpatch
 52098 00008FD9 [E40F]                  	dw	cpmpatch
 52099                                  
 52100                                  patch_table_size equ ($-patch_table)/2
 52101                                  
 52102                                  patch_in_nops:
 52103 00008FDB 50                      	push	ax
 52104 00008FDC 56                      	push	si
 52105 00008FDD BE[CB8F]                	mov	si,patch_table
 52106 00008FE0 B89090                  	mov	ax,9090h ; nop, nop
 52107                                  	; 17/12/2022
 52108                                  	; cx = 0
 52109                                  	;mov	cx,8
 52110                                  	;mov	cx,patch_table_size ; 8
 52111 00008FE3 B108                    	mov	cl,patch_table_size ; 8
 52112                                  pin_loop:
 52113 00008FE5 2E8B3C                  	mov	di,[cs:si]
 52114 00008FE8 AB                      	stosw
 52115                                  	;add	si,2

 52118 00008FEA 46                      	inc	si

 52120 00008FED 5E                      	pop	si
 52121 00008FEE 58                      	pop	ax
 52122 00008FEF C3                      	retn

 52206                                  	; DOSDATA (MSDOS.SYS kernel DATA) segment starts here...

 52210                                  ;============================================================================
 52211                                  ; MSCONST.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 52212                                  ;============================================================================
 52213                                  ; 03/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 52214                                  ; 25/04/2019 - Retro DOS 4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
 52215                                  ; 16/07/2018 - Retro DOS 3.0	
 52216                                  
 52217                                  ;Break <Initialized data and data used at DOS initialization>
 52218                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 52219                                  
 52220                                  ; We need to identify the parts of the data area that are relevant to tasks
 52221                                  ; and those that are relevant to the system as a whole. Under 3.0, the system
 52222                                  ; data will be gathered with the system code. The process data under 2.x will
 52223                                  ; be available for swapping and under 3.0 it will be allocated per-process.
 52224                                  ;
 52225                                  ; The data that is system data will be identified by [SYSTEM] in the comments
 52226                                  ; describing that data item.
 52227                                  
 52228                                  ;DOSDATA SEGMENT
 52229                                  
 52230                                  ; 04/11/2022
 52231                                  ;[ORG 0]
 52232                                  
 52233                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 52234                                  ; 04/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 52235                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 52236                                  ; DOSDATA segment start offset from beginning of MSDOS.SYS file: 32432 (7EB0h)
 52237                                  ; (3DD0h+7EB0h = 0BC80h) - for MSDOS 5.0 kernel file -
 52238                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 52239                                  
 52240                                  ; 04/11/2022
 52241

 52243

 52256                                  DOSDATASTART:

 52269                                  	;dw	0

 52272

 52320                                  
 52321                                  ;; 16/07/2018
 52322                                  ;;***************************************************************************
 52323                                  ;; NOTE: INT 21H AH=52H !  (http://stanislavs.org/helppc/int_21-52.html)
 52324                                  ;;***************************************************************************
 52325                                  ;; INT 21,52 - Get Pointer to DOS "INVARS" (Undocumented)
 52326                                  ;;
 52327                                  ;;	AH = 52h
 52328                                  ;;
 52329                                  ;;	on return:
 52330                                  ;;	ES:BX = pointer to DOS "invars", a table of pointers used by DOS.
 52331                                  ;;		Known "invars" fields follow (varies with DOS version):
 52332                                  ;;
 52333                                  ;;	Offset Size		 Description
 52334                                  ;;
 52335                                  ;;	 -12   word   sharing retry count (DOS 3.1-3.3)
 52336                                  ;;	 -10   word   sharing retry delay  (DOS 3.1-3.3)
 52337                                  ;;	  -8   dword  pointer to current disk buffer (DOS 3.x)
 52338                                  ;;	  -4   word   pointer in DOS code segment of unread CON input;
 52339                                  ;;		      0 indicates no unread input (DOS 3.x)
 52340                                  ;;	  -2   word   segment of first Memory Control Block (MCB)
 52341                                  ;;	  00   dword  pointer to first DRIVE PARAMETER TABLE (A:) in chain
 52342                                  ;;	  04   dword  pointer to DOS System File Table (SFT)
 52343                                  ;;	  08   dword  pointer to $CLOCK device driver
 52344                                  ;;	  0C   dword  pointer to CON device driver
 52345                                  ;;	  10   byte   number of logical drives in system
 52346                                  ;;	  11   word   maximum bytes/block of any block device
 52347                                  ;;	  13   dword  pointer to DOS cache buffer header
 52348                                  ;;	  17 18bytes  NUL device header, first 4 bytes of device header
 52349                                  ;;		      point to the next device in device chain
 52350                                  ;;
 52351                                  ;;***************************************************************************
 52352                                  
 52353                                  ; The following block of data is used by SYSINIT. 
 52354                                  ; Do not change the order or size of this block
 52355                                  
 52356                                  ;SYSINITVAR:
 52357                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 52358                                  SYSINITVARS:
 52359                                  DPBHEAD:
 52360 00000026 00000000                	dd	0	; [SYSTEM] Pointer to head of DPB-FAT list
 52361                                  SFT_ADDR:
 52362 0000002A [CC000000]              	dd	SFTABL	; [SYSTEM] Pointer to first SFT table
 52363                                  BCLOCK:
 52364 0000002E 00000000                	dd	0	; [SYSTEM] The CLOCK device
 52365                                  BCON:
 52366 00000032 00000000                	dd	0	; [SYSTEM] Console device entry points
 52367                                  MAXSEC:
 52368 00000036 8000                    	dw	128	; [SYSTEM] Maximum allowed sector size
 52369                                  BUFFHEAD:
 52370 00000038 00000000                	dd	0	; [SYSTEM] Pointer to head of buffer queue
 52371                                  CDSADDR:
 52372 0000003C 00000000                	dd	0	; [SYSTEM] Pointer to curdir structure table
 52373                                  SFTFCB:
 52374 00000040 00000000                	dd	0	; [SYSTEM] pointer to FCB cache table
 52375                                  KEEPCOUNT:
 52376 00000044 0000                    	dw	0	; [SYSTEM] count of FCB opens to keep
 52377                                  NUMIO:
 52378 00000046 00                      	db	0	; [SYSTEM] Number of disk tables
 52379                                  CDSCOUNT:
 52380 00000047 00                      	db	0	; [SYSTEM] Number of CDS structures in above
 52381                                  
 52382                                  ; A fake header for the NUL device
 52383                                  NULDEV:
 52384 00000048 00000000                	dd	0	; [SYSTEM] Link to rest of device list
 52385                                  	;dw	8004h
 52386 0000004C 0480                    	dw	DEVTYP|ISNULL ; [SYSTEM] Null device attributes
